description: To celebrate the 25th anniversary of the album So, Peter Gabriel reunites the original line-up that accompanied him on tour in 1986 ((Tony Levin, David Rhodes, Manu Katché and David Sancious, with the addition of backing singers Jennie Abrahamson and Linnea Olsson ) and offers fans a concert that made music history.
notes: Sad anecdotes and compliments, a funeral apology that never forgets to magnify the eternal magic of the live show. If Hamish Hamilton is a concert film specialist, here it is not possible to understand in the least what his talent consists of. Listen again, I know, with headphones. And - at the limit - review Jonathan Demme's musical films.

title: Magical Girl
actors: Luis Bermejo, Bárbara Lennie, José Sacristan, Lucía Pollán, Javier Botet, Israel Elejalde, Elisabet Gelabert, Julio Arrojo, Marisol Membrillo, Alberto Chaves, Teresa Soria Ruano
description: Alicia, a sick child, dreams of having the dress from the Japanese series Magical Girl Yukiko. Luis, her father, will do everything in his power to please her. Her destiny intersects with those of Barbara, a young and attractive woman with mental disorders, and Damian, a retired teacher with a troubled past. Luis, Barbara and Damiano will find themselves trapped in a web of dark blackmail, which will question instincts and reason.

title: Antarctica: A Year on Ice
actors: Genevieve Bachman, Michael Christiansen, Tom Hamann, George Lampman, Peter Lund, Keri Nelson, Casey O'Brien, Anthony Powell, Christine Powell, David Prutsman
description: Director Anthony Powell spent ten years in Antarctica filming what no one has ever shown. Thanks to a video camera capable of withstanding the cold temperatures, he was able to film the region from every angle, thus also capturing the penguins that inhabit it, the terrifying ice storms that hit it and the workers of the research stations struggling with the effects that the extreme conditions of the place have on their mental state.

title: Shana: The Wolf's Music
actors: Sunshine O'Donovan, Delilah Dick, Alana Aspinall, Marcel Shackely, Marty Aspinall, Vonnet Hall
description: 12-year-old Shana is a talented musician who lives with her father on the Indian reservation near Merritt. Since her mother's death, Shana has withdrawn into her world, stopped going to school and hardly picked up her violin anymore. Her life takes a decisive turn when her new teacher discovers her talent and enrolls her in a Vancouver music school. A few days before the admission test, however, her father sells the violin that her mother also played and to find it Shana sets off on an adventure in the depths of the forest, where she will have the opportunity to meet the white wolf and the spirits of her ancestors. .

title: Eien no zero
actors: Min Tanaka, Haruma Miura, Mao Inoue, Jun'ichi Okada, Isao Natsuyagi, Shôta Sometani, Jun Fubuki, Mikijiro Hira, Kazue Fukiishi, Yûki Furukawa
description: Young Kentaro Saeki and elder sister Keiko, a freelance writer, begin looking for information about grandfather Kyuzo Miyabe, who died in the Japanese special forces during World War II. Obsessed with life and terrified of death, Kyuzo was certainly not the best man to join the army and his choice appears at first glance inexplicable. According to his fellow soldiers, Kyuzo was both a genius and a coward and what Kentaro and Keiko will discover will be a shocking truth, hidden from everyone for over sixty years.

title: Maidan
description: Maidan is the main square of Kiev, the capital of Ukraine. Starting from November 2013, citizens of all ages and faiths gathered here to protest against the regime of President Yanukovych, forced to resign in late March 2014.

title: Dohee-ya
actors: Bae Doo-Na, Kim Sae-Ron, Song Sae-Byeok, Moon Sung-Geun, Jang Hee-Jin
description: Do-Hee experiences family violence firsthand. Young-Nam works as the chief of the police station and tries everything to protect Do-Hee from the violent stepfather Yong-Ha. Though she seems naïve, Do-Hee hides a secret and Yung-Nam inevitably gets caught up in a case that puts her own life on the line.

title: Eau argentée - Syrie Autoportrait
description: Documentary that traces three years of the Syrian situation and the outbreak of the civil war in the country.
notes: Silvered Water is a two-way dialogue, a lament in the perceptual chaos of bombs and emails, of pixels and death, a very powerful lyric that tries to re-sensitize images of war, images that perhaps we have already seen distractedly on TV, or that have lasted time. of a disdain and an ethical worry, forgotten the next click.

title: Moo-deom-kka-ji Gan-da
actors: Lee Sun-Kyun, Cho Jin-Woong, Jeong Man-Sik, Shin Jung-Keun
description: Detective Gun-Soo is involved in a car accident, which he tries not to reveal. As a result, he finds himself having to deal with Chang-Min, the only witness to the incident who begins to threaten him, hiding his real intentions and his true identity.

title: La Palmira - Ul film
actors: Rodolfo Bernasconi, Germano Porta, Valerio Sulmoni, Flavio Sala, Diego Bernasconi, Francesca Bernasconi, Federico Caprara, Simona Bernasconi, Michael Betti, I Legnanesi
description: The Palmira with its decisive pace, which does not betray its age, wanders the streets of Mendrisio. Meanwhile, a clown tries to amuse the director of the circus Beck, who has just arrived in the town. Palmira is looking for her husband Geni, who does not give up an extra glass of wine, and her sister-in-law Miglieta, who only aims to read the scriptures in church. Don Giovanni, the parish priest who arrived a couple of years ago and assisted by Ersilia, the perpetual who feeds on soap operas and TV broadcasts, prevents him from doing so. She is so nosy that she wonders why Don Giovanni changes parish every two years. And what is your relationship with Elisabetta, the assistant to the circus director? Two different worlds oppose each other: the simpleton on one side and the crafty ones on the other, who are ready to do anything to revive the fortunes of the circus on the brink of failure. The discovery of a Picasso in the Miglieta room will be decisive, capable of inducing unpredictable actions.
notes: The eye of a shrewd viewer captures more than formal naivety, but the interest in this case is more anthropological than folkloric or cinematographic. Even if the plot of the film is a simple pretext to unveil a series of gags that compare the common shrewdness of the Palmyra with the pressing modernity, the "mendrisiotto" (particular fringe of the western Lombard dialect) has its own rough musicality, and the cast proves skilled. Triumph in Italian Switzerland, but the film also works west of Milan.

title: Altri tempi
actors: Vittoria Puccini, Valentina Corti, Francesco Scianna, Marina Rocco, Elena Radonicich, Stefania Rocca, Camilla Semino Favro, Viviana Altieri, Marta Iagatti, Giselda Volodi, Maria Grazia Bon
description: Turin, 1950s. Maddalena is found lifeless at the foot of a hotel scale: the case is archived as an accident. Adele, turns out to be the heir of Maddalena, and finds a letter written to Senator Merlin who, between secrets and confessions, traces the life of the woman. Twenty years earlier Maddalena had ended up in the clutches of a lawyer who had abused her and had put her pregnant. Not finding any means of supporting himself ends up in spite of himself in a brothel. To give the daughter a future makes the painful choice to give it to adoption. As a fragile woman who so far has only suffered, Maddalena decides to react and become the best of prostitutes.

title: Omoide no Marnie
description: Anna, a lonely girl, has no friends and lives with her adoptive parents until she is sent to live with the elderly Peggs, in the midst of a wild nature made of dunes and water. Here, he almost immediately meets a mysterious little girl named Marnie, who becomes Anna's first friend. One day, however, Marnie disappears into thin air and a new family arrives in her home, from which Anna learns some strange truths about her friend.
notes: The girl's deep sadness is so pervasive that it hardly leaves room for the moments of levity and fantasy typical of Studio Ghibli. The result is a monochord melon, technically flawless, but not very inspired. The great success in Japan was not enough, perhaps rightly, to avert the creative break of Studio Ghibli. Inspired by the novel of the same name by Joan G. Robinson.

title: La pioggia che non cade
actors: Carlo Picone, Anna Russo, Mauro Fiore, Vincenzo Picone, Simone Pletto, Vincenzo Citriniti, Viviana Colais, Francesca Nunzi, Elisabetta Ventura, Angela Curri, Lucia Centorame, Philippe Guastella, Marco Paparella
description: The Roman songwriter-folk band of the Inverso is composed of the voice Carlo (also guitarist and piano), the bassist Vincenzo, the drummer and percussionist Mauro, the accordionist Simone, the saxophonist Enzo and the cellist Anna. At the end of one of their usual concerts in the clubs of the city, the Inverso are noticed by Luca, who offers them to enter the "important" musical environment. Despite appearing skeptical, the boys set the date that could change their life forever, even if it involves some risk in the sentimental sphere.
notes: Harmless and almost cartoonish in outlining the evil thugs of the perfidious record industry, "The rain that does not fall" has the advantage of not taking itself too seriously and not mimicking American models in the story. Far from the synthetic universe of talents, it almost seems like a timeless musician, gracefully born out of fashion. More than a film, however, it acts as a promotional support for the band, which brings the newborn and homonymous debut album on tour together with the film: the story perhaps deserved to be fleshed out in the script.

title: Giovanni no Shima
description: 1945. After the defeat remedied in war, the Japanese live in the fear of US forces. North of the country, in the small island of Shitokan, life goes on between reconstruction and fear of a new invasion. This small piece of land, far from everyone and everyone, however ends up being annexed to the Russian army, starting a strange coexistence between Soviet soldiers and inhabitants of the island which, despite the differences, find hope through the innocence of two Children: Tanya and Jumpei.

title: Les Saisons
description: Poetic chronicle of Europe over the last 15 thousand years, told through the eyes of animals. A natural symphony on the mysteries of forests, plains and mountains, starting with the last ice age and the consequent new beginning of the cycle of the seasons.

title: Gekijôban Mahou Shojo Madoka Magica Shinpen: Hangyaku no Monogatari
description: Madoka Kaname lived a happy and carefree life, until the day she decided to sacrifice herself. She gave up her human nature to save the young sorceresses from the cruel fate that awaited them. Following this decision Homura Akemi, unable to completely forget her friend, decided to continue fighting alone for the salvation of humanity, in the world that Madoka had given her.
notes: If in the previous chapters the story was allegorical of the social difficulties and the growth of young Japanese girls, now the plot - almost impenetrable to the uninitiated - wraps itself around itself within a self-referential metaphysical scheme, which comes to distort to a certain extent even the characters of the characters. What is lost on the involved narrative side, however, is compensated for by an uncontrolled explosion of visual inventions. The result is a stunning imaginative shock, certainly very confused, but which cannot leave us indifferent.

title: Everyday Rebellion
directors: Arash T. Riahi, Arman T. Riahi
description: It is not a utopia that forms of non-violent protest and civil disobedience can change the world and the state of things. If anything, it is a fact that finds confirmation from Iran to Syria, from the Femen group in Ukraine to the Indignados in Spain and from Occupy Wall Street to the streets of Copenhagen. Brothers Arash and Arman Irahi closely follow activists and their daily rebellions to safeguard justice, human rights and democracy.
notes: The calmness of the manners is superimposed on the form of the documentary chosen by the Riahi brothers, through the whispered voice over, respectful observation, careful listening to intertwined yet distant stories. The cynical eye inevitably reads an out of fashion optimism, overtaken by events, but the ultimate value of Everyday Rebellion lies in its mapping, rather than of battles and alleged revolutions, of unexpectedly creative fighting techniques.

title: Can't Stand Losing You
actors: Andy Summers, Sting, Stewart Copeland
description: Through unpublished images, films and clips, we retrace the epic of one of the most successful rock bands, The Police, from the beginnings to the famous concert of the 2007-08 Reunion Tour told through the narration of guitarist Andy Summers. In his journey of memories, Andy describes the meeting with the drummer Stewart Copeland and the vocalist Sting, the difficult climb to success, the apotheosis of world tours, the arguments and bickering unsustainable between them so much that they force them to take a break lasting 27 years until the announcement, in 2007, of their last tour as a band.
notes: The greatness of the Police does not lie in the pieces, in the success, in the myth, but in the number. Three. Perfection. Bass guitar drums. Rock doesn't need anything else. Images of the past, when the first guitarist Henry Padovani was still in Andy's place. Pure punk. The film does not discount the flaws, Sting's arrogance, the usual whirlwind of the reckless life of rock stars, all "testosterone, money, power", but the testimony is alive, objective, never nostalgic. With really exciting moments. The story of Roxanne's genesis, to say, is goosebumps.

title: Song of the Sea
description: Little Saoirse has a special power that allows her to transform into a seal and then return to human. According to Irish and Scottish legend, Saoire is a selkie and what's more, she is one of the last of her breed. One day, Saoirse evades her grandmother's surveillance and decides to embark on an underwater adventure to free the endangered creatures.

title: Inside Out
description: Growing up isn't always easy, and 11-year-old Riley realizes it when she's forced to leave her life in the Midwest to follow her father's job in San Francisco. Like everyone else, Riley is driven by the five main emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - that live in her mind and help her cope with everyday life. As Riley struggles to adjust to the new big city, agitation mounts at the headquarters of emotions: although Joy tries to maintain a positive view of things, the remaining emotions conflict over how best to explore the new reality in which they find themselves.
notes: The riot of visual inventions to give body to the incorporeal surpass in grace and imagination what Pixar has done so far. But it is not only in the visual aspect that Inside Out makes history: its revolutionary plot, instead of simplifying the message within a child's reach, opens up to the complexity of the human emotional range and puts the fate of the adventure in the hands of an anti - clumsy, static and fearful heroine, bearer of melancholy. Which proves to be the winning weapon and undermines every Disney tradition on the value of always being cheerful and optimistic.

title: So-won
actors: Hae-suk Kim, Sang-ho Kim, Mi-ran Ra, Kyung-gu Sol, Ji-won Uhm, Jin-Sung Yang
description: The tragedy of an eight-year-old girl, forced to face a gruesome violence that shakes her internally and makes it difficult for her to emotionally overcome all the obstacles that the episode leaves in her life.

title: Durak
actors: Artem Bystrov, Natalya Surkova, Darya Moroz, Kirill Polukhin, Boris Nevzorov, Yury Tsurilo
description: A simple, honest plumber finds himself struggling against a whole system of interrelated officials. At stake is the lives of the 800 occupants of an old hostel, which will most likely collapse overnight.

title: Nuits Blanches sur la Jetée
actors: Astrid Adverbe, Pascal Cervo, Geneviève Montaigu, Paul Vecchiali
description: Every evening a night owl walks on the quay of the city port where he is spending a sabbatical year. Here he meets a young woman who is waiting for the man of her life. During four nights, as real as you dream, the two will talk about life and little by little he will fall in love with her. But the long-awaited lover eventually arrives ...
notes: Most of the sequences in the film, inspired by Dostoevsky's White Nights, were shot with an Ipod.

title: Una gita a Roma
actors: Claudia Cardinale, Libero Natoli, Tea Buranelli, Philippe Leroy, Karin Proia, Chiara Conti, Giovanni Lombardo Radice, Silvana Bosi, Pietro De Silva, Roberta Fiorentini, Carlo de Ruggeri, Raffaele Buranelli, Davide Merlini, Phil Palmer
description: Francesco is 9 years old and has an unusual passion for his age. With his little sister Maria he arrives in Rome from a provincial town and, along a journey that makes them discover a great metropolis and a varied universe of characters and places, the two find themselves involved in a series of adventures that are now pleasant hours less before reaching a destination long dreamed of and considered one of the most amazing artistic places in the world.

title: Zerrumpelt Herz
actors: Thorsten Wien, Eva Maria Jost, Daniel Krauss, Christian Blümel, Andreas Conrad, Theo Leutert
description: 1929. Music teacher Paul Leinert receives an unexpected letter from his old friend Otto Schiffmann, a talented young composer who left Berlin following a failed marriage. The letter is an invitation to visit Otto at his home in the woods and to discover his new work, a long-awaited symphony. Paul will take his wife Anna and colleague Willi with him, but once they get to the house, Otto is missing. As the three of them go in search of it, Paul notices something strange in the birdsong ...

title: Sivas
actors: Dogan Izci, Ezgi Ergin, Hasan Özdemir, Furkan Uyar
description: The story of Aslan, an eleven-year-old boy, and Sivas, his battered fighting dog, against the backdrop of the Turkish steppe. A bond develops between them after Aslan finds Sivas abandoned and wounded in a ditch.

title: Nabat
actors: Fatemeh Motamed Arya, Vidadi Aliyev, Sabir Mamadov, Farhad Israfilov
description: Nabat and her husband Iskender, an old and sick former forest worker, live in a small house far from an Azerbaijani village. With their son killed in the war, their survival is guaranteed by selling the milk of their only cow, which Nabat brings every other day to the now almost abandoned village. After her husband dies, Nabat will have to learn how to survive.

title: Me ne frego!
description: Overlapping with Italy divided into dialects, with a king who spoke French, Fascism tried to build its own national language. It was often a clumsy and authoritarian attempt, rather than credible and authoritative. They discovered that the language of a nation is not built with edicts.

title: Il clan dei camorristi
actors: Stefano Accorsi, Giuseppe Zeno, Claudia Potenza, Massimo Popolizio, Francesca Beggio, Francesco Di Leva, Vanessa Compagnucci, Renato Marchetti, Serena Rossi, Salvatore Striano, Gianluca Di Gennaro
description: The story of one of the most ruthless mafia and criminal organizations that has ever known Italy, a clan capable of building over the years a plot of unprecedented violence and impunity, of becoming an economic enterprise and a political party from time to time, to corrode institutions from within, to find niches of unsuspected complicity even at the highest levels of the state.
notes: Inspired by the true story of the Casalesi clan.

title: Common
actors: Michael Gambon, Michelle Fairley, Nico Mirallegro, Jodhi May, Daniel Mays, Andrew Tiernan, Louise Delamere, Robert Pugh, Susan Lynch, Connie Hyde
description: Young Johnjo O’Shea takes his cousin Tony and two other friends to a take-away to get a pizza, unaware of their intention of hitting another boy. He waits for them in the car. Inside the pizzeria, during the fight, one of the trio stabs the innocent Thomas to death, the boys run out, get into Johnjo's car and run away. They are quickly discovered. Thus begins the odyssey of Johnjo and the other two boys who, despite not having committed the murder, are found guilty because of an English law that in cases of brawl homicide blames all those who have participated in any way in the fact.

title: Risttuules
actors: Einar Hillep, Ingrid Isotamm, Laura Peterson, Mirt Preegel, Tarmo Song
description: June 14, 1941. Without warning, tens of thousands of people in Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania are removed from their homes. By order of Stalin, men are taken to prison camps while women and children are deported to Siberia. Estonian Erna, happily married and mother of a child, ends up in Siberia, where time takes on a new dimension for her. Fighting against hunger, humiliation and inhuman conditions, she seeks freedom in the letters she writes to her husband.

title: Nightfall
description: A single 98-minute still shot of a forest in the Sierra Nevada as the sun goes down and night falls.

title: Dukhtar
actors: Samiya Mumtaz, Mohib Mirza, Saleha Aref, Asif Khan, Ajab Gul, Adnan Shah, Abdullah Jan, Samina Ahmad, Omair Rana, Zeeshan Shafa
description: In the mountains of northern Pakistan, a struggle has been going on for some time between the two tribes led by Daulat Khan and Tor Gul, who decide to agree on a truce. The only way to end the conflict is to marry the mature Tor Gul Zainab, the daughter of Daulat, who is only ten years old. The deal is made but Allah Rakhi, the child's mother, soon realizes that her Zainab will face the same bad fate that she also experienced as a young girl. He decides to make a dangerous decision and flees on his wedding day with his daughter, chased by a swarm of murderers sent by the two tribal leaders.

title: Sarà un Paese
actors: Nicola Campiotti, Elia Saman, Raffaele Guarna Assanti, Matilde Gardini, Graziella Marota, Anok Deb, Greta Fink
description: On the trail of the Phoenician hero Cadmus, to whom the myth attributes the introduction of the alphabet in Greece, Nicola, in his thirties uncertain about the future, and his ten-year-old brother Elia, together embark on a journey to Italy in search of a new language. guided by the need to give a name to things and to restore meaning to words. Along the way, the two record faces and places, painful realities and historical memories: thus their journey becomes a path of training and at the same time exploration of the imagination.
notes: Suspended on the border between documentary and fiction, the film tells the hopes of the country that will be.

title: Kosac
actors: Ivo Gregurevic, Mirjana Karanovic, Igor Kovac, Nikola Ristanovski, Lana Baric, Zlatko Buric, Dado Cosic, Peter Musevski, Davor Travinic, Erna Rudnicki
description: Three stories unfold over the course of a single night: each, for different reasons, has to do with Ivo, a worker with a dark past. Gradually, a portrait of the gloomy life of man and of the whole area of ??a small Croatian village blocked and imprisoned by the war will emerge.

title: David Bowie Is Happening Now
actors: Vicky Broackes, Geoffrey Marsh
description: 300 objects on display - films, photographs, handwritten texts, storyboards for videos, costume sketches and sets - make up the exhibition organized in the halls of the Victoria and Albert Museum in London in honor of David Bowie's fifty-year career. The exhibition thus becomes an opportunity to retrace the innumerable transformations and the music of a man able to leave his mark on pop culture, from music to fashion, from performance to design.

title: Lucia de B.
actors: Barry Atsma, Sallie Harmsen, Ariane Schluter, Fedja van Huêt, Annet Malherbe, Marwan Kenzari, Amanda Ooms, Bas Keijzer, Isis Cabolet, Marcel Musters
description: Lucia de Berk is an eccentric nurse who raises suspicions of justice when a few months old baby dies inexplicably. The case is only the latest in a long series and an investigation into Lucia begins conducted by the prosecutor Judith, obsessed with having the one whom the press now calls "the angel of death" be condemned.
notes: Based on a true story.

title: Äkta människor
actors: Lisette Pagler, Pia Halvorsen, Johan Paulsen, Natalie Minnevik, Kåre Hedebrant, Leif Andrée, Josephine Alhanko, Marie Robertson, Fredrik Silbersky, Anki Larsson
description: In a parallel present, the Androids called Hubot have become part of human everyday life but also began to originate new problems and dilemmas. For example, who is responsible for the actions of a hubot? What rights do the same hubots have? What rewards should they have for their work? Then when an ever -growing number of Hubot holds emotional relationships with humans, the boundaries between men and machines are confused, generating a further and thorny question: what does human really mean?

title: Una pallottola nel cuore: Il vero e il falso
actors: Gigi Proietti, Marco Marzocca, Francesca Inaudi, Licia Maglietta, Paola Minaccioni, Teco Celio, Franco Castellano, Luigi Petrucci, Chiara Mastalli, Valeria Cavalli, Blas Boca Rey, Riccardo Leonelli
description: A fire in a restoration laboratory causes the death of Roberto Grassi, a young but renowned owner of the business. The apparent cause appears to be accidental. Maddalena, looking for her first article as a reporter, arrives on the spot together with the deputy commissioner Enrico Vella. While trying to collect testimonies, Maddalena recognizes a girl, Violante Baldi Guarnieri, daughter of a noble Roman family, and discovers that she was a friend of the dead restorer. Thanks to her, he learns of a strange curse that has already claimed three victims. Intrigued by the story, the journalist Bruno Palmieri begins his investigation.

title: Abacuc
description: Abacuc, fat, silent and lonely, lives in a railway house whose garden is bordered by rails. He doesn't say a word, but distant voices come through the telephone receiver. His days are marked by walks to the cemetery, the only place of comfort that seems to be able to protect him from the city. Among the graves eaten by time, man wanders in search of lost names, which lead back to a world that is forever past.
notes: Characterized by the biting hand of Luca Ferri, a video artist born in 1976, Abacuc transports into a dreamlike dimension in which video, audio and text segment, chase and repeat, animated by the burning desire to say the unspeakable, filming the unspeakable .

title: La festa
actors: Lavinia Longhi, Marco Nugnes, Riccardo Cicogna, Simone Riccioni, Matilde Maggio, Thomas Cibelli, Roisin Grieco, Romolo Guerreri, Micol Donghi, Niccolò Gentili, Alessandra Sartania, Susanna Giaroli, Andrea Consonni, Vittoria Bocca Gelsi, Cinzia Monreale, Karl Zinny
description: Together with nine classmates, Giulia Crespi participates in a party in the country villa of one of them. Since that day, the group has been lost and no one knows what happened to the boys. Very soon a video delivered to family members will show what happened, revealing in a disturbing way a macabre elimination game linked to a story that happened many years ago.

title: Matisse Live
description: A tour through the halls of The Cut-outs exhibition at the Tate Modern in London and the MoMA in New York to discover Matisse. Forced by bowel cancer and a delicate surgery to use a wheelchair and give up painting, Matisse began in the latter part of his life to devote himself to "paintings with scissors", creating his famous collages, the art to which this exhibition is dedicated. The event at the cinema will thus reveal an intimate world and an exciting behind-the-scenes, to the artist's discovery of the "Joy of living", the "beast" who pushed the Impressionist principles to the extreme, transforming his paintings into a pure synthesis of lines and colors.
notes: Product full of excellent qualities for a television documentary, too bad that here we are at the cinema and we would like something more. The images do not give enough relevance to the works, there is no feeling that we would all expect in the darkness of the room: living a different, sensorial experience that makes us feel at one with the painting. The presenter, complete with a folder, puts the finishing touches on a film that does not deserve the honor of the big screen.

title: Ma vie de courgette
description: Zucchini is the intriguing nickname of a ten-year-old whose unique story is surprisingly universal. After the sudden death of his mother, Zucchina makes friends with a kind of police officer named Raymond and he is accompanied by him to a new foster home full of other orphans of his age. At first, Zucchina struggles to adapt to the new, strange and sometimes hostile environment, but will soon learn to trust and rediscover the love that only a family can give.

title: Bron/Broen - Season 2
actors: Kim Bodnia, Sofia Helin, Dag Malmberg, Rafael Pettersson, Lotte Andersen, Julia Ragnarsson, Lars Simonsen, Dar Salim, Camilla Bendix, Vickie Bak Laursen, Henrik Lundström, Johan Hedenbergh, Eva Fritjofson, Daniel Adolfsson, Fredrik Hiller, Tova Magnusson-Norling, Peter Christoffersen, Lotte Munk Fure, Alexander Öhrstrand
description: An old, out-of-control oil tanker heads straight for the Øresund Bridge, where the paths of detectives Saga Noren and Martin Rohde once joined. Although the coast guard tries to make contact with the ship, there is no response from the crew. Then when the soldiers reach the boat, it turns out that on board there are only three Swedes and two Danes chained below deck. Saga is immediately placed at the head of the case and, given the nationality of the people involved, Martin is once again supporting her. The two will be grappling with a case that will turn out to be much more complex and mysterious than they thought.

title: Best of Enemies
actors: Gore Vidal, John Lithgow, Kelsey Grammer, Dick Cavett, Noam Chomsky, Christopher Hitchens, Matt Tyrnauer, Brooke Gladstone, Sam Tanenhaus, Ginia Bellafante
description: In 1968 the legendary televised debates between the liberal Gore Vidal and the conservative William F. Buckley jr. they focused on the hot topics of their days, politics, religion and sex. Their explosive encounters have ended up irreversibly changing the way politicians express themselves through the mass media, making spectacles prevail more than arguments.

title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
actors: Nina Simone
description: Classically trained pianist, night club singer, Black Power icon and legendary artist, Nina Simone has lived a life of disarming honesty, musical genius and poignant melancholy. Thanks to recordings never released before and unpublished films, an unforgettable portrait of one of the least understood, although much loved, artists of the 20th century is built.

title: The Daughter
actors: Anna Torv, Geoffrey Rush, Sam Neill, Miranda Otto, Paul Schneider, Ewen Leslie, Nicholas Hope, Odessa Young, Ivy Mak, Kate Box
description: Christian returns to the family home for his father Henry's wedding, finding his childhood friend Olivier. Getting to know Olivier's wife, daughter and father, Christian uncovers a secret that could destroy his friend's family. Furious at the faults that his father also has and struggling with his own broken marriage, he slowly slips into a state of indignation and anger that will upset everyone's lives.

title: The Hateful Eight
actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Walton Goggins, Kurt Russell, Tim Roth, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Zoe Bell, Bruce Dern, Michael Madsen, Demián Bichir, Channing Tatum
description: A few years after the American Civil War, a stagecoach makes its way through Wyoming's winter landscape. The passengers, bounty hunter John Ruth (Kurt Russell) and fugitive Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh), are headed for the city of Red Rock, where the man, better known as "The Hangman", will deliver the wanted to the justice. Along the way, they meet two strangers: Major Marquis Warren (Samuel L. Jackson), a black former Union soldier who became a notorious bounty hunter, and Chris Mannix (Walter Goggins), a southern renegade who claims to be the new sheriff of town. Due to a snowstorm, the four are welcomed at a mountain refuge, where there are not the owners waiting for them, but four faces they have never seen before. Bob (Demian Bichir), the one who takes care of the place in the absence of the owner visiting his mother, is holed up there with the executioner Oswaldo Mobray (Tim Roth), with the cowboy Joe Cage (Michael Madsen) and with the Confederate general Sanford Smithers (Bruce Dern). As the storm rages, the eight travelers will learn how their destination isn't so easy to reach. Between betrayals and deceptions, they will have to try to survive the situation.

title: Il gesto delle mani
actors: Caled Saad, Luigi Contino, Simion Marius Costel, Mario Conti, Nicolae Ciortan, Elia Alunni Tullini, Velasco Vitali, Lino de Ponti, Tommaso Rossi, Ilaria Cuccagna
description: Even today, in order to create a bronze sculpture, it is necessary to resort to the same measures adopted in the 5th century BC for the realization of the Riace Bronzes. These gestures and passages are not taught in schools but are handed down from generation to generation among the artisans. They know this well at the historic Battaglia artistic foundry in Milan, where a group of specialized artisans have been working bronze with traditional methods for over a hundred years. The story of the creation process of the sculpture of a bronze dog by the artist Velasco Vitali shows the history of the foundry of yesterday and today.
notes: A tradition of noble craftsmanship, handed down through apprenticeships, guarded by the hands of the men that Clerici takes to work, on fixed floors without commentary or apparatus, making a rigorous and magnetic industrial film, or "techno-film". Clerici's work is positioned in a happy juncture (between document and visual work) by bending cinema, a young art, to the rhythms and sounds of a millenary art.

title: El botón de nácar
description: The ocean hides the history of all humanity. The sea contains all the voices of the Earth and of those who come from outer space. Water receives impulses from the stars and transmits them to living creatures. Water in Chile also holds the secret of two mysterious buttons that have been found on the ocean floor. Chile, with its 2,670 miles of coastline and the largest archipelago in the world, presents a supernatural landscape. In it are mountains, volcanoes and glaciers, which preserve the voices of the indigenous peoples of Patagonia, the first English sailors and political prisoners.

title: Al-Hob wa Al-Sariqa wa Mashakel Ukhra
actors: Sami Metwasi, Maya Abu Elhayat, Ramzi Maqdisi, Riyad Sliman, Kamel Basha, Hussein Nakhleh, Valantina Abu Osqa, Mustafa Abu Hanood, Nicola Zreineh, Mohammad Othman, Louise Heem, Alba Laipe Sira, Osama Awad, Nabil Hamouz
description: A Palestinian car thief faces the most difficult time of his life when he steals the wrong car. What he believed to be an Israeli car and an easy way to make money in his poor refugee camp will turn out to be his worst misfortune with the kidnapped Israeli soldier locked in the trunk.

title: Menuju rembulan
actors: Tara Basro, Ratu Anandita, Cornelio Sunny, Endang Sukeksi, Mila Rosinta Totoatmojo
description: Asa is the daughter of a seer. To escape the clutches of his mother, he lives hidden in the forest where he feeds on hunting and fishing. Following the death of her companion, Asa leaves the woods to take other paths and run into a dog, who turns out to be a man sent by his mother.
notes: Based on some ancient Indonesian legends.

title: Memory of the Camps
actors: Adolf Hitler
description: The cameramen of the English army film the horror they encounter once they enter the Nazi concentration camps.
notes: Unpublished document-truth by Alfred Hitchcock on the Nazi extermination camps, originally shot in 1945. Fifty minutes in black and white, forgotten for 60 years in the British military archives, with the horror of the concentration camps told live.

title: The Missing
actors: James Nesbitt, Frances O'Connor, Tchéky Karyo, Jason Flemyng, Emilie Dequenne, Said Taghmaoui, Titus De Voogdt, Eric Godon, Arsher Ali, Anastasia Hille
description: Tony is a man devastated by the kidnapping of his son Oliver, which happened in France during a family vacation. Unable to accept the idea that he may be dead, Tony engages in research for years, shattering Emily's marriage and destroying her entire life. Tony is not alone in believing that Oliver is alive: Julien, the French police detective who conducted the first investigations but now retired, is also convinced ...

title: Chronic
actors: Tim Roth, Bitsie Tulloch, Claire van der Boom, David Dastmalchian, Sarah Sutherland, Tate Ellington, Joe Santos, Michael Cristofer, Robin Bartlett, Nailea Norvind
description: David is a nurse who works with the terminally ill. Meticulous, efficient and dedicated to his profession, he establishes strong relationships with patients that go beyond simple assistance. In everyday life, however, David is ineffective, clumsy and lonely and for years he has been carrying a secret that makes him live with guilt and remorse. When the burden of the past becomes unbearable, David will have to face it once and for all in order to move forward.

title: Bang Gang
actors: Daisy Broom, Fred Hotier, Lorenzo Lefèbvre, Marilyn Lima, Finnegan Oldfield
description: Biarritz. Sixteen-year-old George, the most desired girl in high school, falls in love with Alex. To get his attention, start a party game with him, Nikita, Laetitia, and Gabriel. By discovering and testing themselves, they will test the limits of their sexuality. Between scandals, love and infringement of every system of values, they will manage the intense period each in a different way.

title: Oi entyposeis enos pnigmenou
actors: Thodoris Pentidis, Marisha Triantafyllidou, Christodoulos Martas
description: A man who doesn't know who he is meets an ex-lover of his. The woman reminds him that he is a famous existentialist poet named Kostas Karyotakis, who committed suicide in 1928 at the age of 32. Every year, the man returns for the anniversary of his death, a day he has relived dozens of times but which for once will lead him to make different decisions.

title: Among the Believers
description: The controversial Pakistani religious imam Maulana Aziz, linked to the Taliban, launches a jihad against the government to impose sharia law. The government reacts by destroying his seminary and killing his mother, brother, only child and 150 students from the Red Mosque. That of Maulana Aziz is the story of a man obstinate in pursuing the idea of ??creating an Islamic utopia, which causes the country to implosion and the iron opposition of the reformer Pervez Hoodbhoy.

title: King Jack
actors: Charlie Plummer, Cory Nichols, Christian Madsen, Danny Flaherty, Erin Davie, Chloe Levine, Keith Leonard, Yainis Ynoa, Melvin Mogoli, Meeko
description: Growing up in a small country town full of violent offenders, Jack has learned to do what it takes to survive, despite having a mother unaware of what's happening to him and no father. After his aunt falls ill and his younger cousin moves to live with him, 15-year-old Jack discovers the importance of friendship, family and the pursuit of happiness even in the most desolate of circumstances.

title: Rocco tiene tu nombre
actors: Michele Venitucci, Fabio Ferri, Valentina Carnelutti, Carla Lladó, Patrizia Barbieri, David González Pérez, Andrea Concotelli, Leonardo Brunelli, Olga Guerra Delgado, Marina Esteve, Esther Cuspinera, Xavier Capdet
description: On a day like so many others in Bobo Benso's life, something breaks the routine: a stranger settles into his home, takes up his job and visits his friends and his woman, saying his name is Rocco. Bobo gradually discovers that he has been invaded, excluded and expelled from his own life, finding himself in no man's land, where the marginalized of the world live.

title: Jambareeqi Reviews: King of Thorn
actors: Jambareeqi, Sohail SullaDon Shah
description: A powerful virus called Medusa, with a mortal potential of one hundred percent, whose final effects are the petrification of the body, has annihilated most of the terrestrial population. A multinational, Venus Gate, offers itself for the salvation of one hundred and sixty lucky ones, destined to be cryogenized and awakened in the future where there is a possible cure for the virus. They will awaken in the same place, completely destroyed and wrapped in gigantic brambles. They will also have to defend themselves from terrible carnivorous monsters.
notes: Based on the manga of Yuji Iwahara and produced by Sunrise in 2009. A survival horror freely inspired by the fairy tale of the sleeping beauty in the woods.

title: Zero a zero
description: The story of three boys who played in the youth teams of As Roma Calcio but saw the dream of making their debut in the top category vanish.

title: Fuorigioco
actors: Toni Garrani, Crescenza Guarnieri, Nicola Pistoia, Azzurra Rocchi, Maurizio Bianucci, Denny Cecchini, Nadia Visintainer, Enrico Licata
description: Gregorio Samsa, a company manager with full experience and professional competence, is fired. Like so many others in his situation, he suddenly finds himself losing his role in society and even himself with work. Reinforcing his obsession with being the victim of a conspiracy, he considers the dismissal a huge mistake and is willing to do anything to get his job back. Attracted by the beauty of a girl who lives in front of her apartment, he spends his days spying on her, while the outside world roars into the house through the television set on.
notes: On an interesting narrative basis, the film dangerously derails into visionary excesses, into exhibited voyeurisms, into characterizations that slip into involuntary speck, into details that simulate the grotesque, into flashes that veer towards a white hell. Of the daily war, of the descent towards madness, only opaque resonant echoes remain: the noises of the street, of the TV on. It was preferred to show them with strong colors. Only creating a strong imbalance.

title: Jag är Ingrid
actors: Ingrid Bergman, Isabella Rossellini, Roberto Rossellini, Pia Lindström
description: Through unpublished films, notes, letters, diaries and interviews with her children and former colleagues, the documentary celebrates the myth of Ingrid Bergman by offering a personal portrait of her that goes beyond her being a diva and that focuses on the extraordinary life of a girl Swedish able to become one of the most loved and famous actresses of American cinema. Three times Oscar winner and popular face of the golden age of Hollywood, Bergman has participated in numerous masterpieces of the history of cinema directed by masters such as David O. Selznick, Alfred Hthcock, Sidney Lumet and Roberto Rossellini.
notes: Io sono Ingrid is not a job for curious cinephile anecdotes or unpublished private details: Hitchcock, Curtiz, Selznick, McCarey, Renoir, Donen and (Ingmar) Bergman are little more than a footnote in the autobiography of a restless woman and determined, very shy in life but in love with the look of the mdp, and always committed to challenge each other.

title: Nahid
actors: Sareh Bayat, Pejman Bazeghi, Navid Mohammadzadeh, Milad Hasanpour, Pouria Rahimi, Nasrin Babaei
description: A divorced young woman who lives with her son in a small northern Iranian town falls in love with a man who wants to marry her. Under the current rules, custody of the child rests with the father but the ex-husband allowed her to keep him with her as long as she did not remarry. Struggling not to lose her son and future husband, the woman is forced to think about a third escape route: temporary marriage. While legal, this option is not well received by the rest of society.

title: 0.5 mm
actors: Sakura Andô, Miyoko Asada, Bengal, Akira Emoto, Midori Kinouchi, Mitsuko Kusabue, Junkichi Orimoto, Toshio Sakata, Nozomi Tsuchiya, Masahiko Tsugawa
description: Sawa Yamagishi worked as a caregiver. An elderly man's family asked her to sleep with him which led to her losing her job and home. With nowhere to go, Sawa finds seniors in distress and gets involved in their lives, in a dating game that will improve everyone's lives.

title: Drown
actors: Matt Levett, Jack Matthews, Harry Cook, Lucy Green, Jessina Oakes, Meg McDermott, Kimberly Lim, Robin Gonnella, Kate Ryerson, Maya Stange
description: Lifeguard Len, a surf champion with a sculptural body and alpha male, is everyone's idol. When Phil arrives in the team, handsome as the sun and moreover gay, the sporting competition becomes aversion and hatred. The test of strength is measured not on the physical but on the fear of admitting who you really are.

title: El Abrazo de la Serpiente
actors: Brionne Davis, Jan Bijvoet, Luigi Sciamanna, Nilbio Torres, Antonio Bolivar, Nicolás Cancino, Yauenkü Migue
description: Karamakate, an Amazonian shaman and the last survivor of his people, lives alone deep in the jungle. Deprived of emotions and memories, he sees his life change when Evan, an American ethnobotanist, arrives in his lair in search of the yakruna, a mysterious hallucinogenic plant capable of making those who take it dream. Karamakate then decides to join his quest and the two embark on a journey to the heart of the forest.

title: Animali nella grande guerra
description: In the First World War, an army of animals fought alongside men. Mules, oxen, dogs, horses, pigs, pigeons were used for the movement of departments and materials, for communications and for the sustenance of the troops. The forced cohabitation with men brought them closer to each other in a possible destiny of death and suffering: officers and enlisted soldiers thus had the possibility of giving and receiving affection, but also that of dealing with weaker beings and completely dependent on them. . During the Great War the animals not only "fought" in close contact with the soldier, but also actively contributed to the feeding of several tens of millions of soldiers.
notes: The tone is empathetic but effective, even if some redundancy is inevitable. The imprint, on the other hand, is strongly televised: there is no cinematic thought or any form of infringement of traditional syntax. Repertory images dominate (especially the Luce documents, alternating with film sequences), supported by some modern reconstructions and short interviews that interrupt the constant narrator.

title: Iona
actors: Ruth Negga, Douglas Henshall, Tom Brooke, Michelle Duncan, Jim Sturgeon, Matthew Zajac, Sorcha Groundsell, Ben Gallagher
description: Named after the island where she was born, Iona returns to the places where she grew up with her teenage son Bull to seek refuge following a violent crime in Glasglow. The return, however, exposes Bull to a lifestyle that she herself had rejected as a young girl by leaving there.

title: Extraordinary Tales
description: Five different stories by Edgar Allan Poe are staged in unique segments inspired by the work of those designers and visual artists who best expressed the psychological and complex depth of the writer's dark universe. Animation techniques and styles used vary from story to story.

title: La Tortue rouge
description: A man abandoned on a desert island tries desperately to escape. But one day, he meets a strange turtle that will change the rest of his life forever.

title: Avril et le monde truqué
description: 1941. Napoleon V reigns over France when scientists begin to mysteriously disappear. Deprived of modern technology, the world is ruled by coal-fired power and steam. Avril, a girl, sets out in search of her parents, missing scientists, in the company of Darwin, her talking cat, and Julius, a young rascal. The trio will have to face dangers and mysteries to find out what mystery and what reason lies behind the disappearances.

title: Terra
directors: Marco De Angelis, Antonio Di Trapani
actors: Hal Yamanouchi, Angela Carbone, Luigi Iacuzio, Lou Castel, Franco Nero, Hélène Sevaux, Andrei Shchetinin, Banchiayeho Girma, Júlio Bressane
description: A mysterious cosmic force threatens to end life on Earth. Only a traveler from other worlds knows the fate of humanity. He leads us, as in a journey, through testimonies of the passage of man on Earth: ruins of the past and contemporary dimension, distant glories and technological news, space flights, lost beauties, ancient and present faces follow one another symphonically in the alternation of images documentaries, archival materials, vintage photos. And while men's dreams are altered, various stories intertwine, united in the expectation of a destiny that perhaps can still be changed.

title: Too Late
actors: John Hawkes, Crystal Reed, Dichen Lachman, Natalie Zea, Jeff Fahey, Rider Strong, Joanna Cassidy, Robert Forster, Dash Mihok, Sydney Tamiia Poitier
description: Los Angeles private investigator Mel Sampson is tasked with tracking down a missing woman who belonged to his past. In this way, while working on the case, he has the opportunity to cross the paths of eccentric individuals and lost souls. By searching for the missing woman, Mel will have a chance to find himself.

title: Schau mich nicht so an
actors: Uisenma Borchu, Catrina Stemmer, Josef Bierbichler, Anne-Marie Weisz, Katja Brenner, Andreas Karl, Rasmus Max Wirth
description: Iva is a single mother of a five-year-old girl and Hedi is her new neighbor. Iva falls madly in love with Hedi and the two women start a relationship. When Iva's father appears out of the blue, Hedi feels strongly drawn to him. For Hedi it seems that there is no other world than his.

title: The Suicide Theory
actors: Steve Mouzakis, Leon Cain, Joss McWilliam, Matthew Scully, Todd Levi, Nicholas G. Cooper, Warwick Comber, Erin Connor, Chris Bartholomew, Ron Kelly
description: Steven Ray has never been normal but when Annie, the love of his life, is the victim of a fatal accident, his violent and bizarre behavior becomes uncontrollable. Soon, on the steps of a new murder to be carried out, he runs into Percival, an would-be suicide whose launch from a building did not produce the desired results. The meeting between the two causes Percival, tired of the futile attempts to end his existence, hires Steven to help him die. After Percival resists every attempt on his life, Steven also begins to believe that the desperate is the victim of a strange curse.

title: Tikkun
actors: Aharon Traitel, Khalifa Natour, Riki Blich, Gur Sheinberg, Omri Fuhrer
description: Haim-Aaron is a bright ultra-Orthodox student of religion living in Jerusalem. His talent and devotion are envied by all but one evening, after a fast run, Haim-Aaron loses consciousness. The paramedics announce his death but the father does not resign himself to this hypothesis, causing the son to resume living. The accident, however, makes the young man apathetic to his studies and makes him feel overwhelmed by the idea that God wanted to test him. Likewise, the father is tormented by the idea that he defied God's will the night he saved Haim-Aaron.

title: Le Dernier jour de Rabin
actors: Yaël Abecassis, Yogev Yefet, Miki Varshaviak, Mali Levy, Liron Levo, Tomer Sisley
description: On the evening of November 4, 1995, Labor Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin was killed with three bullets at the end of a political demonstration in central Tel Aviv. Her killer, arrested at the crime scene, is a 25-year-old practicing Jew. The investigation of the murder soon reveals a dark and frightened world, in which the attack has matured, fueled by hysterical rhetoric, paranoia and political intrigue.

title: Meurtrière
actors: Hélène Rocheteau, Emilia Giudicelli, Vilma Pitrinaite, Francesca Ziviani
description: Second movement of a triptych, created by French director Philippe Grandrieux, which develops on multiple platforms (video-installations, performances, films) and has restlessness as its subject.
notes: Sequel to White Epilepsy: The main theme of the film is "Das Ding", the Thing by Jacques Lacan. Using the words of Grandrieux himself, "Meurtrière is at the extreme of what can be shown and seen."

title: De Palma
actors: Brian De Palma
description: For the first time, director Brian De Palma overcomes his reluctance to tell his life and career in depth.

title: He Named Me Malala
actors: Malala Yousafzai
description: An intimate portrait of Malala Yousafzai, one of the girls injured following an armed attack by a Taliban group on a school bus in the Swat Valley in Pakistan. The then 15-year-old, targeted for talking about girls' right to education, was shot in the head, sparking the outrage of the international media. Having since become a symbol of children's rights around the world, Malala was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in December 2014.
notes: The documentary has the undisputed merit of making Malala's story circulate on other circuits but it is difficult to refrain from reflecting on the cinematic ways in which this objective is pursued. She, Malala, is a "force of nature" but the hagiography with which she is treated damages the profound and contemporary value of her story.

title: Tempête
actors: Dominique Leborne, Matteo Leborne, Mailys Leborne
description: Dom is a sailor aboard the Alf, a fishing vessel that usually leaves the port of Les Sables d'Olonne for three weeks on the open sea. After the divorce a year earlier, he lives with his daughter Mailys and son Matteo, who preferred him despite his absences. When Mailys becomes pregnant, Dom realizes she has to make a choice.

title: Riaru onigokko
actors: Reina Triendl, Mariko Shinoda, Erina Mano, Mika Akizuki, Urara Aryû, Mao Asô, Nanami Hidaka, Aki Hiraoka, Rin Honoka, Hikaru Horiguchi
description: Two buses full of cheering schoolgirls drive along a country road. Mitsuko is the only one who sits quietly and writes poetry. But when he bends down to pick up a pencil, something unthinkable happens: both vehicles are cut in half by an invisible entity, causing a massacre. Having managed to escape, Mitsuko finds herself in her school, surrounded by her classmates who act as if nothing had happened. Was he dreaming or hallucinating? Or is it trapped in a parallel dimension?

title: Psiconautas
description: Teenagers Birdboy and Dinki have decided to escape from an island devastated by an ecological catastrophe: Birdboy estranging himself from the world, Dinki planning a dangerous journey in the hope that Birdboy will accompany him.

title: Under Sandet
actors: Roland Møller, Mikkel Boe Følsgaard, Laura Bro, Louis Hofmann, Joel Basman, Oskar Bökelmann, Emil Buschow, Oskar Buschow, Leon Seidel, Karl Alexander Seidel
description: World War II ended when a group of German POWs are captured by the Danish army. Still boys and not yet men, the prisoners are forced into a new kind of service under the command of a brusque Danish sergeant. Risking their lives, they will find that the conflict is far from over.

title: Being Charlie
actors: Nick Robinson, Morgan Saylor, Devon Bostick, Cary Elwes, Susan Misner, Common, Ricardo Chavira, Jared Shipley, Christopher Robin Miller, Austin R. Grant
description: 18-year-old Charlie is a sharp-tongued addict struggling to get home. The father tries to limit his choices as he runs for the office of governor of California, getting into conflict with his wife. Soon, Charlie agrees to work on a new adult rehabilitation center program, where he meets a handful of misfits such as beautiful Eva and Travis. Charlie's inner battles will, however, be called upon to confront the envy he will feel for his best friend and his new addiction to Eve.

title: Holiday Spin
actors: Garrett Clayton, Allie Bertram, Ralph Macchio, Karen Olivo, Benji Schwimmer, Erika Eleniak, Julia Harnett, Nathalie Heath, Mackenzie Green, Isaiah Adam, Ludi Lin
description: Blake and mother Roxy live in Charlotte, where she has a dance studio and the young man dreams of pursuing a career as a fighter. On the eve of Thanksgiving, a terrible car accident kills Roxy and leaves Blake seriously injured. After recovering, Blake receives a visit from his father Ruben, ready to take him with him to Miami. Because he can't live alone at 17, Blake has no choice but to agree to move in with the man who abandoned him as a child. Ruben and his wife Emily run a dance studio that is not in very good financial condition. Although he has never danced in his life, Blake will decide to engage with the dancer Pia and win an important competition that takes place every year before Christmas.

title: Eiga: minna! Esupâ da yo!
actors: Shôta Sometani, Elaiza Ikeda, Erina Mano
description: Psychics, young people with extraordinary extraordinary powers, pop up almost everywhere in the city of Tokyo and, like Yoshiro, they are all virgins. Following the appearance of a mysterious group that generates erotic terrorism, Yoshiro to impress the girl of his dreams decides to use his psychic abilities to save the world from rampant chaos.
notes: Adaptation of the manga of the same name.

title: Ridendo e scherzando
actors: Ettore Scola, Pierfrancesco Diliberto
description: Paola and Silva Scola talk about their father Ettore - director, screenwriter, designer, humorist, intellectual, militant - trying to use his key, that of his cinema: talking about serious things without being noticed, making people laugh. Through the interviews he has released over the course of his life, the excerpts from his films, and what he wanted to tell us 'live', a sort of self-story emerges in which he confronts Pif, who he acts as an interviewer, narrator, reader, hagiographer, guide, shoulder and, if necessary, also as a caregiver.

title: Agassi
actors: Jung-woo Ha, Min-hee Kim, Jin-woong Jo, Tae Ri Kim
description: In the thirties in Korea, during the Japanese colonization, the young Sookee is hired as a maid for the rich Japanese Hideko, who lives in seclusion in a huge palace under the control of her tyrannical uncle. But Sookee has a secret: with the help of a scammer who passes himself off as a Japanese count, he has other plans for Hideko in mind ...
notes: Adaptation of the novel Thief by Sarah Waters.

title: I, Daniel Blake
actors: Dave Johns, Hayley Squires, Brianna Shann, Dylan Mckiernan, Kema Sikazwe
description: 59-year-old Daniel Blake worked as a carpenter most of his life in the North East of England. For the first time in his life, he needs state aid due to an illness when along his way he runs into Rachel, the single mother of little Daisy and Charlie. Rachel's only chance of having a roof to live under is an apartment 500km from where she lives. Both Daniel and Rachel find themselves in a no-man's land, trapped by the rigors of a bureaucracy that feels no reason.

title: Sexxx
description: Starting from the show of the same name conceived by the eclectic choreographer Matteo Levaggi, staged in 2013 at the Lavanderia a Vapore in Collegno and at the Elfo Puccini Theater in Milan, and focused on the body, Davide Ferrario constructs a sinuous, pressing reflection on the body and on the look.

title: A cambio de nada
actors: Miguel Herrán, Antonio Bachiller, Antonia Guzmán, Felipe Vélez, Luis Tosar, María Miguel, Miguel Rellán, Adelfa Calvo, Patricia Santos, Iris Alpáñez
description: Darío runs away from home to escape family hell. Luismi, his best friend, Caralimpia, a poor devil, and Antonia, an old woman who collects abandoned furniture, become his new family. Three generations meet in a city too big to be alone.

title: Zero Days
description: How safe are you on the internet against cybercrime and cyber espionage? In the Facebook developers' headquarters every day, hackers, criminal activity and unauthorized intrusions from all over the world are fought. Like the Stuxnet virus, which in 2010 spread beyond the real intentions for which it was designed by the governments of the United States and Israel.

title: Já, Olga Hepnarová
actors: Michalina Olszanska, Ondrej Malý, Marika Soposká, Lukás Bech, Marta Mazurek, Zuzana Stavná, Petra Nesvacilová, Juraj Nvota, Klára Melísková, Gabriela Mícová
description: The story of Olga Hepnarova, a lonely lesbian outsider, is that of a single person who opposes the majority, a story in which no one wins and no one is defeated. Attracted by loneliness or perhaps simply failed, Olga faces chilling consequences in a historical period of relativization of fundamental values ??in Czechoslovakia.
notes: Inspired by real events.

title: Théo et Hugo dans le même bateau
actors: François Nambot, Geoffrey Couet, Mario Fanfani, Bastien Gabriel, Miguel Ferreira, Arthur Dumas, Éric Dehak, Patrick Joseph, Élodie Adler
description: In a sex club, Théo and Hugo meet, recognize each other and merge into a passionate embrace. After the explosion of desire and excitement of that first moment, the two young men face their nascent love on the empty streets of Paris at night.

title: Mapplethorpe: Look at the Pictures
description: An examination of the scandalous life of photographer Robert Mapplethorpe conducted through extracts from interviews in which the artist himself speaks with unsettling honesty about his passions. Mapplethorpe's words are echoed by the intimate revelations of friends, relatives and lovers, which shed new light on a personality capable of unleashing a culture war that is anything but dormant more than 25 years after his death.

title: Le fils de Jean
actors: Pierre Deladonchamps, Gabriel Arcand, Pierre-Yves Cardinal, Romane Portail, Catherine de Léan, Marie-Thérèse Fortin, Patrick Hivon, Valérie Cadieux, Jean-Pierre Andréani, Martin Laroche
description: Mathieu is 35 years old, lives in Paris and has never met his father. His mother has always told him that he is the result of a chance encounter but, one day, Mathieu discovers through a phone call that his father was Canadian and that he has just died. He also discovers that he has two half-brothers and decides to go to his parent's funeral to meet them. Once in Montreal, however, he realizes that no one is aware of his existence nor is interested in him. He thus finds himself alone in an environment that is completely hostile to him.

title: Es esmu seit
actors: Elina Vaska, Andzejs Lilientals, Edgars Samitis, Zane Jancevska
description: To avoid losing the house they live in, 17-year-old Raya and her younger brother keep their grandmother's death a secret. Raya searches the books for all the tricks that can make her seem alive while in the meantime indulges in her feelings for her English teacher. Despite her best efforts, things will soon spiral out of control and Raya can only hope for her mother's help in faraway London.

title: Aloys
actors: Georg Friedrich, Tilde von Overbeck, Kamil Krejcí, Yufei Li, Koi Lee, Sebastian Krähenbühl, Karl Friedrich, Peter Zumstein, Agnes Lampkin, Rahel Hubacher
description: A lonely private investigator falls in love with a mysterious woman who left him a disturbing message. Thus begins a dark and magical journey for him that will help him find the courage to come out of his isolation.

title: Malgré la nuit
actors: Ariane Labed, Roxane Mesquida, Kristian Marr, Paul Hamy, Wyatt Alexander, Pascal Bianco-Levrin de Bouzid, Christopher Buchholz, Gabrielle Lazure, Johan Leysen, Sam Louwyck
description: Young Lenz returns from England to Paris with the aim of tracking down his beloved Madeleine. In his place, however, he finds Helena and Lena with destructive consequences.

title: Tempestad
description: The voices of two women echo on the landscape and on the highways of Mexico, from north to south. They tell of corruption, injustice and violence, elements that have taken control of their lives, desires and dreams. Miriam one morning is arrested with the false accusation of being a trafficker of human beings, meeting atrocious suffering during his imprisonment. Adela, on the other hand, works as a clown in an itinerant circus but his life is no longer the same since ten years before his daughter has disappeared.

title: An Inspector Calls
actors: Sophie Rundle, Lucy Chappell, Miranda Richardson, Ken Stott, Finn Cole, Chloe Pirrie, Kyle Soller, David Thewlis, Flora Nicholson, Gary Davis
description: During one night in 1912, a police inspector goes to the villa of a wealthy and influential family to investigate the suicide of a young woman. Thus begins an accurate reconstruction of events to try to understand the reasons for the deceased's gesture.

title: Chu Tai Chiu Fung
directors: Frank Hui, Jevons Au Man-Kit, Vicky Wong
actors: Ka Tung Lam, Richie Jen, Jordan Chan, Kwong Leung Wong, Fung Woo, Ngok Elliot
description: Hong Kong, summer 1997. While preparations are underway for the British Crown's handover of the colony to China, it is not easy for the criminal world to adapt to the profound changes underway. With the opening of the border, new codes and customs make their way into the world of the triads and those who do not conform to the new way of doing business have lost from the start. Three gangsters destined to become victims of their own legends are well aware of this: brought by chance to the same restaurant on the Chinese side of the border, they are suspected of planning a coup d'état together.

title: Ilegitim
actors: Alina Grigore, Adrian Titieni, Robi Urs, Cristina Olteanu, Miruna Butanche, Bogdan Albulescu, Liviu Vizitiu, Liviu Florescu, Adrian Iacov, Ayrton P. Bryan
description: Sitting at the table with his four adult children and their partners, the widower Victor appreciates his role as patriarch of the family. Everything proceeds quietly until his son Cosma confronts him by asking him why his name appears in documents that testify how he denounced the women who fought against the abortion ban in force until 1989. Victor tries to defend himself but his convictions and explanations are put to the test when daughter Sasha reveals she is pregnant.

title: Slava
actors: Stefan Denolyubov, Margita Gosheva
description: Petrov is a railway worker who finds millions of Bulgarian conscripts in cash on the tracks. He decides to take the entire sum to the police and the state rewards him with a new wristwatch, which soon stops working. Meanwhile, Julia Staykova, head of the public relations office of the Ministry of Transport, loses Petrov's old clock. Thus begins a desperate struggle for man to get back the clock but also his dignity.

title: Les derniers parisiens
actors: Reda Kateb, Slimane Dazi, Elisa Bachir Bey, Yassine Azzouz
description: Two brothers, one of whom just released from prison and seeking social reintegration, compete for a nightclub located in the popular Pigalle district, a few meters from the Moulin Rouge.

title: The Last Laugh
actors: Mel Brooks, Sarah Silverman, Louis C.K., Joan Rivers, Chris Rock, Abe Foxman
description: What is funny and what is not when joking about a serious subject like the Holocaust? Through interviews and performances by artists who wonder about the issue, we investigate what is the limit to which we can go when dealing with the theme in a comic key.

title: Maudie
actors: Ethan Hawke, Sally Hawkins, Kari Matchett, Gabrielle Rose, Billy MacLellan, Nik Sexton
description: Lonely Everett Lewis hires fragile but determined Maudie as housekeeper. With bright but bent eyes and misshapen hands, Maudie just wants to be independent, live away from her overprotective family and passionately dedicate herself to creating art. Unexpectedly, Everett finds himself falling in love with Maudie as she starts with great surprise to become a very popular painter.
notes: Based on a true story.

title: Risk
actors: Julian Assange, Sarah Harrison, Jacob Appelbaum
description: In 2010, Julian Assange, controversial founder of WikiLeaks, spoke on the phone with a lawyer in Hillary Clinton's state department about the imminent going online of a massive amount of confidential documents. Thus begins the path that leads Assange to be accused of espionage and to seek political asylum at the Ecuadorian embassy in London as he was persecuted in June 2012.

title: Il fiume ha sempre ragione
description: Just like Johannes Gutenberg, Alberto Casiraghy ??has transformed his house in Osnago into a real publishing “workshop”: with an old movable type machine he prints small and precious books of poems and aphorisms. Not far away, across the Swiss border, Josef Weiss combines the sensitivity of the graphic designer with the technique of the restorer to create his artistic editions.
notes: Silvio Soldini returns a realistic and poetic portrait of two artist-craftsmen who have chosen to do an ancient craft in a modern world, and have achieved the greatest success. Learn to weave the most eternal of spells, that of words.

title: Al di qua
description: A homeless man dies on the street in his bed. About forty free friends Marciano United in the hospital where he gravitated, to make him the extreme greeting.

title: Un paese di Calabria
description: Riace: a country from which young people fled to build their future elsewhere, leaving behind abandoned houses and a village of old people. Doomed to die? Maybe not. Because in the meantime, waves of migrants fleeing war and poverty have begun to land on the Calabrian coasts and those landings, which many see as a danger, have become the hope of a rebirth for Riace.
notes: The story of an administration and a citizenship that have been able to look far ahead, making hospitality and integration a mission. A story made up of people, transplanted lives and popular devotion, political commitment and the fight against the Ndrangheta. The chronicle of a courageous transformation guided by one principle: nobody saves himself alone.

title: Geumul
actors: Ryoo Seung-bum, Lee Won-gun, Kim Young-min, Choi Guy-hwa
description: The engine of a North Korean fisherman's boat breaks down and the hull travels adrift towards South Korea. Once he arrives in the enemy nation and after enduring brutal investigations, the man is sent back to the North but before leaving he realizes that how different the South is from the image of "developed" land it had in mind and how economic progress does not guarantee happiness to the people. Once he is repatriated, he then undergoes identical treatment by the Northern police.

title: Louise en hiver
description: At the end of the summer, the elderly Louise sees the last train of the season leaving the station of the small town of Biligen without her. The city is deserted, time passes quickly and high tides condemn the population to remain without light and without means of communication. Delicate and graceful, Louise may not survive the winter but she is not afraid of what lies ahead. After all, he knows how to manage the elements of nature and loneliness in order to survive. Memories will soon take over and an unexpected "friend" will come to keep her company.

title: Rippu van winkuru no hanayome
actors: Haru Kuroki, Cocco, Gô Ayano, Sôkô Wada, Tomoko Mariya, Hideko Hara, Hyunri, Go Jibiki, Akio Kaneda, Kazuaki Kiriya
description: Nanami, a young man with no relatives - apart from divorced parents - is a high school teacher engaged to a man she met on social media. As the wedding approaches, she needs to find her share of guests. He finds the help of Amuro, who hires a group of actors to play the part of his family. Once married, Nanami leaves teaching for a home life but her peaceful existence is shattered by the return of Amuro, who tells her of her husband's betrayal. With a rapidly disintegrating marriage, Namani finds herself single again and in desperate need of money. Once again it will be Amuro who comes to her rescue, finding her a job as a maid in a beautiful almost empty villa, inhabited by the caretaker Mashiro and populated by a variety of poisonous marine creatures. Over time, Nanami and Mashiro's relationship will take an unexpected direction.

title: Ucitelka
actors: Ondrej Malý, Ina Gogalova, Lukas Pelc, Zuzana Mauréry, Peter Bebjak, Csongor Kassai, Zuzana Konecná, Tamara Fischer, Martin Havelka, Monika Certezni
description: In early 1980s Czechoslovakia, a school principal holds a special meeting of parents. Charges have been made against Ms. Drazdechova, a seemingly empathetic, kind, and lovable teacher guilty of using her students to manipulate their parents into remedying little manual aids, material comforts, and even a romance. In opposing the unscrupulous teacher, parents will have to fight against her non-compliant but dominant way of doing things.

title: One More Time with Feeling
actors: Nick Cave
description: Nick Cave & The Bad Seeds perform songs from the Skeleton Tree album, released in September 2016 for the first time.
notes: The photographic style of the film - shot in black and white, in color and in 3D - reflects the intimacy and austerity of the album, a raw and fragile testimony of an artist who tries to find his way through the darkness. Live performances of the new songs are intertwined with interviews and filming by Dominik, accompanied by the intermittent narration and by Cave's impromptu improvisations and reflections that create an engaging, intense and elegant experience.

title: Sekai kara neko ga kietanara
actors: Gaku Hamada, Mieko Harada, Anna Ishii, Aoi Miyazaki, Eiji Okuda, Eita Okuno, Takeru Sato
description: In a suggestive corner of the Japanese countryside, an apathetic 30-year-old postman lives alone with his cat. His peace of mind is shattered when the doctor tells him that he still has a few days to live due to a brain tumor. Desperate, the young man receives a visit from the devil who offers him a pact: he will extend his life day by day as long as he accepts the disappearance of certain elements or things and the memories and feelings connected to them. The postman accepts but soon he will realize that it is above all things strictly related to the people he loves that are erased forever.

title: Tower
actors: Violett Beane, Blair Jackson, Josephine McAdam, Reece Everett Ryan
description: On the morning of August 1, 1966, the University of Texas campus in Austin suddenly became a place of fear and horror. A heavily armed psychopath positioned himself in a privileged place of observation (the clock tower) and started shooting at anyone who came in his sights. He ultimately killed 16 people and injured three dozen before being caught and killed himself. The killer was Charles Whitman, a 25-year-old former Marine. Voiceovers, animations, photographs and interviews with survivors retrace the story almost in real time.

title: Rai
actors: Yuliya Vysotskaya, Christian Clauss, Philippe Duquesne, Peter Kurth, Jakob Diehl, Viktor Sukhorukov, Vera Voronkova, Jean Denis Römer, Caroline Piette
description: The paths of three different people cross at a terrible time of the Second World War. Olga is a Russian emigrant aristocrat and member of the French Resistance; Jules, on the other hand, is a French collaborator while Helmut is a senior German SS officer. Olga is soon arrested for hiding Jewish children during a raid. Jules is in charge of her case and is attracted to her. When Jules is killed by Resistance fighters, Olga ends up in a concentration camp. Here she sees Helmut, once madly in love with her. Thus begins a twisted and destructive relationship.

title: I Called Him Morgan
description: On a snowy night in February 1972, famous jazz musician Lee Morgan was shot dead by his wife Helen during a concert in a New York club. The murder created a shock wave across the jazz world.

title: Dawson City: Frozen Time
description: About 500 films dating from the period between 1910 and 1920, believed to have been lost for over 50 years, are rediscovered in the depths of a sub-Arctic pool in the Yukon Territory, in Dawson City, 350 miles south of the North Pole. Using archival footage to tell the story of the discovery, we have a singular portrait of the life cycle of a Canadian citizen.

title: Bozzetto non troppo
actors: Bruno Bozzetto
description: #A portrait of the legendary Italian animator Bruno Bozzetto, the creator of masterpieces such as West and Soda, Vip - My brother Superman, Allegro non Troppo and one of the most famous characters of our cinema: Mr. Rossi. An international master, winner of the Golden Bear in Berlin, nominated for an Oscar and honored by the Walt Disney Museum, and of which John Lasseter, the creative director of Disney-Pixar. he confessed his admiration and influence on his work.

title: Le Ciel Flamand
actors: Sara Vertongen, Wim Willaert, Esra Vandenbussche, Ingrid De Vos, Isabelle van Hecke, Tom Ternest, Naima Rodric, Serge Larivière, Mathias Sercu, Frédéric Gibilaro
description: A look at the life of three generations of women. Monique and her daughter Sylvie run a brothel on the border between West Flanders and France. Eline, Sylvie's six-year-old daughter, is fascinated by her mother and grandmother's mysterious workplace but she is not allowed to cross the threshold. A dramatic event will disrupt their lives, putting pressure on any family ties.

title: Le concours
description: At Fémis, the Paris film school, daily life is marked by a specific republican ideal of excellence, which can be summed up in one sentence: everyone is equal but only the best are admitted. Through the entrance exams, the one-year course and the diploma exams, the relationship with excellence in the art world and one of the most prestigious art schools in France, a place of culture in which several generations mix.

title: Into the Inferno
description: Director Werner Herzog teams up with volcanologist Clive Oppenheimer for a world tour on the trail of some of the most dangerous volcanoes on the planet. Stopping in Indonesia, Ethiopia, Iceland and North Korea, he wonders about the eruptions and their dangers but also about the philosophical meaning connected to them.

title: Rats
description: Present in large numbers all over the world, mice are the most insidious parasites of mankind. Carriers of disease, death and psychological trauma, they often come face to face with exterminators, farmers, scientists and even cooks.

title: Fixeur
actors: Tudor Istodor, Mehdi Nebbou, Nicolas Wanczycki, Diana Spatarescu, Sorin Cocis, Adrian Titieni, Andreea Vasile
description: A sensational sex scandal offers a young Romanian trainee a great chance to make a career in the world of French journalism.

title: Marvin
actors: Finnegan Oldfield, Grégory Gadebois, Vincent Macaigne, Catherine Salée, Catherine Mouchet, Isabelle Huppert, Charles Berling, Jules Porier
description: Martin Clément, born Marvin Bijou, fled his native village in the Vosges and his family who did not accept his "diversity". Against all odds, along the way, he found someone who believed in him and his potential in the theater. He himself tells his story in a play that, beyond its success, will eventually transform it.
notes: Adaptation of the autobiographical novel En finir avec Eddy Bellegueule by Edouard Louis.

title: Taekwondo
actors: Gabriel Epstein, Lucas Papa, Nicolás Barsoff, Francisco Bertín, Arturo Frutos, Andrés Gavaldá, Juan Manuel Martino, Darío Miño, Gaston Re
description: Fernando invites his friends on a male-only vacation in a quaint country house around Buenos Aires.
