Free from work, responsibilities and girlfriends, friends relax by the pool, sunbathe and share stories of their love affairs. They have all known each other for years but Fernando brought with him the unknown German, a friend of his taekwondo class, not revealing to anyone that he is gay. As the days go by, the bond between Fernando and German intensifies, blurring the line between friendship and more.

title: Sweet, Sweet Lonely Girl
actors: Quinn Shephard, Erin Wilhelmi, Susan Kellermann, Frances Eve, Mike S. Ryan, Rob Tunstall, Lainie Ventura, Kristin Johansen, A.J. Helm, Hada Vanessa
description: Adele has to take care of her rich aunt Dora, the victim of an illness that forces her to remain locked inside her home. However, he begins to neglect his obligations when he meets Beth, an irresistibly magnetic but potentially dangerous young woman. The situation will soon push Beth into an unhealthy spiral.

title: Lascia stare i santi
description: A century-long journey to Italy in popular religious devotion. Ancient and more recent saints, black and white madonnas, devotional processions, are expressions of a need for the sacred apparently very far from us, but which is not so far away.

title: Willy 1er
directors: Ludovic Boukherma, Zoran Boukherma, Marielle Gautier, Hugo P. Thomas
actors: Daniel Vannet, Romain Léger, Noémie Lvovsky, Robert Follet, Geneviève Plet, Eric Jacquet, Kiki, Léa Viller, Alexandre Jacques, Cécile Lefrançois
description: On the death of his twin brother, 50-year-old Willy leaves his parents for the first time to settle in the neighboring town, intending to take a house of his own and make friends. Misfit and unable to socialize, Willy will have to find his place in a world he doesn't know.

title: Wedding Bells
actors: Danica McKellar, Kavan Smith, Tammy Gillis, Christopher Russell, Erin Aubrey, Bruce Blain, Bruce Boxleitner, Robyn Bradley, Lydia Campbell, Ian Carter
description: When he discovers that the wedding of his best friend Amy is in danger, Molly decides to help her as she can. Unfortunately for her, this means working side by side with Nick, one of the best Chefs from New York with whom she does not get along and who agreed to give her help just because she is a friend of the groom James. Although initially the tension is to the stars, the two slowly begin to open each other to discover themselves in love.

title: Moda mia
actors: Francesco Desogus, Pino Ammendola, Davide Garau, Gianpaolo Loddo, Valentina Sulas, Margherita Margarita, Melissa Satta
description: The sixteen year old Giovannino has a dream: to work in the world of fashion. He attended a technical artistic institute in Sardinia and is the son of the shepherd Antonio and Alice, a depressed woman who decides to leave the house after the continuous betrayals of her husband. #With the school that is finishing, Giovannino must deal with the 8 -year -old house and little sister, Stella, while his father forces him to follow the sheep and the ground, dealing with him with contempt. #When Giovannino, during an amateur fashion show, wins a prize with clothes made with recycled material, understands that he has the ability to continue that road. The boy does everything to leave his father and help his sister and mother trying to find a way to get to Milan.

title: À mon âge je me cache encore pour fumer
actors: Hiam Abbass, Fadila Belkebla, Nassima Benchicou, Biyouna, Nadia Kaci
description: In the heart of a hammam, far from the accusing gazes of men, a group of women - mothers, lovers, virgins and Islamic fanatics - mingle and confront each other. They laugh, cry, express their anger and talk about the Bible and the Koran, before the flash of a dagger and the silence of God.

title: Belle Dormant
actors: Mathieu Amalric, Agathe Bonitzer, Niels Schneider, Tatiana Verstraeten, Serge Bozon, Ingrid Caven, Nathalie Trafford, Andy Gillet, Vladimir Consigny, Olivier de Narnaud
description: The prince of Latvia, who finds solace only in playing drums, is determined to find the kingdom of Kent, where Princess Rosemunde and her court have been sleeping under a spell for a hundred years. A Unesco archaeologist will try to help him.

title: Bertolucci - Rubando bellezza
directors: Fulvio Wetzl, Laura Bagnoli, Danny Biancardi
actors: Attilio Bertolucci, Bernardo Bertolucci, Giuseppe Bertolucci, Lucilla Albano Bertolucci, Sonia Bergamasco, Fabrizio Gifuni, Fabio Bianchini, Morando Morandini
description: (Psych) analytical history of a family, the Bertoluccis: Attilio, poet, and his two sons Bernardo and Giuseppe, directors. The story of Attilio, Bernardo and Giuseppe Bertolucci starts from the Parma countryside and moves towards Rome where the poet's children regain their father's inheritance by originally making them what their father had done with them.

title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
actors: Frances McDormand, Woody Harrelson, Sam Rockwell, Abbie Cornish, Peter Dinklage, John Hawkes, Lucas Hedges, Caleb Landry Jones, Kerry Condon, Zeljko Ivanek, Kathryn Newton
description: After months without finding the culprit in her daughter's murder, Mildred Haynes makes a bold move, crafting three posters that look like a controversial message to William Willoughby, her hometown's revered police chief. When Dixon, the immature deputy chief of police with a penchant for violence, is also involved in the case, the confrontation between Mildred and William over law enforcement will grow tougher.

title: Ikitie
actors: Sidse Babett Knudsen, Irina Björklund, Ville Virtanen, Eedit Patrakka, Lembit Ulfsak, Tommi Korpela, Amalia Holm, Jonna Järnefelt, Jari Virman, Sampo Sarkola
description: During the great depression of the 1930s, Stalin invites all the workers of the world to build a new society based on justice, equality and freedom. More than ten thousand Americans answer his call and among them is Jussi Ketola, an American of Finnish descent. However, the dream of a communist paradise is quickly shattered when Jussi is harassed on the one hand by some fascist bullies and on the other hand by the Soviet secret police. Despite the obstacles, Jussi manages to settle in the community and build a family but, when the political climate changes, foreigners begin to be considered unwanted elements and mysteriously disappear.

title: Die kleine Hexe
actors: Karoline Herfurth, Suzanne Von Borsody, Alex Prahl, Momo Beier, Luis Vorbach, Therese Affolter, Eveline Hall
description: A little witch has a big problem: she is only 127 years old and consequently too young to dance with the other witches on Walpurgis night. Therefore, she sneaks into the party but is punished. Within a year, she will have to show everyone that she is a good witch and that she knows all the spells from the great magic book. With determination and commitment, she will also have to avoid all the obstacles that the witch Rumpumpel will put in front of her.

title: Les Hirondelles de Kaboul
description: In Kabul under the Taliban regime, the lives of two couples who live in two different neighborhoods intertwine. The first is formed by the conservatives Atiq and Mussarat, married for over twenty years and deeply attached to Afghan traditions. While Atiq works as the head of the guards in the women's prison, Mussarat is very ill and fights to stay strong until the end. The second couple is instead composed of Zunaira and Mohsen, who are against the traditions shared by Atiq and Mussarat. Zunaira and Mohsen have both lost their jobs - he is a lawyer and she is a lecturer at the university - and they have great problems making ends meet. While forced to sell their meager possessions to buy food, they are determined to maintain their modern values ??at any cost.

title: Sueño en otro idioma
actors: Fernando Álvarez Rebeil, José Manuel Poncelis, Eligio Meléndez, Fátima Molina, Juan Pablo De Santiago, Hoze Meléndez, Norma Angélica, Monica Miguel, Nicolasa Ortíz Monasterio, Héctor Jiménez
description: The seventy -year -olds Evaristo and Isauro, the last two speakers of a millennial language, have not been talked about for 50 years. Martin, a young linguist, tries to make them meet so you can record and study their language. However, hidden in the past, in the heart of the jungle, there is a secret concerning the fate of the Zikril language.

title: Pop Aye
actors: Thaneth Warakulnukroh, Penpak Sirikul, Bong
description: Due to a chance encounter, a disenchanted architect stumbles upon his long-lost elephant on the streets of Bangkok. Excited, he takes the elephant and sets out on a journey through Thailand in search of the farm where they grew up together.

title: A Christmas Wish
actors: Kristy Swanson, Edward Herrmann, K.C. Clyde, Tess Harper, Kevin Herring III, Kirstin Dorn, Mike Hagerty, Page Petrucka, Star Herrmann, Danielle Chuchran
description: Abandoned by her husband, Martha Evans with her two daughters and stepson finds herself a week before Christmas with no roof to live under and decides to move to a new city full of friendly strangers. Thanks to Trudy's help, she is hired as a waitress in a restaurant and soon her life seems to take an unexpected turn thanks to some meetings that will make her rediscover the joy of Christmas.

title: Coco
description: Although his family has been against music for generations due to some sort of curse, Miguel dreams of becoming a musician like his idol Ernesto de la Cruz. In an attempt to prove his talent, little Miguel finds himself in the colorful Land of the Afterlife following a mysterious chain of events. This will allow him to meet several deceased ancestors, such as great-grandmother Imelda and the charming hustler Hector. With the latter, then, he will set off on an extraordinary journey in order to find Ernesto, earn the blessing of the family and return to the World of the Living before it is too late.

title: As Duas Irenes
actors: Priscila Bittencourt, Isabela Torres, Marco Ricca, Suzana Ribeiro, Ines Peixoto, Teuda Bara, Marcela Moura, Ana Reston, Maju Souza
description: In the dazzling heat of Brazil, 13-year-old Irene discovers that her father has a secret that he has kept hidden for a long time: somewhere, the man has another family and another daughter to whom he has given the same name. Irene then decides to embark on a risky game that could backfire at any moment.

title: Estiu 1993
actors: Laia Artigas, Paula Robles, Bruna Cusí, David Verdaguer, Fermí Reixach, Paula Blanco, Quimet Pla, Isabel Rocatti, Jordi Figueras, Montse Sanz
description: Catalonia, summer 1993. For Frida, a six-year-old girl, the death of her mother marks the beginning of a new life. Entrusted to the loving care of an uncle and his family, Frida leaves her home in Barcelona. Getting used to the everyday life of the countryside and a world completely unknown to her will not be easy.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh!: The Dark Side of Dimensions
description: Yugi Muto and his friends are in their senior year of high school and are deciding what to do next. Meanwhile, Seito Kaiba has commissioned excavations to recover the pieces of the Millennium Puzzle, hoping to revive the soul of his rival Atem to boost his score. But the excavations are interrupted by Diva, who challenges Kaiba to Dual Monsters. Yugi and Kaiba have already clashed several times in the past but in the new duel they will bring pride and all past experiences into play.

title: Altin in the city
actors: Rimi Beqiri, Chiara Pavoni, Fabio del Greco, Roberto Fazioli, Giuseppe Panebianco, Germano Germani, Marcello Capitani, Alexandra Maravia
description: Altin, an aspiring Albanian writer who landed in Italy aboard a large ferry in the 1990s, works in a butcher's shop when he is selected to audition for a reality show for writers. He finally sees the possibility of being successful with his book "Ismail's Journey". Instead, it is the moment in which his misadventures begin that will lead him to know revenge, loneliness, poverty, up to the dark side of wealth and success.

title: Rey
actors: Rodrigo Lisboa, Claudio Riveros
description: In the 19th century, French adventurer Orélie Antoine de Tounens travels to a remote southern part of Chile and forms her kingdom there. Armed with a constitution written in his own hand and a new flag, he unites the natives of the place and becomes their ruler. The response of the Chilean army, however, will not be long in coming and will be devastating.

title: Visages, villages
description: The director Agnès Varda and the French artist JR set out on the roads of France in search of spontaneous or already organized encounters. In JR's car and special truck, far from the big cities, they combine their two worlds to try to create others.

title: Barbara
actors: Mathieu Amalric, Jeanne Balibar
description: An actress has to play the French singer Barbara for a film that will start shooting shortly, so she works on the character, her voice, her songs and her way of being on stage. Gradually the character takes over her. The director is also working on the film and he too gradually lets himself be overwhelmed by Barbara.
notes: Born in Paris in the thirties, Barbara lived a childhood marked by war and sexual abuse and struggled not just before grabbing success in the mid-sixties.

title: November
actors: Rea Lest, Jörgen Liik, Arvo Kukumägi, Katariina Unt, Taavi Eelmaa, Heino Kalm, Meelis Rämmeld, Dieter Laser, Jette Loona Hermanis, Jaan Tooming
description: In the snow-covered landscapes of 19th century Estonia, werewolves and spirits roam free while the figure of Jesus coexists with that of the kratts, mythological helpers of the peasants made of tools and bones. In this context, Liina, a farm worker, lives a doomed love with the young Hans, whose long wait will transform her into a werewolf.

title: Bombshell: The Hedy Lamarr Story
description: Many know the beauty of Hedy Lamarr but few know what a prodigious mind she had. Immigrated to Hollywood in the 1940s, she acted by day and by night she devoted herself to studying scientific applications and producing real inventions, as a secret communication system to be used by allies to fight the Nazis. Director Alexandra Dean therefore focuses on the key role played by the actress during World War II, despite never having received any honor or official recognition from the army.

title: Ava
actors: Noée Abita, Laure Calamy, Juan Cano, Tamara Cano, Daouda Diakhate, Baptiste Archimbaud, Franck Beckmann
description: Thirteen-year-old Ava is on vacation by the sea when she learns that she will soon lose her sight. The mother decided to act as if nothing had happened and to have the best summer of their life. Ava, on the other hand, decides to tackle the problem in her own way: she wants a big black dog that belongs to a young man on the run.

title: Geu-hu
actors: Min-hee Kim, Hae-hyo Kwon
description: On her first day at work, Areum replaces a woman who has broken up with her boss. The boss's wife, however, finds a love note, breaks into her husband's office and mistakes Areum for the other woman. At the end of the day, Areum is forced to quit. Some time later, Areum returns and thinks that something has changed.

title: Bulhandang
actors: Sol Kyung-gu, Siwan, Kim Hee-won, Jeon Hye-Jin, Lee Kyoung-young, Kim Sung-Oh, Heo Jun-Ho
description: Jae-Ho is a prisoner. He exercises his power over other prisoners and dictates the rules. But it is also the number two of a criminal band outside the prison. Ambitious enough, it has all the characteristics to become the number one after its exit. One day, Jae-Ho meets the new Hyun-Soo prisoner, who has no intention of following the rules of the prison and not to submit to anyone.

title: Terasu nite
actors: Kei Ishibashi, Kami Hiraiwa, Hiroaki Morooka, Kenji Iwatani, Ryûta Furuya, Takashi Okabe, Atsushi Hashimoto
description: While a party is underway at a company director's house, a young man is totally dazzled by a woman, who is at the party with her husband. This not only soon leads the woman to want to leave, but also ends up arousing the jealousy of the hostess. Things take a turn for the worse when guests start letting go of their tongues, made more agile by alcohol.

title: Canola
actors: Yuh-jung Youn, Kim Go-Eun, Kim Hee-won, Shin Eun-Jung, Yang Ik-June, Minho, Ryoo Joon-Yeol, Nam Tae-Boo
description: High school student Hye-ji is a troubled and fearful girl who keeps a secret. One day she is reunited with her grandmother, Gye-Choon, whom she hasn't seen for 12 years and who lives working as a driver on Jeju Island.

title: Une vie violente
actors: Jean Michelangeli, Henri-Noël Tabary, Cédric Appietto, Marie-Pierre Nouveau, Délia Sepulcre-Nativi, Dominique Colombani, Paul Garatte
description: Despite the threat of death hanging over his head, Stéphane decides to return to Corsica to attend the funeral of a childhood friend, murdered the day before. The occasion provides him with the pretext to remember the events that led him from Bastia to embrace a life of political radicalism and clandestinity.

title: Ise yarar bir sey
actors: Öykü Karayel, Basak Köklükaya, Yigit Özsener
description: Why would someone like Leyla take part in a dinner with old high school friends? And why should she, above all, take a train in the evening if she has always been alone for the past 25 years? And what is Canan, who is studying as a nurse, doing on the train? Why does she reluctantly go to a nurse job interview when she dreams of becoming an actress? And who is Yavuz, who has spent all day looking out the window? Is he waiting for Canan or maybe Leyla? Or maybe a murderer and a poet he met on the train one night?

title: Yoake Tsugeru Lu no Uta
description: Kai, a boy who lives in a isolated fishing village, makes friends with Lu, a siren who loves to sing and dance. However, his fellow citizens have always thought that the sirens bring disasters with them. An unexpected event will end up creating a huge fracture between Lu and the rest of the village inhabitants, endangering everything.

title: Kono sekai no katasumi ni
description: The young Suzu leaves Hiroshima in 1944 to get married and live with her husband's family in Kure, a military port city. War makes living conditions more and more difficult but, despite this, Suzu never loses joy and will to live. In 1945, however, the bombing will test his courage.

title: Le Grand Bal
description: For over 27 years, in the month of July, in the countryside of the Borbonese, people have been dancing for seven days and seven nights, whether it rains or is sunny. More than two thousand people of all ages, from the youngest to the 80s, gather from all over the world to dance, laugh, cry, play and live.

title: La fête est finie
actors: Zita Hanrot, Clémence Boisnard, Marie Denarnaud
description: Céleste is 19 years old and a drug addict. Admitted to a detoxification center, she arrives - in full withdrawal crisis - on the same day as Sihem, older than her and mysterious, refusing any kind of contact. Despite their differences, Céleste finally breaks the ice. The two young women make friends and become inseparable. They are discharged from the center, left to themselves, but they always remain together, with the risk of missing out on their possibility of redemption.

title: La educación del Rey
actors: Matías Encinas, Germán de Silva, Jorge Prado, Martín Arroyo, Mario Jara
description: Fleeing his criminal baptism, Reynaldo Galindez, aka Rey, breaks into the patio of the house inhabited by Carlos Vargas, a retired security guard. Vargas then offers him an agreement: if he repairs the damage caused to his home, he will avoid reporting him. The teachings the teenager will receive from the guard will give rise to a relationship reminiscent of that of a king with his mentor. The balance created by the two, however, will eventually crack when Rey's robbery companions begin to approach them.

title: Beats
actors: Cristian Ortega, Lorn MacDonald, Laura Fraser
description: United Kingdom, 1994. Best friends Johnno and Spanner share a deep bond, forged during their childhood years. But on the verge of adulthood, life seems to want to take them in different directions. The summer they are about to live will therefore be different for them but also for the whole country, due to the explosion of young counterculture movements. In search of adventure, the two friends decide to spend one last night together at an illegal rave, in an undergrowth populated by anarchy and freedom.

title: David Gilmour Live at Pompeii
actors: David Gilmour
description: On 7 and 8 July 2016 David Gilmour performed in two spectacular concerts in the legendary amphitheater of Pompeii, in the shadow of Vesuvius, 45 years after having played there during the recordings of the historic Pink Floyd Live at Pompeii performance, shot by Adrien Maben. The Gilmour concerts were the first rock performances to take place in front of an audience in the ancient Roman amphitheater, which was built in the 1st century BC. and buried by the eruption of Vesuvius in 79 AD. David Gilmour was therefore the only artist to perform in front of an audience inside the Pompeii arena since the days of the gladiators, almost 2,000 years ago. The footage of the evenings shows the artist in one of the creative peaks of his career in a unique setting.

title: 2 Cool 2 Be 4gotten
actors: Khalil Ramos, Ethan Salvador, Jameson Blake, Ana Capri
description: Philippines, late 1990s. In the city of Angeles, which is returning to normal after the catastrophic eruption of the Pinatubo volcano, Felix attends the second year of high school with excellent marks. He has no friends but that doesn't bother him, as his goal is to be top of the class and emigrate once he graduates. His life takes a new, unexpected direction as the Snyder brothers arrive at his school. Magnus and Maxim are the children of a local prostitute and an American soldier, with whom they would like to be reunited in the United States.

title: Arrhythmia
actors: Aleksandr Yatsenko, Irina Gorbacheva, Nikolay Shraiber, Sergey Nasedkin, Maksim Lagashkin, Albina Tikhanova, Alexander Samoilenko
description: Oleg is a young and talented paramedic. His wife Katya works in the ER and loves him but is tired of Oleg thinking more about his patients than about her. For this reason, she asks for a divorce. At work, Oleg is unable to submit to the new boss, a cold manager who is only interested in the strict rules to be implemented. For Oleg, the crisis at work inevitably coincides with the crisis in his private life. Between the emergency calls, the chaos and the search for meanings for a new life, Oleg and Katya will have to find the strength that has bound them and kept them together to avoid the worst.

title: Der Kuchenmacher
actors: Zohar Shtrauss, Sarah Adler, Stephanie Stremler, Tim Kalkhof, Roy Miller, Sandra Sadeh, Eliezer Shimon, Tamir Ben Yehuda, Tagel Eliyahu, Gal Gonen
description: After a few months, the relationship between Thomas, a pastry chef from Berlin, and Oran, a married man from Israel, is cut short by a tragic event. Oran is killed in a car accident and Thomas feels he has no choice but to seek out the widow, who is now forced to raise their beloved's son alone. Despite the initial distrust due to Thomas's German origins, the widow Anat decides to offer him a job in her club, unaware that what unites them is the pain of the loss of the same man.

title: Milla
actors: Séverine Jonckeere, Luc Chessel
description: The seventeen year old Milla and Leo, a young man not much bigger than her, find refuge in a small town on the channel of the sleeve. They are on the run and find themselves living a new life in a completely new place. They will thus have the opportunity to confront adolescent love and the transition to adulthood.

title: Tara moarta
description: A collection of photographs of a small Romanian town between the 1930s and 1940s taken by Costica Acsinte sheds light on the reality of the time, while extracts from Dr. Emil Dorian's diary underline how Romania is also experiencing the consequences of growing anti-Semitism.

title: Heartthrob
actors: Peter Facinelli, Keir Gilchrist, Ione Skye, Jimmy Bennett, Aubrey Peeples, Felicity Price, Reza Leal-Smartt, Austin Kulman, Echo Bull, Lowell Deo
description: The shy Henry is more than happy to turn on, during the summer following the diploma, of the unexpected sentimental relationship with Samantha, the most beautiful and popular girl in high school. However, when Henry's love turns into obsession, Samantha decides to hold back and put an end to history. Henry, however, has no intention of losing it and anyone who dares to attract his attention will pay a high price.

title: Les Bienheureux
actors: Sami Bouajila, Nadia Kaci, Amine Lansari, Lyna Khoudri
description: Algiers, a few years after the civil war. Amal and Samir have decided to celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary at the restaurant. On the way, they both evoke Algeria, each in their own way. Meanwhile, their son Fahim, with friends Feriel and Reda, wanders around the city, in an Algiers that gradually seems to withdraw into itself.

title: Cuba and the Cameraman
description: For over 42 years, director Jon Alpert has followed the life of Fidel Castro and three Cuban families, affected by the consequences of the dictator's policies. Their lives are a reflection of the roller coaster of the Cuban Revolution. Due to Alpert's unprecedented access to the island and his connection with Castro himself, an unpublished portrait of Cuba and its everyday life emerges.

title: Ryuichi Sakamoto: Coda
actors: Ryuichi Sakamoto
description: An intimate portrait of the renowned Japanese composer Ryuichi Sakamoto allows you to take stock of his music, his work in the world of cinema and his relationship with nature and the world.

title: Jim & Andy: The Great Beyond. The Story of Jim Carrey, Andy Kaufman and Tony Clifton
description: In 1999, actor Jim Carrey was chosen as the protagonist of Milos Forman's Man on the Moon. He must play Andy Kaufman, one of the most iconic comedians of his generation. Getting ready for the part won't be easy.

title: Dovlatov
actors: Milan Maric, Danila Kozlovsky, Helena Sujecka, Artur Beschastniy, Anton Shagin, Svetlana Khodchenkova, Elena Lyadova, Piotr Gasowski, Hanna Sleszynska
description: The Russian poet Sergei Dovlatov lives in 1971 in Leningrad, where he earns his living as a writer and journalist. 1971 was a crucial year in his life: the following year he decided to leave his homeland and move to Tallinn. After the move, Dovlatov will continue to write prolifically but his stories will be constantly rejected by all Soviet magazines and newspapers.

title: Sekala Niskala
actors: Thaly Titi Kasih, Gus Sena, Ayu Laksmi, I Ketut Rina, Happy Salma
description: Tantri, a ten-year-old girl, takes refuge in a world of fantasies and dreams to face the pain of the loss of her twin brother.

title: Armomurhaaja
actors: Matti Onnismaa, Jari Virman, Heikki Nousiainen, Hannamaija Nikander
description: Veijo Haukka, a 50-year-old mechanic, as a second worker helps sick dogs to die in a "sweet" way. One day Haukaa is paid to have a healthy dog ??die, but instead of completing the task, he decides to keep the animal with him. However, the old owner will not be satisfied until he sees the lifeless dog.

title: Ming yue ji shi you
actors: Xun Zhou, Eddie Peng, Wallace Huo, Deannie Yip, Tony Ka Fai Leung, Siu-Fai Cheung, Joman Chiang, Stanley Sui-Fan Fung, Tao Guo, Zhi-zhong Huang
description: In a Japanese-occupied Hong Kong, the quiet teacher Lan lives with her mother when she finds herself hopelessly drawn to the resistance movement. As the Second World War rages, Lan is opposed as best he can to the will of the Japanese forces to block the intellectuals of the city. In this context, she befriends Blackie Lau, the charismatic leader of the rebels who introduces her to a world entirely new to her.

title: Gun-ham-do
actors: Jung-Min Hwang, Su-an Kim, Jung-hyun Lee, Ji-seob So, Joong-ki Song
description: During the occupation of Korea by Japanese forces, hundreds of people were enslaved on the mining island of Hashima, where Lee is separated from his daughter So-hee upon their arrival. Hoping to find his daughter, Lee ends up taking part in a mass escape.

title: Mal Nosso
actors: Ademir Esteves, Ricardo Casella, Luisa Pepita, Fernando Cardoso, Reinaldo Colmanetti, Walderrama Dos Santos, Maria Galves, Maria Clara Gonçalves, Gabriela Grecco, Antony Mello, Sonia Moreno
description: Arthur has the extraordinary power of being able to communicate with spirits. One of the ghosts he comes into contact with is his mentor, who tells him how a demon intends to destroy his daughter's soul. Arthur will then have to take drastic measures to prevent the worst, even if it means diving into the deep web and tracking down a serial killer who seems to be right for him.

title: Yoru wa mijikashi aruke yo otome
description: Senpai is in love with a girl and does everything he can to win her over. Each of his attempts, however, does not seem to be very successful.

title: À Voix Haute
description: Every year at the University of Saint Denis, in the Parisian suburbs, a contest based on eloquence is held to determine the best speaker. Coming from diverse socio-cultural backgrounds, students prepare for the competition closely followed by speaking professionals such as lawyers and poets. Thanks to rhetoric, young people tell and discover themselves, revealing their most personal stories.

title: Il club dei 27
actors: Giacomo Anelli, Irene Carra, Pietro Anelli, Noa Zatta, Ettore Scarpa, Claudio Guain
description: Giuseppe Verdi, the greatest Italian composer, bequeathed 27 masterpieces to the world. About a century after its birth, an exclusive club is formed in the same places: each of the 27 members bears the name of an opera by Verdi. The charge lasts for life. Half a century later, in the land of melodrama, Giacomo Anelli was born. Despite his tender age, he wants to join the Club of 27. And he is very determined to succeed.

title: Postcards from London
actors: Harris Dickinson, Raphael Desprez, Ben Cura, Leonardo Salerni, Bernardo Santos, Kiera Bell, Jonah Hauer-King, Leo Hatton, Shaun Aylward, Rhys Yates
description: From the suburbs to the suburbs, teenager Jim finds himself in Soho where he comes into contact with a gang of men who work as high-class escorts by profession and specialize in entertaining customers after intercourse. Thanks to his physical appearance, Jim could be the most requested escort in town were it not for the annoying Stendhal syndrome he suffers from, a condition that often leads him to hallucinate and pass out.

title: Hikari
actors: Arata Iura, Eita, Kyoko Hasegawa, Manami Hashimoto, Kaho Minami, Mitsuru Hirata
description: Nobuyuki is a teenager who lives in Mihama, an island off the coast of Tokyo. His friend Tasuku, who adores him as if he were a brother, is a victim of constant abuse by his father. Nobuyuki's only classmate is the beautiful Mika. One day Nobuyuki commits a crime to protect Mika, and soon after a violent tsunami hits the island, wiping out most of the inhabitants. Twenty-five years later, Nobuyuki lives with his wife and children, while Mika has become a charming actress. Their past seems to be buried forever until the day Tasuku, the only witness to the crime, reappears threatening revenge.

title: Balon
actors: David Koroma, Yabom Fatmata Kabia, Vincenzo Albanese, Raffaella Esposito
description: Amin and his sister Isokè live in a village in sub-Saharan Africa. One day a band of marauders kills their family. Left alone, they flee to the desert until they reach Libya. Captured by a militia, after months of imprisonment and slave labor, they manage to get on a boat that raises anchor towards the unknown.

title: Microhabitat
actors: Som Lee, Jaehong Ahn, Duckmoon Choi, Jaewha Kim, Kukhee Kim, Sungwook Lee, Jinah Kang, Soohyang Cho
description: The thirty -one year old Miso works as a maid in Seoul. She's only daily joys are cigarettes, a glass of whiskey and the poor boyfriend who dreams of becoming a web artist. Although it is not rich, Miso is serene until the day when there is no event that sends her on tilt. From the first day of the year, in fact, cigarettes will undergo an increase and to be able to allow them Miso will be forced to give up something. Since smoking and drinking are indispensable for her, she decides to give up her home and to put on the trail of the five friends with whom, as a twenty year old, she formed a band.

title: Arpón
actors: Germán de Silva, Nina Suárez, Ana Celentano, Laura López Moyano, Marcelo Melingo, Agustina Altieri, Hector Bordoni, Jonathan Da Rosa, Luciana Grasso, Pablo Laborde
description: Mr. Arguello is a school principal who one day finds a syringe in the backpack of the fourteen-year-old student Cata. He suspects that the young woman is taking drugs and since then their relationship is not the best. Then when Cata has an accident and her parents delay, Arguello stays to take care of the girl. Closeness will forever change the way they relate, kicking off the most important story of their life.

title: Buñuel en el laberinto de las tortugas
description: Paris, 1930. The film L'âge d'or caused a scandal and director Luis Buñuel, who seemed to be destined to become the king of surrealism, was left penniless. Thus he does not even have the funds to devote himself to a new project, a documentary about one of the poorest regions in Spain. However, his sculptor friend Ramón Acín buys a lottery ticket and promises to help him if he wins. It so happens that luck is on their side and that the director starts filming, letting himself be deeply influenced by the misery of the place, by childhood memories and by Salvador Dalì.

title: Pearl Jam: Let's Play Two
actors: Jeff Ament, Matt Cameron, Kenneth 'Boom' Gaspar, Stone Gossard, Mike McCready, Eddie Vedder
description: Chicago is the hometown of Eddie Vedder and Pearl Jam have built a lasting relationship with the city and the Chicago Cubs baseball team: a unique relationship for the world of sports and music celebrated in 2016 with two extraordinary concerts at Wrigley Field , the city stadium also called "Cubs park", on the occasion of the celebrations for the victory of the World Series which took place after the longest fast in the history of baseball, 108 years after the previous title. Thus, from Ten to Lightning Bolt, the concert ranges through the entire catalog of original songs and covers that have characterized the band's 25-year career. The images of the concert are intertwined with exclusive interviews and a behind-the-scenes show that shows the spontaneous passages, in the Wrigleyville neighborhood, from the atmosphere of a Cubs victory to the anticipation and preparation of the band's live shows. Through the eyes of Danny Clinch and the voice of Pearl Jam (Eddie Vedder Stone Gossard, Mike McCready, Matt Cameron, Jeff Ament), the past and present of both the band and the Chicago Cubs are shown.

title: Dans la brume
actors: Romain Duris, Olga Kurylenko, Fantine Harduin, Michel Robin, Anna Gaylor, Christopher Ramoné
description: Mathieu would do anything not to separate 11-year-old daughter Sarah from the airlock she has been forced into due to illness since she was born. An earthquake, however, suddenly hits Paris and the city plunges into chaos due to a thick fog that rises from the ground. Mathieu and Anna, Sarah's mother, are among the few survivors who find shelters on the roofs or in the upper floors of buildings but to save themselves they are forced to leave the little girl alone. As the hours go by, the rescue teams are unable to handle the situation. Mathieu and Anna will then start a fight against time and fog in order not to prevent Sarah from happening the worst.

title: Heaven Sent
actors: Christian Kane, Marley Shelton, Ryan McPartlin, Mallory James Mahoney, Ernie Hudson, Andi Davis, Hannah Marie Hines, Chris Grundy, Shauna Earp, Stephen Fuller Austin
description: Maire Taylor, a smart and beautiful businesswoman, prays for her husband to find the strength to end their nine-year marriage. At the same time, husband Billy, a romantic artist, asks heaven that his wife find the strength to stay close to him. The two pleas are answered in the form of an eight-year-old angel fleeing from heaven. Thanks to the baby, the two spouses will find the strength to reconnect and overcome the heartbreaking loss they have experienced.

title: A Joyous Christmas
actors: Natalie Knepp, Michael Rady, Bonnie Bedelia, Steve Bacic, Marc Senior, Chiara Guzzo, David Lewis
description: A successful motivator discovers the true meaning of Christmas when it is saved by an almost fatal accident by a person he does not know. The close encounter will help her discover that helping others is not only the key to real success but also something that will lead her to find true love.

title: Oiktos
actors: Makis Papadimitriou, Giannis Drakopoulos, Evi Saoulidou, Nota Cherniavsky, Evdoxia Androulidaki, Georgina Chryskioti
description: The story of a man who feels happy only when he is unhappy. Addicted to sadness, he needs the pity of others so much that he is willing to do anything to prove it. His is the life of a person who lives in a world not cruel enough for his canons.

title: Gekijouban Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel - I. presage flower
description: Ten years after the Holy Grail War, a new battle looms in the city of Fuyuki. Seven wizards, under the command of seven Servants (legendary heroes left in human history), will face each other in a fight to the death where the final prize for the winner will be the Holy Grail, the legendary relic capable of fulfilling every wish. This is not a simple contest of strength: it is a real war in which alliances, feuds, strategies and twists are continually followed. Shirou Emiya, a high school student who leads an apparently normal life, after having involuntarily witnessed the clash between two individuals with supernatural powers, will find himself involved in the battle, risking to die, but will be saved by Saber, a Servant with the appearance of a young man. blond-haired woman holding a mysterious invisible sword. The boy, having become aware of the reality about the War of the Holy Grail, will decide to take part in it not to get the final prize, but to protect those he loves and prevent others from suffering the same suffering he suffered 10 years earlier when , due to the Fourth War, the city of Fuyuki was devastated.

title: Beoning
actors: Ah-in Yoo, Jong-seo Jeon, Steven Yeun
description: Jongsu, a part-time worker, meets Haemi, who lived in the same neighborhood as him, during a delivery. Haemi asks him to look after her cat while she travels to Africa. Upon his return, Haemi introduces him to Ben, a mysterious young man he met while he was away. One day, Ben visits Jongu with Haemi and confesses his secret hobby: he is an arsonist ...

title: Roma
actors: Yalitza Aparicio, Marina de Tavira, Fernando Grediaga, Nancy García, Verónica García García, Diego Cortina Autrey, Carlos Peralta, Marco Graf, Daniela Demesa, Jorge Antonio Guerrero
description: Mexico City, 1970s. A vivid portrait of domestic conflict and social hierarchy at a time of political unrest, told through the stories of the maid Cleo (Yalitza Aparicio) and her collaborator Adela (Nancy García García), both of Mixtec descent, who work for a small family bourgeois in the Roma neighborhood in Mexico City. Sofia (Marina de Tavira), a mother of four, has to deal with her husband's absence, while Cleo faces devastating news that threatens to distract her from taking care of Sofia's children, whom she loves as if they were her own.

title: Sorgoï Prakov, My European Dream
actors: Simon-Pierre Boireau, Elodie Bouleau, Rafaël Cherkaski, Roland David, Charles Dhumerelle, Xavier Kerf, Corentin Koskas, Denis Larzilière, Loïc Lefebvre, Philippe Pasquini
description: The naive Sorgoi Prakov decides to take a trip around Europe and document everything. The first stop is Paris, but already there everything is falling apart.

title: Hmyz
actors: Jirí Lábus, Jan Budar, Kamila Magálová, Jaromír Dulava, Ivana Uhlírová, Norbert Lichý
description: On a Monday morning, as usual, a small town pub is closed. The chairs are raised on the tables, everything is in its place and there is no presence, except for six amateur actors seated in a corner and arrived to rehearse The life of the insects of the brothers? Apek. As the rehearsals go on, the characters in the play are born and die with no regard for time. They are joined by the actors, some of whom undergo frightening transformations.

title: Genesis 2.0
description: On remote Siberian islands in the Arctic, hunters go in search of the tusks of extinct mammoths. This is a kind of gold rush, since the price of ivory is skyrocketing and a tusk, thawed, is worth a fortune. The discovery of a well-preserved mammoth carcass rekindles the hopes of geneticists and scientists to be able to attempt the "resurrection" of the animal species, transforming man into a new Creator.

title: The Irishman
actors: Robert De Niro, Al Pacino, Joe Pesci, Harvey Keitel, Jesse Plemons, Bobby Cannavale, Anna Paquin, Jack Huston, Stephen Graham, Ray Romano
description: Frank Sheeran, a WWII veteran and trade unionist with Mafia connections, recalls his possible involvement in the killing of Jimmy Hoffa, an American union leader.

title: Tutto davanti a questi occhi
actors: Sami Modiano
description: The tragic story of Sami Modiano, one of the few survivors of the Auschwitz Birkenau extermination camp, deported from Rhodes when he was only fourteen, with his father and sister. Only he returned.
notes: A story with an extraordinary emotional strength to raise awareness even among the new generations. Because only through the awareness of the past can we read the present and build the future.

title: Ang panahon ng halimaw
actors: Piolo Pascual, Shaina Magdayao, Angel Aquino, Pinky Amador, Bradley Liew, Hazel Orencio, Lilit Reyes, Joel Saracho, Bart Guingona, Ian Lomongo
description: At the end of the seventies, a gang of militiamen controlled by the army terrifies a remote village in the Philippines. Fear imposed on the inhabitants is not only physical but also psychological due to the apocryphal stories on their village head. However, some of them find the strength to fight, refusing to surrender. Poet, teacher and activist, Hugo Haniway desperately seeks the truth about his wife's disappearance.

title: Daxiang xidi er zuo
actors: Yu Zhang, Yuchang Peng, Yuwen Wang, Congxi Liu
description: Under the gloomy sky of a small town in northern China, different lives intertwine. To protect his friend, 16-year-old Wei Bu pushes the school bully down the stairs and sends him to the hospital. Fearing the consequences of what happened, Wei runs away and he is joined by neighbor Wang Jin and classmate Huang Ling, tormented by the sexual relationship she has with the director of the school. As the three try to lose their tracks, the bully's brother and a hooligan friend hunt them down.

title: Manbiki Kazoku
actors: Lily Franky, Ando Sakura, Matsuoka Mayu, Kiki Kilin, Jyo Kairi, Sasaki Miyu
description: After one of their shoplifting sessions, Osamu and his son come across a little girl left in the cold. Although reluctant at first, Osamu's wife agrees to take care of her after learning of the difficulties the little girl faces. Although the family is poor and earning only what is necessary to survive, everyone is happy until an unforeseen accident unearths well-kept secrets, testing every bond.

title: Varda par Agnès
description: Agnès Varda sheds light on her own experience as a director, focusing on what she calls "cine-writing" and traveling from Rue Daguerre in Paris to Los Angeles and Beijing.

title: Il condannato - Cronaca di un sequestro
description: The discovery of the red Renault in which the body of Aldo Moro was found, abandoned in a police depot, is the beginning of the reconstruction of the kidnapping of statesman Aldo Moro and his 55 days of imprisonment, which ended in the worst possible way. The story of the journalist Ezio Mauro begins on March 16, 1978, the day in which the Red Brigades were grappling with the preparations for the kidnapping.

title: McQueen
actors: Alexander McQueen
description: The story of Alexander McQueen, the legendary British designer, is kept alive by the memories of his closest friends and family. Talking about him is also the corpus of his creations, able to reveal how revolutionary, inspired, visionary and tormented he was.

title: Eat, Play, Love
actors: Jen Lilley, Jason Cermak, Lee Majors, Lindsay Wagner, Lucie Guest, Emily Maddison, Eduard Witzke, Amélie Will Wolf, Tak Shinyei, Candus Churchill
description: Veterinarian Carly Monroe has a habit of stopping by the kennel as often as possible because she loves dogs and secretly Dan, the owner of the place, too. Unfortunately for her, Dan has agreed to marry his fiancée, who works in the world of television, and to move to the Big Apple. With Dan's big step upon us, his sister decides to take matters into her own hands.

title: Blue Note Records: Beyond the Notes
actors: Herbie Hancock, Norah Jones, Don Was, Ali Shaheed Muhammad, Robert Glasper, Wayne Shorter, Terrace Martin, Lou Donaldson, Rudy Van Gelder, Lionel Loueke
description: The history of Blue Note Records, a record label for which the greatest jazz giants have recorded since 1939, from Miles Davis to Thelonius Monk, from Coltrane to Max Roach to Art Blakey and McCoy Tyner up to Herbie Hancock, Joe Lovano and Wayne Shorter and Robert Glasper, revolutionizing not only music but also the artistic and cultural world.

title: Sibel
actors: Damla Sönmez, Erkan Kolçak Kôstendil, Emin Gûrsoy, Elit Iscan, Meral Çetinkaya
description: 25-year-old Sibel lives in a village in the Turkish mountains. Mute since childhood, she does not communicate with anyone, she is not married and lives with her father. Locals consider her to be handicapped and, to compensate for her loneliness, Sibel works in the fields. One day, however, he runs into an army deserter hiding in the woods. For the first time, a new gaze rests on her, making her rediscover that she is a woman.

actors: Yoon-Seok Kim, Jung-woo Ha, Hae-jin Yoo, Tae-ri Kim, Hee-soon Park, Hee-jun Lee, Eui-sung Kim, Jong-soo Kim, Dal-su Oh, Chang-Seok Ko
description: In 1987, in Korea, under an oppressive military regime, a young university student was killed during a police interrogation accompanied by torture. Government officials are ready to cover up the death and order that the body be cremated. The prosecutor who is supposed to sign the cremation authorization begins to wonder why a 21-year-old could die of a heart attack and decides to investigate the case thoroughly. In doing so, the truth will come out in favor of the country's largest popular protest.

title: Bao xue jiang zhi
actors: Yihong Duan, Yiyan Jiang, Yuan Du, Chuyi Zheng, Wei Zheng
description: 1997. A few months before regaining sovereignty over Hong Kong, China experiences some radical changes. Yu Guowei, the security chief of an old factory in the south of the country, begins to poke his nose into a case of serial killings of young women. As the local police trudge to no avail, Yu sees his personal investigation turn into an obsession and the only reason for living.

title: They'll Love Me When I'm Dead
description: In the 1970s in Hollywood, after the fall of the traditional studio system and the rise of the counterculture, anything was possible. Even that a director of the caliber of Orson Welles found no way to complete his latest film, The Other Face of the Wind.

title: The Other Side of the Wind
actors: John Huston, Robert Random, Peter Bogdanovich, Susan Strasberg, Oja Kodar, Joseph McBride, Lilli Palmer, Edmond O'Brien, Mercedes McCambridge, Cameron Mitchell
description: A legendary director named J.J. "Jake" Hannaford returns to Hollywood after years of near exile in Europe with the intention of completing what is his return work, the groundbreaking film The Other Face of the Wind.
notes: Latest work by Orson Welles, remained incomplete and completed thanks to the interest and contributions of Netflix.

title: Mori no iru basho
actors: Tsutomu Yamazaki
description: Famous in Japan for flowers, insects and other natural elements painted in a childish style in the last phase of his career, Kumagai Morikazu lives the last years of his life in complete solitude. For a long time, he does not cross the confines of his home, where he is very close to his sympathetic and simple wife Hideko and patiently endures a daily flow of visitors, including an obsequious innkeeper, who wants the master to paint a sign for his. local, and a shady building contractor, whose new condominium will take away much of the sunlight from the painter's garden.

title: Dear Ex
actors: Joseph Huang, Hsieh Ying-xuan, Roy Chiu, Spark Chen
description: Teenager Song Chengxi loses her father Song Zhengyuan, who died of cancer; but instead of being able to mourn his death, he finds himself embroiled in a feud between his widowed mother Liu Sanlian and Jay, his father's gay lover. Before he died, Zhengyuan named Jay as the beneficiary of her life insurance, which made Sanlian mad, making her even more bossy than before. Chengxi, now fed up, moves into Jay's ugly apartment. Already at odds due to love and money, the trio seems ready for new conflicts.

title: Capharnaüm
actors: Nadine Labaki, Zain Al Rafeea, Yordanos Shiferaw, Treasure Bankole, Kawthar Al Haddad, Fadi Youssef, Haita Izam, Alaa Chouchnieh
description: Twelve-year-old Zain rebels against the life that has been imposed on him and starts a lawsuit against his parents for giving birth to him. He is thus claiming dignity for himself and for all those who have been deprived of the most basic rights.

title: Yomeddine
actors: Rady Gamal, Ahmed Abdelhafiz, Shahira Fahmy, Mohamed Abdel Azim, Osama Abdallah, Shehab Ibrahim
description: Beshay, a Coptic now cured of leprosy, decides to leave the confines of the leper colony in the Egyptian desert where he has lived since childhood for the first time. After the disappearance of his wife, he would like to rediscover his roots and what remains of his family. Gathering his few belongings, he is soon joined by a small Nubian orphan and together they embark on a journey through Egypt.

title: Gongjak
actors: Hwang Jung-min, Lee Sung-Min, Cho Jin-Woong, Ju Ji-hoon
description: In 1993, former military officer Suk-young Park was recruited as a spy by South Korean Intelligence and received the code name of Black Venus. He is then sent to infiltrate the ranks of a group of senior North Korean officials based in Beijing in order to gather information on North Korea's nuclear program. Having managed to approach Myong-un Ri, an important figure of power, Black Venus goes far beyond what he had set out, but the political machinations on both fronts will jeopardize his conquests.

title: Les Âmes mortes
description: Through the description of the daily life of the now elderly survivors of the Jiabiangou Forced Labor Camp, we try to expose the truth about the political campaigns of the late 1950s that led so many people to suffer or die from the violence they suffered, violence that ended to target all of Chinese society as a whole.

title: Carmen y Lola
actors: Zaira Morales, Rosy Rodriguez, Moreno Borja, Carolina Yuste, Rafaela León
description: Carmen and Lola are two gypsy teenagers who try to carry on their love story, despite the inconveniences and social discrimination to which they are subjected by a culture that considers homosexuality a taboo.

title: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
actors: Alice Guy, Evan Rachel Wood, Andy Samberg, Jodie Foster, Geena Davis, Lake Bell, Ben Kingsley, Janeane Garofalo, Cheryl Hines, Julie Delpy
description: First woman director, producer and director of a study, Alice Guy made her first film at the age of 23 in 1896. He also linked his name to over a thousand titles.

title: Bergman — ett år, ett liv
description: The reconstruction of a year of the life of the master Ingmar Bergman, from the release in theaters in 1957 of Il posto delle fragole to that of Il seventh seal.

title: Io sono Valentina Nappi
actors: Valentina Nappi, Lorenzo Branca, Corrado Sassi
description: The director Monica Stambrini follows Valentina Nappi during a night apparently like many: left alone in a city that is not hers, a guest for a night in an artist's studio, Valentina sends a message to Lorenzo and, while waiting for her reaches out, undresses, puts on a record, curious about, wait. When Lorenzo arrives, he still has dinner. They chat while he eats his burger. They have different views on the complicity between sex and food. Then they finally get naked, kiss, laugh. They have been missed. They are lovers, they are twenty years old, they make love for a long time until they fall asleep.

title: Storia degli uomini che volevano bruciare New York
description: More than a story, that of the Decima Mas is an adventure. An anomalous adventure for the Italian military canons, an ambiguous and controversial adventure. An adventure that has its roots in a cold night in 1918, when two lieutenants of the Italian navy first conceived the idea of ??a surprise attack with underwater assault vehicles, and put it into action, alone in front of the depth of the sea and the enemy fleet. The founders of the Decima Flottiglia Mas are inspired by this event, which took place in the waters of the port of Pula.

title: It Must Schwing - The Blue Note Story
description: In 1939 Alfred Lion and Francis Wolff, two young German refugees from Berlin, founded the legendary Blue Note Records label, which became famous all over the world for jazz records of musicians such as Miles Davis, Herbie Hancock, John Coltrane, Sonny Rollins, Wayne Shorter, Miles Davis, Thelonious Monk and Quincy Jones. In a historical moment in which African Americans had not yet faced discrimination and segregation, the Blue Note Records respecting the color musicians like all the other artists, appreciating their talents and offering them a chance to express themselves.

title: Ruben Brandt, a gyüjtö
description: Ruben Brandt is a well-known psychotherapist who is forced to steal 13 paintings from world-renowned museums and private collections to appease the suffering generated by terrible nightmares. Accompanied by four of his patients, he will land every hit and soon become one of the most wanted criminals in the world by police, gangsters, headhunters, private detectives and insurance companies.

title: La flor
actors: Elisa Carricajo, Pilar Gamboa, Valeria Correa, Laura Paredes
description: A film-tribute to the history of cinema, through six episodes inspired by the different forms of cinematographic art. Each episode is characterized by a different genre. The first is reminiscent of B series films, those that Americans once shot with their eyes closed and now seem to no longer know how to do. The second is a kind of musical with a touch of mystery. The third is a spy movie. The fourth is difficult to describe. The fifth is inspired by an old French film. The last, set in the nineteenth century, tells the story of some women, held prisoner by the Indians, who return from the desert after many years.

title: M
actors: Menahem Lang
description: A journey into the heart of Bnei Brak, the world capital of the Haredi, the ultra-Orthodox Jews, the "fear of God" in Hebrew. In this city, Menahem Lang has grown, becoming known in the community for his kindness, for the assiduity with which he attended the talmudic school and above all for the golden voice of him who made him a renowned interpreter of liturgical songsAt twenty, however, Menahem breaks with this devoted life and moved to Tel Aviv. Because the child with a clear smile hid a secret: for years he was raped by some members of that same community that tried it. Menahem succeeds in the extraordinary company to open the door of that forbidden world. A return to the scene of the crime, but also a return to the places he loved, an initiatory journey dotted with incredible encounters, of found rituals, a reconciliation. Those who have lived his own drama come out in the open, like squid, find the courage to speak, to defeat the spectrum of the "Gal-Gal", that vicious circle that has transformed the rapestrokes in rapists since the mists of time.

title: Salvador Dalí. La ricerca dell'immortalità
description: An exhaustive journey through the life and work of Salvador Dalí, and also of Gala, his muse and collaborator. A path that goes from 1929, the crucial year in which Dalì joins the surrealist group and meets Gala, until his death, crossing all the geographies of the artist: Portlligat (the home workshop), Figueres (hometown where he creates the museum- Dalí theater), Púbol (where the castle where he spends the last years of his life is located), but also the big cities, such as Paris and New York. Images and documents, some of which unpublished, will bring the painter who has made of himself an extraordinary and eccentric work of art capable of assuring him a place in the myth.

title: Love at Sea
actors: Alexa PenaVega, Carlos PenaVega, Melissa Carcache, Audrey Landers, William R. Moses, Edward Finlay, Meghan Colleen Moroney, Justin Miles, Peyton Lee, Michael A. Cook
description: For a year now, Olivia Grayham has been fighting to become an event organizer. A great opportunity comes to her thanks to best friend Alexandra, who plans to make some of her hugely popular style trend videos on YouTube aboard a Caribbean cruise. In charge of organizing an important event on the ship, Olivia has planned everything down to the last detail, not knowing, however, that she has to deal with Tony Rieves, the new cruise captain. He will soon realize that unexpected events (even those of love) are always around the corner in life.

title: Penguin Highway
description: Aoyama is a bright, curious and somewhat stubborn kid. He is in fourth grade, has a crush on an older woman who is teaching him to play chess and is preparing to live carefree summer days when a colony of penguins suddenly materializes in his sleepy town. In an effort to understand where they come from, Aoyama and his friends will embark on research that, with rigorous scientific methods and principles, will lead to ever more wonderful and bewildering results.

title: Sayonara no asa ni yakusoku no hana o kazarô
description: Sweet and gentle people of weavers, the Iolphs have spent centuries making their traditional costumes in their idyllic and isolated village. Maqui also lives in this perennially young tribe, loved by all but marked by loss and loneliness. The peace of the place is endangered when one day soldiers arrive on horseback from the dragons sent by the king of Mesate who want to seize the goods and secrets of the Iolphs. Fortunately Maquia manages to escape but finds herself in an unknown land, where she encounters the orphan Erial, abandoned and lost like her. Maquia then feels compelled to take care of it as she begins her journey into the world of humans constantly in turmoil.

title: The Witch in the Window
actors: Arija Bareikis, Greg Naughton, Alex Draper, Charlie Tacker, Carol Stanzione, Zach Jette
description: Simon, a divorced father, takes his 12-year-old son Finn to Vermont to help him renovate an old house he recently bought. Accustomed to the chaos of New York, Finn is let down by the small town even before he gets there. Suffering from a rare medical condition that leads him to literally have a hole in his heart, Simon does his best to make living together in the new location pleasant for his son but soon a series of terrifying events, apparently without reason, will make the two discover that they are not. being alone in the house.

title: Mid90s
actors: Sunny Suljic, Na-kel Smith, Lucas Hedges, Olan Prenatt, Katherine Waterston, Jerrod Carmichael, Alexa Demie, Stephane Nicoli, Cici Lau, Ryder McLaughlin
description: Stevie is a 13-year-old who spends the summer in 1990s Los Angeles splitting between his troubled family life and a group of new friends he met in a store on Motor Avenue.

title: Monrovia, Indiana
description: Located in Central America, Monrovia was founded in 1812 and is primarily an agricultural community. Here, the experiences of those who live and work there are intertwined with those of organizations and institutions. It is estimated that in 2016, about 46 million citizens live in the American countryside, representing the training center of American politics and values, as demonstrated by the results of the presidential elections that led to the election of Trump.

title: 1938 Diversi (Le leggi razziali del fascismo)
description: Until 1935 in Italy racism almost did not exist and fascism, in the twenty years of its dictatorship, managed to inoculate in Italian society a virus that in underground forms has taken root and continues to proliferate. On the occasion of the anniversary of the promulgation of racial laws, we want to help deepen, to understand what happened and to reflect on how they were born, how they were welcomed and what consequences they had. With the help of world -renowned historians (Italian and foreign) as well as academics and insignificant experts, we try to analyze the facts, also emphasizing the slightly known and rare documents and archival materials.

title: Friedkin Uncut
actors: William Friedkin, Quentin Tarantino, Juno Temple, Matthew McConaughey, Gina Gershon, Wes Anderson, Michael Shannon, Edgar Wright, Damien Chazelle, Francis Ford Coppola, Ellen Burstyn
description: William Friedkin is one of New Hollywood's most influential directors. His career and personal history are retraced starting from the many masterpieces he created, such as The Exorcist (1973) and The violent arm of the law (1971). It goes to its discovery through set stories, archive images and interviews ranging from actors, Oscar winners, fans and collaborators.

title: The Great Buster
actors: Buster Keaton
description: Buster Keaton's career has been legendary since his debut little more than child. He retraces her, also focusing on his life, the director Peter Bogdanovich with the help of high -profile actors, directors and historians who have been inspired from Keaton's work.

title: Ozen
actors: Zhalgas Klanov, Eric Tazabekov, Zhasulan Userbayev, Ruslan Userbayev
description: Five brothers, who grew up far from civilization, see their lives change after the visit of the guest who arrives from the city.

title: Anons
actors: Ali Seckiner Alici, Tarhan Karagöz, Murat Kiliç, Sencan Güleryüz
description: May 22, 1963: Dissatisfied with the political and social situation in Turkey, a group of army officers plan a coup to overthrow the government of Ankara. Meanwhile, in Istanbul, their accomplices have undertaken the crucial mission of occupying the national radio station and formally announcing the coup. But nothing goes according to plan. Faced with a series of obstacles, including a sudden storm, the absence of the radio station technician, a betrayal, the lack of news from Ankara and their own inefficiency, the conspirators will have to do their best to succeed. and proclaim the success of the coup, provided that it was successful in the capital.
notes: Based on real facts told over the course of a single night, the film is a biting account of Turkey's complicated political past; and its present. In the film, the biting political satire is mixed with subtle irony, managing, always with extreme seriousness, to highlight all the absurdity of the story.

title: El Pepe, una vida suprema
actors: Pepe Mujica
description: Serbian director Emir Kusturica offers a well-rounded portrait of José Pepe Mujica, former president of Uruguay. Taking part in Mujica's public and private life, he has the opportunity to record his conversations, travels, visits and his last days in the presidency, including his farewell to the seat of government. The result is the image of a man who has tried to translate his simple and austere thoughts about the present, global changes, sustainability, militancy and even love into ideology and politics.

title: Process
description: Director Sergei Loznitsa offers an archival chronicle of one of the infamous Moscow trials, at the time used to legitimize Stalin's rule and now a reminder of the consequences of totalitarianism. Accused of planning a coup against the Soviet government in 1930 was a group of economists and engineers, accused by the authorities of having entered into a secret pact with French Prime Minister Raymond Poincare and other Western leaders.

title: American Dharma
actors: Steve Barron (II)
description: Steve Bannon rose to the headlines as chief strategist of US President Donald Trump from January 20 to August 18, 2017. Journalist, politician and film producer, Bannon also coordinated the future president's election campaign but ends up being ousted from every his assignment. But who is Bannon really, a supporter of many European right-wing movements?

title: The Witch: Part 1. The Subversion
actors: Kim Da-mi, Cho Min-soo, Park Hee-soon, Choi Woo-Shik
description: An agency with evil intent has genetically changed a lineage of children by equipping them with unique skills. Under the coverage of the night, a group of ruthless killers moves to close the program and exterminate the children. Ja-Yoon, a girl with the power of Telecinese, manages to escape, hides and is adopted by a loving family. Ten years later, Ja-Yoon has no memory of his past when, appearing in a national talent show, he shows his powers. Seen by those who wanted her dead, she will find themselves becoming a prey for anyone who surrounds her.

title: Her Smell
actors: Elisabeth Moss, Cara Delevingne, Dan Stevens, Agyness Deyn, Gayle Rankin, Ashley Benson, Dylan Gelula, Amber Heard, Eric Stoltz, Virginia Madsen
description: In the 1990s, Becky Something is the influential singer of a rock band. Her struggles against her own inner demons and against friends, family and bandmates will push her towards a path of self-destruction, from which she will have to find a way out if she wants to regain the creativity thanks to which she found success.

title: The Wind
actors: Caitlin Gerard, Julia Goldani Telles, Ashley Zukerman, Miles Anderson, Dylan McTee, Martin Patterson
description: In the 19th century, Lizzy moved to the wild and isolated American frontier to settle there with her husband. A demonic presence will soon make its appearance, infusing her with an atmosphere of paranoia and madness.

title: Free Solo
actors: Alex Honnold
description: Renowned climber Alex Honnold attempts to do what no other climber in the world has ever done: solo and without safety ropes the face of El Capitan, a 3,000-foot-high mountain in Yosemite National Park, California.

title: Freedom Fields
country: Libya, Great Britain, Netherlands, United States, Qatar, Lebanon, Canada
description: Naziha Arebi offers an intimate look at post-revolution Libya through the eyes of an aspiring women's soccer team, whose struggle to gain acceptance mirrors the challenges women in contemporary Libyan society face.

title: Meeting Gorbachev
description: Prolific director Werner Herzog meets Mikhail Gorba? Ëv, the former Soviet head of state, for a long and sincere conversation. The result is a portrait of one of the most important politicians of the twentieth century.

title: Quincy
actors: Quincy Jones, Rashida Jones, Tom Hanks, Samuel L. Jackson, Will Smith, Lady Gaga, Michael Caine, Peggy Lipton, Beyoncé, Dave Chappelle
description: A look at the life, work and legacy of legendary music producer Quincy Jones.

title: Il traditore
actors: Pierfrancesco Favino, Maria Fernanda Cândido, Luigi Lo Cascio, Fabrizio Ferracane, Fausto Russo Alesi, Nicola Calì, Giovanni Calcagno, Goffredo Maria Bruno, Pier Giorgio Bellocchio, Ludovico Caldarera, Rosario Palazzolo
description: Revenge and betrayals revolve around Tommaso Buscetta, "boss of two worlds". The story begins with the charismatic character of Cosa Nostra hunted in Brazil by the "Corleonesi" of Riina and passes through the friendship with the judge Giovanni Falcone and the testimony to the maxi trial that brought the mafia organization to its knees to end, after the accusations against Andreotti trial, with his death in 2000 in Miami, where Buscetta died of illness and not at the hands of the mafia.

title: No One Would Tell
actors: Shannen Doherty, Mira Sorvino, Matreya Scarrwener, Callan Potter, Chanelle Peloso, Louriza Tronco, Trezzo Mahoro, Ricky He, Sarah Grey, Avery Konrad
description: Laura Collins, Sarah's single mother, already has a troubled sentimental past behind her. When Sarah begins dating the popular and charismatic Rob Tenninson, Laura can only be thrilled with the two's happiness. As the relationship progresses, however, Rob begins to show his darker and more possessive side which leads Laura to worry. The situation escalates when Sarah goes missing and Laura wages a tough legal battle for justice.

title: They Shall Not Grow Old
description: Using state-of-the-art technology in reworking archival footage and audio that is more than a century old, director Peter Jackson pays homage to the figures of men who experienced the Great War firsthand. Immersing himself in the archives of the BBC and the Imperial War Museum, the director wanted to explore the reality of war by highlighting the attitude of young soldiers towards the conflict: how they ate, how they rested, how they built bonds and how they hoped for a future. rosy.

title: Kler
actors: Arkadiusz Jakubik, Robert Wieckiewicz, Jacek Braciak, Joanna Kulig, Janusz Gajos, Adrian Zaremba, Magdalena Celówna-Janikowska, Ignacy Klim, Michal Gadomski, Katarzyna Chlebny
description: A few years earlier, tragic events intertwined the lives of three Catholic priests. Over time, on each anniversary of the catastrophe they miraculously escaped, they gather to celebrate their survival. However, the existences of the three are destined to merge once again due to circumstances that will have a strong impact on their daily lives.

title: Gisaengchung
actors: Kang-ho Song, Sun-kyun Lee, Hyae Jin Chang, Yeo-Jeong Cho, Woo-sik Choi, So-dam Park, Ji-so Jung
description: Ki-taek's whole family is out of work. Ki-taek is particularly interested in the lifestyle of the very wealthy Park family. One day, his son manages to get hired by the Parks and the two families find themselves intertwined by a series of uncontrollable events.

title: Atlas
actors: Rainer Bock, Albrecht Schuch, Uwe Preuss, Thorsten Merten, Roman Kanonik, Nina Gummich, Zübeyde Bulut, Serdar Thenk Yildiz, Sasun Sayan, Johannes Gevers
description: Sixty-year-old Walter Scholl deals with forced evictions. His background as a weightlifter makes him the best worker Roland Grone has ever had in his moving company. However, Walter ignores how much pain his work causes by entering into people's intimacy and how Grone is in league with a bad deal with a rather dubious family clan. When a pre-World War II apartment complex has to be evacuated, a problem arises: a tenant refuses to leave despite the court order. Walter believes he recognizes him and, rather than revealing to him that he is his father, he approaches Jan and his family gradually, eventually becoming involved in them.

title: Unstoppable
actors: Dong-seok Ma, Ji-hyo Song, Noo-Ri Bae, Min-jae Kim, Sung-oh Kim
description: Dong-Chul and Ji-Soo are a happily married couple. One day, Dong-chul comes home and finds everything turned upside down and his missing wife.

title: Pierino
description: Pierino Aceti is a man of habit, passionate about cinema, now retired after a life as a clerk. For exactly one year, or fifty-two Thursdays, the director Luca Ferri went from 10.30 to 11.30 in the morning to Mr. Aceti's house. Each meeting revolved around the same question: "What did you do this week?". During the formal agreement, the iron organizational structure of Pierino's days emerges, his relentless ability to classify and memorize things and details, of films and of life, of fragmenting time into meticulous and measurable events.

title: Dove bisogna stare
description: Elena, Georgia, Jessica, Lorena, four women, of different ages, in different places, are engaged in activities at first sight absurd to common sense: listening to their stories and discovering their daily life we ??discover, instead, linear, extraordinary speeches and gestures in their simplicity, capable of facing an epochal phenomenon such as migration.

title: I rec u
actors: Federica Bertolani, Guglielmo Favilla, Terry Gilliam, Cay Izumi, Dolphine Lundgren, Andrea Massaccesi, Sara Mastellone, Isabella Pennisi, Lorenzo Porzi, Mattia Settembrini
description: Neve is 19 and suffers from a rare eye disease: she sees all women out of focus. He can only see them correctly in recorded movies and images. For this he wears special glasses that record every moment of his life, allowing him to see correctly. His life, however, has thus become a film in its own way: this until the day when he meets a woman, the only one, who can see correctly, without the aid of recorded images.

title: Buoyancy
actors: Sarm Heng, Thanawut Kasro, Mony Ros
description: Chakra, a fifteen -year -old boy, does not expect much from his life as a farmer in Cambodia. His dream of him is to escape from the village where he lives and, when he is offered the possibility of making money in Thailand, he does not hesitate to accept. What believes to be a way out to poverty will soon be transformed into a prison, and will end up in open sea, used as a slave aboard a fishing boat.

title: Port Authority
actors: Fionn Whitehead, McCaul Lombardi, Leyna Bloom, Jari Jones, Rao Rampilla
description: On the steps of the Port Authority bus station in New York, a beautiful girl named Wye jokes with her friends. Paul, a teenager who has just arrived in the metropolis, observes her, paralyzed by her beauty. Wye belongs to a "dance community" for queer minors. While an unexpected love story is born between the two, Paul discovers that Wye is actually a trans, entering into crisis.

title: J'accuse
actors: Jean Dujardin, Louis Garrel, Emmanuelle Seigner, Mathieu Amalric, Grégory Gadebois, Melvil Poupaud, Olivier Gourmet, Vincent Grass, Didier Sandre, Hervé Pierre
description: On January 5, 1895, Captain Alfred Dreyfus, a young Jewish soldier, is accused of being a spy for Germany and sentenced to life in prison on Devil's Island. Among the witnesses to his humiliation is Georges Picquart, who is instead promoted to the direction of the military counterintelligence unit that framed him. But when he discovers that secret information is still reaching the Germans, Picquart is drawn into a dangerous labyrinth of deception and corruption that threatens not only his honor but also his own life.

title: Shooting the Mafia
actors: Letizia Battaglia
description: The Sicilian Letizia Battaglia has fought the mafia all her life through the use of her camera, Documenting the barbaric rules of the Cosa Nostra, she witnessed its most inflexible crimes.

title: A Wedding for Christmas
actors: Cristine Prosperi, Colton Little, Vivica A. Fox, Lesli Kay, William McNamara, Natalie Mauro, Robert Livingston, Elizabeth Alvarez, Curtis McGann, John Eddings
description: Haley is a young wedding planner who has a well-established job in Los Angeles, in a prestigious agency that organizes VIP weddings, and is engaged to a businessman who is all home and career. When her sister Angela decides to get married, Haley agrees to take care of the wedding and suggests a summer date and location. But Angela's big dream - much more sentimental than her sister - is to celebrate her wedding on Christmas Eve, on the farm that belonged to her grandfather.

title: Every Day a Good Day
actors: Haru Kuroki, Kirin Kiki, Mikako Tabe, Mayu Tsuruta, Shingo Tsurumi, Megumi Takizawa
description: Unlike her lively cousin, Noriko has no hobbies or ambitions and doesn't even know what she wants to do with her life. Her mother suggests she take a course to learn the traditional tea ceremony and, despite the initial discontent, Noriko accepts. Overcoming the first few difficulties, let tea become an integral part of 20 years of her life, during which she will struggle to find a job, break up with her boyfriend, lose a loved one and face competition from a large chain of drinks.

title: To thávma tis thálassas ton Sargassón
actors: Angeliki Papoulia, Youla Boudali, Hristos Passalis, Argyris Xafis, Thanasis Dovris, Laertis Malkotsis, Maria Filini, Michalis Kimonas, Christian Culbida, Thanos Tokakis
description: Elizabeth is a sexually compliant policewoman who is unhappy with the closed-mindedness of the town she lives in. Rita, on the other hand, is a lonely worker who is trying to escape the sticky situations of her existence. Their two lives will eventually intertwine.

title: Beolsae
actors: In-gi Jeong, Sae-byeok Kim, Ji-hu Park, Lee Seung-yeon
description: In 1994, the year in which the Seongsu bridge collapsed, the fourteen year old Eunhee lives with his parents and the rest of his loved ones in Daechidong. His family does not seem particularly caring and Eunhee loves to go around combining trouble. In search of love, he will find who really understands it in the teacher Kim Youngji.

title: Di yi ci de li bie
description: Isa lives with her family in a Uyghur village in the vastness of northwestern China, between cotton fields and the desert. However, her mother's illness and her best friend's unhappy situation will make her life more difficult than expected.

title: Di jiu tian chang
actors: Wang Jingchun, Yong Mei, Qi Xi, Wang Yuan, Du Jiang, Ai Liya, Xu Cheng, Li Jingjing, Zhao Yanguozhang
description: Two different couples experience the revolutionary economic reform and the upheavals in China from the 1980s onwards. Families, friendships, loves and destinies change and sway along with the tide of history.

title: Systemsprenger
actors: Helena Zengel, Albrecht Schuch, Gabriela Maria Schmeide, Lisa Hagmeister, Melanie Straub, Victoria Trauttmansdorff, Maryam Zaree, Tedros Teclebrhan, Matthias Brenner, Louis von Klipstein
description: Benni is a nine-year-old girl whose real name is Bernadette but no one dares to call her that. Full of energy, she is a basket case for social workers trying to find her a home: wherever she arrives, she is sent back. The assistant Bafané with the collaboration of Micha uses unorthodox methods to promote social integration but Benni has only one desire: to return to the home of his mother Bianca, who however is afraid of her own daughter ...

title: Danmarks sønner
actors: Imad Abul-Foul, Rasmus Bjerg, Morten Holst, Elliott Crosset Hove, Mohammed Ismail Mohammed, Özlem Saglanmak, Zaki Youssef
description: A terrorist attack on a Danish subway creates fertile ground for the advance of the far right. A year later, the elections hand over the government to the party of nationalist leader Martin Nordahl as the violent pro-Nazi group Sons of Denmark terrorizes the Arab minority on the streets. The young Zakaria tries to resist and meets the mentor Ali, who drags him into a group of Islamists who plan to kill Nordahl.

title: Shao nian de ni
actors: Jackson Yee, Dongyu Zhou
