description: The shy Nian is trying to better prepare for the difficult exam that will allow her to enter the university but bullying her classmates does not help her much. The world of beauty is instead the street, with all its dark corners. One night, the paths of the two young people cross and nothing will ever be the same: when Nian's nemesis at school is found dead, the two are the first to be suspected.

title: Filles De Joie
actors: Sara Forestier, Annabelle Lengronne, Noémie Lvovsky, Nicolas Cazalé, Sergi López, Jonas Bloquet
description: During a hot summer, three women with nothing in common - Axelle, Conso and Dominique - cross the border between northern France and Belgium every day to go to work. To live decently, they move between Roubaix and Belgium to prostitute themselves in secret. During a storm, the three will find themselves united by a gesture of solidarity that will lead them to share a new secret that will bind them forever.

title: The Inventor: Out for Blood in Silicon Valley
actors: Elizabeth Holmes
description: Elizabeth Holmes arrived in Silicon Valley with a revolutionary medical invention that she called "the Edison": in essence, it was a small sophisticated black box capable of performing in a few minutes thanks to a single drop of blood over 200 medical tests. This would shortly obsolete all the laboratory techniques in use and the name of her climbed to the rank of celebrities such as Mark Zuckerberg, Steve Jobs and Thomas Edison himself. However, the problem arose some time later: everything was a well -thought out hoax and its company, first assessed nine billion dollars, gave rise to one of the most scandalous fraudulent bankruptcy in the history of Silicon Valley.

title: Yi miao zhong
actors: Yi Zhang, Wei Fan
description: In China, during the cultural revolution, in the middle of a lonely desert landscape, two people appear as two points on the horizon. The prisoner and the orphaned are not yet known but their paths will soon cross. He fled from a work field, risking an even longer sentence, and they are undertaken a tiring journey because he must necessarily see a particular cinegena. But this is exactly what the girl steals. While the inhabitants of the village impatiently await the projection, the film passes from hand of hand ...

title: Tutto l'oro che c'è
description: On an autumn day, the Ticino flows through a park in Lombardy north of Milan. Here, life continues with its course: birds, ants, deer and other wild animals notice little or nothing of the human presence. In particular, they hardly notice five different men: Rinaldo, an alluvial gold digger who has lived all his life on the river; Filippo, a boy who invents adventures in the trees and is creating a herbarium; Antonio, a naturist looking for a place to live naked in contact with nature; Giuseppe, a young local policeman who investigates missing men in the river; and Paolo, a hunter a little out of the rules.

title: Apollo 11
description: For the first time, the NASA archives make available rare and unpublished 70 mm videos of the Apollo 11 mission. In this way, you can see closely how America dreamed of the future from the gaze and conversations of astronauts, subjected to enormous pressure psychological in order for the mission to be successful.

title: Malchik russkiy
actors: Vladimir Korolev, Mikhail Buturlov, Artem Leshik, Filipp Dyachkov, Sergey Goncharenko, Danil Tyabin
description: In a World War I trench, a uniformed Russian boy loses his sight during a German gas attack. Thanks to his keen sense of hearing, he is kept in the forefront and is deployed to listen to enemy planes in the giant metal tubes that form a kind of warning system.

title: Serpentário
actors: João Arrais, Isabel Abreu, Carlos Conceição
description: A young man wanders through the landscapes of post apocalyptic Africa looking for the mother's ghost.

title: Un rubio
actors: Gaston Re, Alfonso Baron, Justo Calabria, Antonia De Michelis, Melissa Falter, Malena Irusta, Ailín Salas, Charly Velasco
description: When the reserved Gabo moves to live with the womanizer Juan, the two are initially hesitant to get to know each other. As their bond strengthens, their gazes also become more persistent and opportunities for touching each other increase. Over time, it becomes clear that they are unable to stop the inevitable. But is their attraction purely physical or does it hide something neither of them could ever have imagined?

title: Shirley
actors: Elisabeth Moss, Michael Stuhlbarg, Logan Lerman, Odessa Young, Ryan Spahn, Allen McCullough, Emily Decker, Thomas Racek, Tony Manna, Molly Fahey
description: Famous horror writer Shirley Jackson finds inspiration for her new book after welcoming a young couple into her home with her university professor husband Stanley.

title: La Cordillère des songes
description: The Andes mountain range occupies almost all of Chile. For Chileans, however, it represents an unknown territory, as beautiful as it is full of mysteries yet to be revealed.

title: Camille
actors: Nina Meurisse
description: The story of Camille Lepage, a young and talented French journalist who used to deal with the many conflicts in Africa. Lepage met death in 2014 at the age of 26 in an ambush in the Central African Republic.

title: Tu mourras a vingt ans
actors: Mustafa Shehata, Islam Mubarak, Mahmoud Alsarraj, Bonna Khalid, Hassan Ali, Mazin Ahmed, Moatasem Rashed, Talal Afifi
description: The day Muzamil was born, the Sheikh of his village predicted that he would die at the age of 20. Muzamil's father, unable to bear that sad fate, ran away from home. His mother, on the other hand, raised him with love and protection. For Muzamil, however, the day arrives when he turns 19 and his life takes an unexpected turn.

title: Nomad: In the Footsteps of Bruce Chatwin
actors: Bruce Chatwin
description: When legendary writer Bruce Chatwin was dying from the aftermath of AIDS, his friend Werner Herzog visited him one last time. As a viaticum, Chatwin gave him his backpack. Thirty years later, Herzog sets out on a very personal journey inspired by Chatwin's passion for nomadic life.

title: Primula Rossa
actors: Salvo Arena, David Coco, Fabrizio Ferracane, Ezio Rossi, Maurizio Marchetti, Roberto Herlitzka, Angelo Campolo, Gianni Fortunato, Francesco Guzzo, Giovanni Moschella, Mariano Nieddu, Ernesto Orrico
description: Ennio spent most of his life between prison and the judicial psychiatric hospital. His life is intertwined with that of other inmates of the criminal hospital and finds a new possibility in meeting the psychiatrist Lucio, determined to seek solutions capable of restoring citizenship rights to weak people and excluded from society.
notes: Inspired by the true story of Ezio Rossi, former terrorist of the NAP (Nuclei Armati Proletari).

title: Hotarubi no mori e
description: Hotaru every summer goes on vacation from the grandparents. During the train journey he remembers when at the age of 6 he was lost in the Yamagami forest, where in the moment of despair he appears Gin, a strange boy wearing a fox mask (Kitsune). Hotaru discovers that Gin is in Rractà a Yokai.
notes: Hotarubes No Mori and (The Light of the Forest of Lucciole) is a mediometraggio created by the Brain's Base Studio, directed by Takahiro Omeori, adaptation of the homonymous manga of Yuki Midorikawa.

title: Sam fu
actors: Meihuizi Zeng, Charm Man Chan
description: A wonderful prostitute pursues her profession while living on a boat in Hong Kong. Endowed with an almost superhuman libido and despite her three loving husbands, she stubbornly dedicates herself to her work.

title: Bergmál
actors: Ragnar Jónsson, Bjarki Thor
description: As Iceland prepares for the holidays, a strange atmosphere descends on the nation, leaving people excited and worried at the same time. In the middle of the countryside an abandoned farm catches fire, in a school a choir of children sings Christmas carols, in a slaughterhouse a chicken parades along a track, in a museum a woman discusses on the phone, in a living room a girl makes her grandmother try the his new virtual reality device ... Through a total of 59 different scenes, the bitter and tender portrait of modern society emerges.

title: Barn
actors: Henriette Steenstrup, Jan Gunnar Røise, Thorbjørn Harr, Brynjar Åbel Bandlien, Andrea Bræin Hovig, Hans Olav Brenner, Anne Marit Jacobsen, Ella Øverbye, Trine Wiggen, Adam Pålsson
description: 13-year-old Lykke, daughter of a prominent Labor Party politician, accidentally kills classmate Jamie, the son of a local right-wing politician. Although she claims it was an accident, no one believes her. The school principal, Liv, is an idealist who, despite her political beliefs, had a secret affair with Karl Erik, Jamie's father. When it becomes public knowledge, those around them react incredulously. Anders, Liv's brother, is Lykke and Jamie's teacher: supposedly he was in the schoolyard when the accident happened and is overcome with guilt for not being able to prevent it.

title: Pari
actors: Melika Foroutan, Bijan Daneshmand, Sofia Kokkali, Lena Kitsopoulou, Argiris Pantazaras, Shahbaz Noshir, Dimitris Xanthopoulos
description: Pari is a forty-year-old woman who hasn't heard from her son for some time, who disappeared after moving to amdara to study in Athens. The research to find it will lead her to the darkest corners of the city and to rediscover her deep desire for freedom.

title: Berliner
actors: Ion Sapdaru, Ovidiu Crisas, Sorin Cocis, Maria Junghietu
description: Viorel, a tractor driver from a small Romanian town, accidentally meets Mocanu, a high-level politician fighting for a seat in the European Parliament. Viorel and his wife welcome the man to their humble abode, where the politician decides to live until the end of the election campaign. Mocanu's plan is to win people's hearts and trust by showing up next to Viorel and posing as a common man.

actors: Nadine Labaki, Mohamad Dalli, Rodrigue Sleiman, Aliya Khalidi, Ghassan Maalouf
description: Summer 1982. 11-year-old Wissam is determined to reveal his loving feelings to classmate Joanna. Final exams are taking place in their school hidden by the mountains overlooking Beirut. As Wissam wishes to declare himself, an air invasion reaches the capital: the students are sent home. Unaware of what tomorrow will bring, Wissam will see his resolve grow by the minute.

title: Jeedar El Sot
actors: Karam Ghossein, Adel Chahine, Flavia Bechara, Issam Bou Khaled, Elie Choufani, Sahar Minkara Karame, Boutros Rouhana, Charles Hbeiliny
description: Lebanon, July 2006. War rages between Hezbollah and Israel when, during a 24-hour truce, Marwan goes in search of his father, who has refused to leave his village in the south, leaving his wife Rana alone to prepare. their journey to Canada. Marwan, however, finds no traces of his parent and the violated truce pushes him to take refuge in the house of Majib, a friend of his father. He will thus find himself trapped in a house with a group of elderly people while the bombing echoes in the distance. Suddenly, an Israeli group bursts into the first floor, starting three very difficult days.

title: Tantas Almas
actors: José Arley de Jesus Carvallido Lobo
description: Colombia, on the banks of the Magdalena River, 2002. José returns to his home in the middle of the jungle after a long night fishing and discovers that paramilitary forces have killed his two sons, Dionisio and Rafael, and threw their bodies into the river. José begins a lonely journey to recover the bodies and give them a proper burial, thus avoiding their souls from being trapped in this world. On board his canoe, José discovers the magic of a country torn by deep wounds.

title: Wo bu shi yao shen
actors: Zheng Xu, Yiwei Zhou, Chuan-jun Wang, Zhuo Tan, Yu Zhang, Xinming Yang, Yanhui Wang, Naiwen Li, Beibi Gong, Jiajia Wang
description: Cheng Yong is in financial trouble. His business hasn't been profitable for a long time and his father urgently needs a large sum of money for a brain operation. He thus accepts, in exchange for money, to bring a generic drug from India on behalf of a mysterious guy: a cheap version of a very expensive Swiss drug useful for treating patients suffering from leukemia. Thanks to the traffic, Cheng becomes very rich but things will not go well for him forever.

title: Gi-myo-han Ga-jok
actors: Jae-yeong Jeong, Ga-ram Jung, Nam-gil Kim, Soo-kyung Lee, Ji-won Uhm
description: Human Bio, Korea's largest pharmaceutical company, conducts illegal experiments on humans. One day a test doesn't go as it should and spawns a zombie. Soon, in the remote countryside, the Park family encounters the creature but, instead of being afraid of it, they plan to exploit it for gain, after discovering that a bite of it restores the lost virility to men.

title: Ang Hupa
actors: Piolo Pascual, Joel Lamangan, Pinky Amador, Shaina Magdayao, Hazel Orencio, Mara Lopez, Noel Miralles, Ian Lomongo, Joel Saracho
description: In 2034, Southeast Asia has been in darkness for three years: the sun was literally obscured by the massive volcanic eruptions in the Celebes Sea, which began in 2031. Countries, communities, enclaves and cities are controlled by madmen. Epidemics and cataclysms have razed the continent to the ground. Millions of people have died and others have left.

title: Huo zhe chang zhe
actors: Gan Guidan, Yan Xihu, Zhao Xiaoli
description: Zhao Li is the owner of a small traditional Chinese opera company on the outskirts of Chendgu. Over time, the economic situation of his theater has worsened and, as he faces the imminent destruction of his theater and neighborhood, Zhao has to fight the bureaucracy.

title: Lillian
actors: Patrycja Planik
description: Trapped in New York where she works as a porn actress, Lillian decides to return to her homeland, Russia, on foot. He will thus face a journey that from the United States to cold Alaska will turn into a slow disappearance.

title: Oleg
actors: Valentin Novopolskij, Dawid Ogrodnik, Anna Próchniak, Guna Zarina, Adam Szyszkowski, Toussaint Colombani, Ronald Beurms, Marcos Adamantiadis
description: Butcher Oleg leaves for Brussels to earn a decent salary at a local meat processing factory. His hopes will eventually fade when he realizes that Polish criminal Andrzej is in control of his life.

title: Gekijouban Fate/Stay Night: Heaven's Feel - II. Lost Butterfly
description: Fuyuki's Holy Grail War is raging. Teenager Shirou continues to take part in it, despite being eliminated as a teacher. By doing so, from day 9 to day 12, he will see his relationship with Sakura change.
notes: Follow-up to Fate / Stay Night: Heaven's Feel I. Presage Flower (2017).

title: Lucania Persa - Ritorno a San Cataldo
description: Director Luigi Di Gianni returns to shoot in San Cataldo, a town where in 1959 he made Birth and Death in the South. In Lucania persa, testimonies from San Cataldo alternate, archive images (excerpts from the 1959 documentary and photographic material from the director's archive) and interventions by Di Gianni himself. It is an attempt to consciously measure the changes that have taken place in San Cataldo since it was one of the poorest countries in Italy - whose extreme living conditions were in sharp contrast with the economic growth of the rest of the country - until today. At the same time, the documentary is a reflection on the film Birth and death in the south and on the difficult encounter between the inhabitants of San Cataldo and the camera.

title: Noche de fuego
actors: Mayra Batalla, Norma Pablo, Olivia Lagunas
description: Three girls live in a mountain resort where corn and poppies grow. They have cut hair like males and hide for the fear of being kidnapped. Ana and her two best friends grow up together and discover what it means to be women in a place marked by violence. Their mothers train them to avoid death or end slave. Together, they create an impenetrable universe but will not be able to hide forever.

title: La Virgen de Agosto
actors: Itsaso Arana, Vito Sanz, Joe Manjón, Isabelle Stoffel, Mikele Urroz, Luis Alberto Heras
description: In the hot summer months, when most of Madrid's residents leave the city to escape the sweltering heat, the city center is almost deserted. Only the tourists remain, those who are unable to leave and those who, like the charming thirty-year-old Eva, don't have a destination to grab and let themselves go to fleeting encounters and unexpected adventures.

title: Le maître est l'enfant
actors: Anny Duperey, Christian Maréchal, Alexandre Mourot
description: Alexandre Mourot, director and young father, observes his daughter experimenting and getting to know the world. Asking questions about his formation of her, he decides to go to the oldest Montessori school in France and to follow a class of children aged 3 to 6 for a year. In a welcoming classroom, children live in a surprisingly quiet atmosphere, free to perform their activities alone or with others.

title: Algunas Bestias
actors: Paulina Garcia, Alfredo Castro, Gastón Salgado, Andrew Bargsted, Nicolas Zarate, Millaray Lobos, Consuelo Carreño
description: With the intention of developing a tourist resort in mind, a family eagerly lands on an uninhabited island off the southern coast of Chile. When the man who brought them from the mainland disappears, the family remains a prisoner of the island. Their smiles quickly fade as the first cold ocean winds arrive, accompanied by the scarcity of drinking water. As tension builds, dark demons emerge from nowhere to complicate matters.

title: El principe
actors: Juan Carlos Maldonado, Alfredo Castro, Gastón Pauls, Sebastián Ayala, Lucas Balmaceda, Cesare Serra, José Antonio Raffo
description: Chile, 1970. Over an alcoholic night, Jaime, a lonely 20-year-old, stabs his best friend in what appears to be a passionate murder. Sentenced to prison, the boy meets "the stallion", a mature and respected man, in whom he finds protection and thanks to whom he knows love and loyalty. Behind bars Jaime becomes "the prince". But as the relationship between the two men solidifies, "the stallion" faces violent power struggles within the prison.

title: La mafia non è più quella di una volta
description: A journey into the mafia and the anti-mafia to take stock of what Palermo is and what it is becoming. Among others, the photographer Letizia Battaglia and her counterpart Ciccio Mira, impresario of neo-melodic singers, offer their point of view.

title: Western Stars
actors: Bruce Springsteen
description: Peerless singer-songwriter Bruce Springsteen performs live songs from his latest album, the critically acclaimed Western Stars, and reflects on themes such as life, rock and the American dream.

title: A Herdade
actors: Albano Jerónimo, Sandra Faleiro, Miguel Borges, Ana Vilela da Costa, João Vicente, João Pedro Mamede, Rodrigo Tomás, Beatriz Brás, Diogo Dória, Ana Bustorff
description: A Portuguese family owns one of the largest estates in Europe on the southern banks of the Tagus River. The events and secrets of the farm offer an insight into the historical, political, economic and social life of Portugal from the 1940s onwards.

title: Lessons of Love
actors: Leonardo Lidi, Alice Torriani, Giovanni De Giorgi, Giancarlo Previati, Sebastiano Fumagalli
description: Yuri is thirty years old and has never had a girlfriend. He runs the last remaining farm in a small mountain village with his father, but has never resigned himself to a solitary life. The love for Agata, a girl he met in a night club, is the decisive push that leads him to distance himself from a world he knows all too well but which he hasn't really chosen. Yuri tries to rebuild a life on the plain in the hope of finding the right dimension for himself and for Agata, but the choice of a new life involves sacrifices that he cannot - or does not want - to make to the end.

title: Verdict
actors: Max Eigenmann, Kristoffer King, Jordhen Suan, Rene Durian
description: Victim of abuse and mistreatment, Joy seeks justice against alcoholic husband Dante, starting a case that sends the Filipino judicial system itself into turmoil.

title: Metri Shesh Va Nim
actors: Payman Maadi, Navid Mohammadzadeh, Parinaz Izadyar, Farhad Aslani, Houman Kiai, Maziar Seyedi, Ali Bagheri, Marjan Ghamari, Yusef Khosravi
description: The police are on the trail of a drug lord named Naser Khakzad. When he finally manages to capture him, he tries every possible way to escape and save his family.

title: Babenco - Alguém tem que ouvir o coração e dizer: parou
actors: Willem Dafoe, Selton Mello, Hector Babenco, Fernanda Montenegro, Fernanda Torres, Bárbara Paz, Paulo José, Xuxa Lopes, Regina Braga, Dráuzio Varella
description: A cross of two different nationalities and a master of the moving image, Hector Babenco has done a bit of everything in his life: from the grave seller to the appearance in spaghetti westerns, from the photographer to the Oscar-nominated director. Controversial, controversial, demanding and ingenious, he won at Locarno, competed in Cannes, shone in Hollywood and directed such giants as Meryl Streep, Jack Nicholson and Willem Dafoe. His wife Bárbara Paz pays homage to him by retracing his memories, memories, dreams, life and deaths: just as he lived many lives, he died many times.

title: Madame
actors: Stephane Riethauser, Caroline Della Beffa
description: Caroline is an elderly lady who immediately makes it clear that behind the flirtatious hairstyle and bourgeois manner there is more than a strong character. The film, which focuses on her relationship with her nephew Stéphane Riethauser (the director), is a double self-portrait in which the homosexual matriarch and grandson confide in each other.
notes: The documentary deconstructs gender stereotypes in a humorous and subversive way, tracing, with the addition of archive images, a family saga of bourgeois society.

title: Kuessipan
actors: Brigitte Poupart, Étienne Galloy, Yamie Grégoire, Sharon Ishpatao Fontaine, Anniss Desterres, Mike Innu Papu Mckenzie, Roselyn Fontaine, Douglas Grégoire, Mikupishan Poirier, Billy-Jack Jourdain
description: Two childhood friends from the same Quebec Innu community soon begin to realize they have many different futures ahead of them.
notes: From a novel by Naomi Fontaine.

title: Shin seiki Evangelion Gekijô-ban: Air/Magokoro wo, kimi ni
description: Seele's secret plan takes shape, and Nerv headquarters comes under attack. While the Nerv employees try in vain to defend themselves and become victims of a real massacre, Gendo takes Rei with him and decides to start the union between Adam and Lilith, but is first stopped by Ritsuko (who pays his attempt with his life. ) and then by Rei herself. Meanwhile Misato saves Shinji from the military attack, and sends Asuka to fight against the Eva Series launched by Seele, both Misato and Asuka will not survive their respective missions. Shinji, shocked by the end of Misato and Asuka, as well as by the appearance of the gigantic Lilith, who embodies the essence of her mother and Rei Ayanami, let the Evangelion Unit 01 become the instrument designated by the Seele to start the Third Impact and carry out the Project for the Improvement of Man. All the AT Fields on the planet fail, and every living thing returns to the primordial stage of LCL. Shinji's spirit confronts those of Rei, Kaworu and Yui, leaving a glimmer of hope for the possibility that living beings can recreate their individual identities.

title: Mahnaz Mohammadi
actors: Raha Khodayari, Mahan Nasiri, Reza Behboodi, Shiva Ordooie, Maryam Boubanii
description: A widow and mother of two works tirelessly in a ruined factory in Iran, gripped by sanctions. One day, she receives a marriage proposal that can guarantee her the right economic stability but which risks separating her forever from her family. To suffer the decisions of his actions will be above all the eldest son who, not even a teenager, is called to manage a heavy weight.

title: The 20th Century
actors: Dan Beirne, Mikhaïl Ahooja, Sarianne Cormier, Catherine St-Laurent, Brent Skagford, Sean Cullen, Louis Negin, Kee Chan, Trevor Anderson, Emmanuel Schwartz
description: Toronto, 1899. Aspiring politician Mackenzie King hesitates in love between a heroic British soldier whom he believes he is destined to marry and a nurse from Quebec, a spinster suffering from psoriasis. Thus he discovers what unrequited love and complete humiliation mean.

title: Três Verões
actors: Regina Case, Rogério Fróes, Otávio Müller
description: Over the course of three summers, a keeper of luxury condominiums relies on her resourcefulness and her eye to seize good opportunities to take advantage of whatever comes to her.

title: Memoria
actors: Tilda Swinton, Jeanne Balibar, Daniel Gimenez Cacho, Juan Pablo Urrego, Elkin Diaz
description: Jessica lives in Medellìn but is temporarily in Bogota to assist her sister. One day she begins to hear a violent and inexplicable noise that leads her to start a research path, between spirit and medicine. To try to identify its origin, he will first turn to a sound technician, then, between one wandering and the other, he will end up near the home of a mysterious man.

title: Depeche Mode: Spirits in the Forest
description: Immersing the stories of six very special Depeche Mode fans, the documentary intertwines hilarious musical performances from the Global Spirit Tour at Berlin's famous Waldbühne ("Forest Stage") with intimate footage shot in the fans' hometown. It also shows how the band's popularity and relevance have continued to grow and provides a unique glimpse into the incredible power of music to build communities, empower people to overcome adversity and make connections across the boundaries of language, gender, age. and circumstance.

title: Lunana: A Yak in the Classroom
actors: Sherab Dorji, Kelden Lhamo Gurung, Ugyen Norbu Lhendup, Sonam Tashi, Pem Zam, Tshering Dorji
description: Fight with the profession that has been chosen, Ugyen is disappointed by learning that for his last year of internship he will be sent to a school in the Lunana, in the northern bhutan, where you arrive after seven days of hard walking on foot. The high altitude and the lack of the most elementary things would push Ugyen to leave just arrived but in short the local children try to conquer it. However, they don't have much time available: Ugyen will have to make a decision before the arrival in the icy winter blocks him on the Himalaya.

title: Richard Jewell
actors: Paul Walter Hauser, Sam Rockwell, Kathy Bates, Jon Hamm, Olivia Wilde, Nina Arianda, Ian Gomez, Wayne Duvall, Randy Havens, Mitchell Hoog
description: During the Atlanta Olympics in 1996 a bomb exploded, killing one person. To avert a massacre is the work of Richard Jewell, a security guard who, finding a suspicious backpack, evacuates the area where he is. However, it won't be long before suspicions focus on him, upsetting his existence.

title: Nessun nome nei titoli di coda
actors: Antonio Spoletini
description: In cinema circles, if you say "extras", you say Spoletini: five Trasteverini brothers who, starting after the war, have sought the right faces for Italian and international cinema passed through Rome. Of the five, Antonio, at eighty years old, is still there , on its battlefield, Cinecittà. As the idea of ??an end approaches, like every man, he would like to leave a name in the credits.

title: Nam-san Si-in Sal-in-sa-geon
actors: Kim Sang-kyung, Heo Sung-tae, Sun-Young Park, Dong-Young Kim, Ji-soon Jung, Yeon-woo Nam, Sung-jin Nam
description: At the end of the autumn of 1953, after the Korea war, the Oriental coffee in a close alley of Myungong is the ideal meeting place and hiding place for the artists. One afternoon, Gichae Kim, military counterintelligence supervisor enters there: announcing the murder of the poet Duhwan Baek, a habitual customer of the restaurant, is in charge of investigating it. As the investigations deepen, customers begin to suspect each other. But who is the culprit? The situation is destined to complicate when the young university university Yujung Choi is also found dead.

title: Beo-ti-go
actors: Woo-hee Chun, Teo Yoo, Jae-kwang Jeong
description: The extension of his employment contract for a technological society, scheduled for some time, puts further anxiety in the life of Seoyeong, a young woman already sold out because of the selfish mother. In the grip of continuous tinnitus and dizziness, Seoyeong finds relief only in the secret love relationship with Jinsu, the head of her. However, this aspect is also soon questioned by the arrival of Gwan-Woo, the new wash of the skyscraper in which the young woman works.

title: Sono innamorato di Pippa Bacca
description: Two women, two artists in a wedding dress. A journey to Jerusalem through countries ravaged by wars. 6000 km to travel by hitchhiking, to celebrate the marriage between peoples and show that trusting others can only be received well. This was the intent of Pippa Bacca and Silvia Moro when, on March 8, 2008, they left Milan to stage a performance in the sign of peace. An artistic performance tragically interrupted by the death of one of the two brides.

title: Lupin the IIIrd: Chikemuri no Ishikawa Goemon
description: Hawk, on the surface, looks like a bearded mountaineer like many others, busy carving tree trunks with his ax. In reality he is a ruthless killer destined to clash with the samurai Goemon, who is doing the bodyguard to a leader of the Japanese Yakuza, who, however, dies at the hands of Hawk. Defeated and humiliated, Goemon prepares for the second fight against the ax killer.
notes: Film that celebrates the fiftieth anniversary of the Lupine III manga by Monkey Punch, directed with the same grim and violent style of Takeshi Koike's previous film from 2014, dedicated to Jigen the gunslinger. The scene is all for Goemon the samurai, while Lupine, Fujiko and Jigen have only a secondary role, as well as the inspector Zenigata.

title: Dorogie tovarischi
actors: Yuliya Vysotskaya, Vladislav Komaro, Andrei Gusev, Yulia Burova, Sergei Erlish
description: USSR, Novocherkassk, 1962. Lyudmila is a member of the local communist party, a staunch militant who has an unshakeable faith in communist ideals and a profound contempt for all forms of dissent. During a workers' demonstration in a locomotive factory, the woman witnesses a shooting on demonstrators ordered by the government to suppress the strike: an event that will forever change her vision of the world. Many injured and many missing, the city is devastated by arrests, summary sentences and curfews. And in those days Lyudmila's daughter disappears into thin air. For the woman thus begins a frantic, yet risky, relentless and relentless search - despite the blockade of the city, arrests and attempts at cover-up by the authorities.

title: Tensión sexual, Volumen 1: Volátil
actors: Lucas Lagré, Mario Verón, Javier De Pietro, Lautaro Machaca, Maximiliano Franco, Leo Martinez, Guido Gastaldi, Jair Toledo, Santiago Caamaño, Hernan Muñoa
description: An anthology of six episodes directed by Marco Berger and Marcelo Mónaco that tell six different forms and situations of homoerotic tension. In “Ari”, a young boy falls in love with his tattoo artist; in “El primo”, a boy is a guest of a close friend of his and shares a room with his cousin, a boy with uninhibited habits; in "El otro", two boys, friends since childhood, exchange tips on how to have sex with a girl; in “Los brazos rotos”, an injured man who cannot use his arms and hands is assigned a nurse to wash, clean and dress him; in “Amor”, a couple is having difficulty with the shower in a farmhouse room, so she asks the manager to fix it, just as her boyfriend has to use it; in “Entrenamiento”, two muscular guys with a passion for fitness begin to undress and become more uninhibited to send photos to girls via cell phones.

title: Le 1000 vite di Bud Spencer
actors: Bud Spencer
description: Carlo Pedersoli has lived a thousand different lives. With this name he probably lived only one, the most intimate and familiar. For the rest of the world, in fact, Carlo Pedersoli is Bud Spencer, Italian actor, screenwriter and television producer. Born in Naples in 1929, his comfort-zone was in water. After numerous prizes conquered in the swimming pools of Italy and the world between swimming and water polo, its sympathy entered the big screen first and then in the homes of all Italians, often together with his friend Terence Hill. Through unpublished family movies, exclusive backstage of his films and interviews with family members, the incredible story of Bud Spencer is told, going through curiosity little known as his past as an entrepreneur and plane pilot.

title: Asa ga Kuru
actors: Hiromi Nagasaku, Arata Iura, Aju Makita, Reo Sato, Hiroko Nakajima, Tetsu Hirahara, Ren Komai, Miyoko Asada, Taketo Tanaka
description: Satoko and her husband Kiyokazu, after a long and painful fertility treatment, have chosen to resort to adoption to have a child of their own. Six years later, they receive a call from a woman who, declaring herself the biological mother of the child, is ready to extort as much money from them as possible.

title: Nowhere Special
actors: James Norton, Daniel Lamont, Eileen O'Higgins, Valene Kane, Keith McErlean, Sean Sloan, Laura Hughes
description: John, a 35-year-old window cleaner, has dedicated his life to raising his three-year-old son Michael since the baby's mother abandoned them shortly after giving birth. When he discovers he has only a few months of life ahead of him, John tries to find a new family who can welcome Michael and protect him from the terrible reality that awaits him. But how can he determine what makes a perfect family or what is best for Michael?

title: Soul
description: Joe Gardner teaches music in a middle school, loves jazz and dreams of musical perfection, hoping to get to play in an important club well known to fans. Just when he is about to have his chance, Joe falls into a grate that has been left open and, due to the fall, his soul leaves his body. Thus begins a journey for Joe that will lead him to reflect on what is really important in his life and in that of each of us.

title: It's Christmas, Carol!
actors: Emmanuelle Vaugier, Carrie Fisher, Carson Kressley, Olivia Cheng, Tygh Runyan, Patti Allan, Chelah Horsdal, Rebecca Davis, Susan Hogan, Robin Douglas, Jim Thorburn
description: Carol Huffler, a ruthless and heartless editorial executive, receives a visit from the ghost of Eva, her former boss, on Christmas Eve. She shows her how she has lost sight of what really matters in life and what mistakes she has made by showing her the Christmases of her past, present and future.

title: Staging Christmas
actors: Soleil Moon Frye, George Stults, Jaleel White, Mia Clark, Karina Segura, Karli Hall, Malinda Money, Kelsie Elena, Richard Benedict, Yolanda Stange
description: Lori for work deals with renovating and threatening houses and the most intense season for its business is Christmas. Although she normally deals with properties for sale, she accepts with curiosity the request of the rich widower Elliot to rearrange her home for the holidays in order to make her daughter Maddie happy. Love will be around the corner, ready to make the Christmas that will come perfect and unforgettable.

title: Holiday Date
actors: Matt Cohen, Brittany Bristow, Teryl Rothery, Bruce Boxleitner, Anna Van Hooft, Ava Grace Cooper, Peter Benson, Edward Ruttle, Shannon Chan-Kent, Matty Finochio
description: Leaving by boyfriend Ethan shortly before the Christmas holidays, Brooke agrees to return home with Joel, an actor who will pretend his boyfriend. By transforming him into the perfect man, she realizes that, because of her Jewish origins, Joel has never celebrated Christmas. When the whole family discovers Joel's origins, everyone will be happy to integrate the traditions of Hanukkah to those of the Christian festival. However, suspicions about her fake boyfriend identity will be born.

title: Cowspiracy: The Sustainability Secret
actors: Lisa Agabian, Manucher Alemi, Lindsey Allen, Kip Andersen, Will Anderson, Deniz Bolbol, Heather Cooley, Kamyar Guivetchi, Bruce Hamilton, Susan Hartland
description: Documentary that follows the path of self-awareness of co-director Kip Andersen on the need to reduce the consumption of meat and its derivatives.
notes: Produced by Leonardo DiCaprio.

title: The Father
actors: Anthony Hopkins, Olivia Colman, Rufus Sewell, Imogen Poots, Olivia Williams, Mark Gatiss, Evie Wray
description: Now elderly, a father refuses all forms of care and assistance from his daughter. As he tries to make sense of his inevitably changing existence, he begins to doubt everyone he loves, his mind, and even his own reality.

title: The Painter and the Thief
description: An artist makes friends with the drug addict thief who stole his paintings. He even becomes his closest friend and helper when the man is injured in a car accident and needs full -time care, despite his paintings are not found. One day, however, the cards change on the table.

title: Can't Buy My Love
actors: Adelaide Kane, Benjamin Hollingsworth, Jean Louisa Kelly, James Remar, Rodrigo Rojas, Andrea Bordeaux, Lamon Archey, Alesha Renee, Brian Chin, Nadine Ellis
description: Lilly, a young paramedical that works hard, is concentrated only on her occupation and on her future in the field of medicine. For this reason, when the rich slaughter Jeff enters his life, at first he doesn't want to have anything to do with him. As he spends time with him, he will understand that he cannot judge people from the appearance.

title: Yi zhi you dao hai shui bian lan
description: The director Jia Zhangke tells about his literature festival held in Shanxi, China. Every year, an ever -growing number of Chinese writers take part, all highly esteemed and belonging to different generations.

title: We Are the Thousand
description: 1000 musicians from all over Italy find themselves in Cesena to play Learn to Fly of the Foo Fighters with the aim of convincing Dave Grohl to make a concert in the city. The video of the event reaches over 45 million views on YouTube, and the Rockin'1000 make their dream come true: the Foo Fighters decide to go and play in Cesena. In reality this is only the beginning of the adventure of 1000, which are in all respects the largest rock band in the world and which continue to perform in increasingly numerous formations.

title: A Metamorfose dos Pássaros
actors: Manuel Rosa, João Móra, Ana Vasconcelos, Henrique Vasconcelos, Inês Campos, Catarina Vasconcelos, Ana Sofia Domingues Cabeça, Anita Carvalho, Ana Fernandes da Silva, Henrique Serpa de Vasconcelos
description: Beatriz and Henrique married the day she turned 21. Marina's officer, Henrique spent long periods at sea while on the mainland Beatriz learned everything about the plants and took care of the six children of her. Jacinto, the eldest of these, dreamed of a bird one day but one day Beatriz died. Years later, the same fate touched Jacinto's wife, leaving him with his seventeen -year -old daughter Catarina: from that moment on, father and daughter had to redefine their relationship.

title: Otac
actors: Goran Bogdan, Boris Isakovic, Nikola Rakocevic, Nada Sargin, Ljubomir Bandovic, Jovo Maksic, Mirko Vlahovic, Milica Janevski, Vahid Dzankovic, Ajla Santic
description: Nikola sees her children being taken away. According to social workers, he is too poor to offer them a decent lifestyle. He then decides to file a complaint in Belgrade with the hope of obtaining justice.

title: Just My Type
actors: Bethany Joy Lenz, Brett Dalton, Aleque Reid, Colleen Wheeler, Fred Keating, Michele Scarabelli, Rebecca Olson, John Innes, Carmen Moore
description: Vanessa writes of pop culture in New York. She aspiring novelist, she has her great opportunity when she interviews the renowned yellowist Martin Clayborne. Despite a not very easy beginning, passing with him a long time, Vanessa will understand that beyond the work there is something else that attracts it in Martin.

title: Felicità
actors: Pio Marmaï, Camille Rutherford, Rita Merle
description: Eleven-year-old Tommy is on the road again with her quirky parents. This time, her father (recently released from prison) has promised her he won't let her miss the first day of school. At least that's what he told her before he stole a sports car, his mother disappeared and everything got out of hand.

title: Nieva en Benidorm
actors: Timothy Spall, Sarita Choudhury, Ana Torrent, Carmen Machi, Pedro Casablanc
description: Peter Riordan is a lonely, obsessive and methodical man. For him, although soon, the time has come to retire from the Banca di Manchester where he worked all his life. Rather than staying still, Peter decides to visit his brother Daniel, who lives in Benidorm, Spain. Upon arrival, however, he discovers that Daniel has long since disappeared and that he was the owner of a Burlesque club. In the club, Alex works, a woman with an irresistible charm. Together, the two will try to understand what happened to Daniel, helped by a policeman obsessed with Sylvia Plath and his stay in the 1950s in the town, who at the time was only a small fishing village.

title: Storie di pietre
description: What drives the small community of Frascaro, a fraction of Norcia, to remain tied to a land that never stops shaking? What moves its inhabitants to dig with their bare hands in the rubble of a church, the symbol of a small peasant hamlet? A crucifix to be reassembled for the patronal procession, a canvas buried under the stones to be recovered, become emblems of resilience, proud belonging, defense of a culture that wants to remain alive, a challenge to post-earthquake isolation. Not far away, a group of restorers works in San Salvatore in Campi to save fragments of a priceless artistic heritage crumbled by the effects of the earthquake, while, in his hermitage at a thousand meters above sea level, a monk lives in compliance with the ora et labora rule, in harmony with nature and not at all intimidated by a land he has learned to love.

title: Sheytan vojud nadarad
actors: Ehsan Mirhosseini, Shaghayegh Shourian, Kaveh Ahangar, Alireza Zareparast, Salar Khamseh, Darya Moghbeli, Mahtab Servati, Mohammad Valizadegan, Mohammad Seddighimehr, Jila Shahi, Baran Rasoulof
description: Four different stories take stock of issues such as moral strength and the death penalty. To what extent in a despotic regime with its inevitable threats and dangers is an individual free to make his own choices?

title: Frantsuz
actors: Antoine Rival, Evgeniya Obraztsova, Thomas Alden, Aleksandr Baluev, Mikhail Efremov, Roman Madyanov, Anna Neverova, Evgeniy Tkachuk
description: In 1957 the French student Pierre Duran arrives in Moscow for an internship at the State University. Here he gets to know Kira Galkina, a Bolshoi dancer, and the photographer Valera Uspensky. Thanks to this knowledge, Pierre immerses himself in the cultural life of the Russian capital, both official and clandestine. Over the course of a year he will have the opportunity to experience the city with a completely different perspective from the one he imagined. However, he will not forget the other great reason for his trip: to look for his father, an officer arrested in the late thirties.

title: Moj jutarnji smeh
actors: Filip Djuric, Ivana Vukovic, Jasna Djuricic, Nebojsa Glogovac, Bratislav Slavkovic, Djordje Djokovic, Sonja Isailovic, Aleksandar Mitrovic, Simic Momcilo, Ema Muratovic
description: Dejan is nearly thirty years old but is still a virgin. As he tries to repress the turmoil that comes from living under the same roof with his drunken father and overprotective mother, he tries to figure out if he can have more than just a friendship with Kaca, a pretty girl he works with. After being humiliated during a session by the analyst, Dejan realizes that he has nothing more to lose and that he must try the impossible to make his life at least bearable.

title: Tipografic majuscul
actors: Serban Pavlu, Alexandru Potocean, Ioana Iacob, Constantin Dogioiu, Silvian Vâlcu, Bogdan Zamfir, Serban Lazarovici
description: In 1981, chalk slogans appeared on billboards in the Romanian city of Botosani. They were words that praised freedom, hinted at the democratic processes underway in other socialist nations, or simply called for improvements in food supply. Behind it all was Mugur C? Linescu, as documented by the Romanian secret police. Gianina Carbunariu, theater director, has created a show on the subject that the filmmaker Radu Jude resumes to alternate with archival footage from Romanian television under the Ceau? Escu regime.

title: Sous le ciel d'Alice
actors: Alba Rohrwacher, Wajdi Mouawad, Isabelle Zighondi, Mariah Tannoury, Jade Breidi, Odette Makhlouf, Hany Tamba, John Chelhot, Greta Zighondi, Chloé Zighondi, Charbel Kamel, Ziad Jallad, Cécile Moubarak
description: In the 1950s, the young Alice left the Natie Swiss mountains for the sunny and lively beaches of Beirut. Here she falls in love with Joseph, an extravagant astrophysicist who wishes to send the first Lebanese to space. Over the years the two will build around themselves a happy oasis with their two children and friends. The looming of the civil war will threaten their Eden.

title: Les héroïques
actors: François Creton, Romeo Creton, Richard Bohringer, Ariane Ascaride, Patrick d'Assumçao, Clotilde Courau, Clara Ponsot, Chad Chenouga
description: Maxime, a former drug addict, is an eternal child who loves the engines and who likes to hang around with the eldest son Leo and his friends. At fifty years, he finds himself having to deal with his son just had from his ex and to fight so as not to repeat the same mistakes made in the past. For the first time in his life, he will try to be what a good man is said.

title: Europa
actors: Adam Ali, Svetlana Yancheva, Mohamed Zouaoui, Michael Segal, Ivan Forlani, Ahmet Oztürk
description: Kaman, an Iraqi who tries to walk into Europe via the border between Turkey and Bulgaria, is captured by a group of Bulgarian vigilantes who call themselves migrant hunters. However, he manages to escape and, pursued relentlessly and mercilessly, he finds himself lost in a seemingly boundless forest, in a world where there are no rules or laws. For three days and three nights, he will be forced to fight for his life in an increasingly tense and violent climate.

title: Guardiamoli negli occhi
description: A look at the local Resistance, along the places and paths that have brought great history to intersect with small everyday stories. A path of interviews, atmospheres and landscapes that aims to be an occasion for memory and reflection on how much that Liberation cost which, even many decades later, we are called to remember.

title: La cura
actors: Francesco Di Leva, Peppe Lanzetta, Cristina Donadio, Alessandro Preziosi, Francesco Mandelli
description: Particular reinterpretation of the novel The plague of Albert Camus, shot in a deserted Naples in full Covid-19 emergency.

title: Guai Tai
actors: Nikki Hsieh, Austin Lin
description: Po-ching suffers from obsessive-compulsive disorder that forces him to constantly wash his hands. Ching, on the other hand, suffers from an obsessive-compulsive disorder that forces her to cover herself from head to toe as if a biological war was underway. For society they are outsiders, for destiny they are two soul mates who sooner or later have to meet.

title: Changfeng Town
actors: Gang Chen, Han Chen
description: The town of Changfeng is located in a little known and visible corner of China. Citizens know each other well and are content with what they have. Their lives, often characterized by eccentricity and uniqueness, are told through five interconnected chapters, in which joy and sadness intertwine without ever losing hope.

title: Amai osake de ugai
actors: Yasuko Matsuyuki, Haru Kuroki, Kanji Furutachi, Makoto Izubuchi, Katsuya Koiso, Tomoya Maeno, Kazuhiro Nakahara, Kôzô Satô, Hiroya Shimizu, Daichi Watanabe
description: Yoshiko is a woman in her forties, single and childless. She works in a publishing house and indulges in some small pleasures by having lunch with some colleague or drinking grappa alone at home. Hers is a peaceful existence until the day she is introduced to Yoshiko, a boy 24 years younger than her.

title: Romansu dôru
actors: Yû Aoi, Kenta Hamano, Kitarô, Tôko Miura, Kôji Ohkura, Issey Takahashi, Pierre Taki, Eri Watanabe
description: The one between Sonoko and Tetsuo was a predestined love. They got married and became husband and wife without asking too many questions. Apparently everything is fine but each of them has a secret: Sonoko does not know that Tetsuo produces inflatable dolls while she keeps something hidden from him that she will soon reveal to him. Will their marriage, already without passion, resist?

title: Aenne Burda: Die Wirtschaftswunderfrau
actors: Katharina Wackernagel, Fritz Karl, Luise Wolfram, Annika Olbrich, Jean-Yves Berteloot, Hansa Czypionka, Lior Kudrjawizki, Martina Eitner-Acheampong
description: Offenburg, 1949. The economic situation in post-war Germany is clearly improving. Franz Burda's printing house and publishing house are doing well and the man can offer his wife Aenne and three children a wealthy life. However, she does not take Aenne's idea of ??starting a fashion magazine seriously that offers women sewing patterns of chic clothes to make with their own hands. Aenne, on the other hand, is convinced of her gimmick and the discovery of her husband's betrayal will help her to realize her desire.

title: La traversée
description: In a disastrous village, in an unspecified Eastern European location, a family is forced to flee. Kyona and Adriel, the two older children, soon separate from parents in front of the road alone. Thus begin a heroic journey that will see them grow in search of refuge, peace and hope for their family. Crossing a continent torn by the war and the persecution of migrants, they will survive incredible challenges before reaching a new world, where they will finally be free.

title: Bilmemek
actors: Emir Ozden, Senan Kara, Yurdaer Okur, Levent Üzümcü, Çetin Sarikartal, Ulascan Kutlu, Arda Aranat, Berke Bük, Sanem Öge, Özgür Daniel Foster
description: Selma and Sinan are in crisis. Umut, their son, attends high school, plays water polo and would like to demonstrate something to himself but, like his parents, he too is dissatisfied with his life. When a partner puts around the rumor that Umut is gay, he refuses to comment, convinced that those are and must remain alone and exclusively his business. However, his persistent silence ends up aggravating the situation at home until one day, suddenly, Umut disappears. As they are looking for their son, Selma and Sinan realize they have lost: they must come to the head of their lives, but they don't know where to start.

title: Pohani dorogy
actors: Sergei Solovyov, Yuliya Matrosova, Maryna Klimova, Ekaterina Zhdanovich, Andrey Lelyukh, Anastasia Parshina, Oksana Voronina, Igor Koltovskyy, Zoya Baranovskaya, Anna Zhurakovskaya
description: Four stories set along the streets of Donbass in war. There are no safe places and nobody can make sense of what is happening. Although they are trapped in chaos, some still manage to exercise an authority on others. But in this world, where tomorrow may never come, not everyone is unhappy and defenseless. Even the most innocent victims can have their opportunity to take control.
notes: Taken from a theatrical work by the same director Natalya Vorozhbit.

title: David Byrne's American Utopia
actors: David Byrne
description: David Byrne, musical innovator and former Talking Heads frontman, holds a show on Broadway, where he shares the stage with 11 musicians from around the world. On stage, Byrne raises social and political issues, revealing how even in times that are not particularly easy, entertainment has the power to keep people together.

title: I Never Cry
actors: Zofia Stafiej, David Pearse, Arkadiusz Jakubik, Tomasz Zietek, Cosmina Stratan, Kinga Preis, Paul Boyle, Ann-Marie O'Connor
description: Ola, seventeen years old from a small Polish city, starts alone for Ireland with the heavy task of bringing the body of his father back home, who died in a construction site. What she wants is to know if her father spared the money for the car she promised her, but during the journey she will have the opportunity to understand that what she really presses is to reconcile with the memory of the parent of she. In Ireland, he will also meet a different world and people who will change his approach to life.

title: Felkészülés meghatározatlan ideig tartó együttlétre
actors: Natasa Stork, Viktor Bodó, Benett Vilmányi, Zsolt Nagy, Péter Tóth, Andor Lukáts, Attila Mokos, Linda Moshier, Júlia Ladányi, Réka Pelsöczy
description: Márta, a forty -year -old neurosurgery, meets a Hungarian doctor during a medical conference in New Jersey and falls madly in love with it. For this reason, she leaves behind the brilliant and profitable career of her undertaken in the United States and returns to Budapest to start a new life with the man she loves. However, he does not present himself at the appointment at the Ponte della Libertà. After a useless wait, he tries desperately and when he finally finds him, the man replies that he has never seen her before. It begins, for Márta, a solitary love obsession that could be real or the result of his imagination.

title: Tengo Miedo Torero
actors: Alfredo Castro, Leonardo Ortizgris, Julieta Zylberberg, Amparo Noguera, Luis Gnecco, Sergio Hernández, Ezequiel Díaz, Paulina Urrutia, Gastón Salgado, Erto Pantoja
description: Amid the political turmoil during Pinochet's dictatorship in Chile in the 1980s, a no longer young queer lady gets involved in a very risky clandestine operation after falling in love with a guerrilla who asks him to turn the house into a den of the revolution .
notes: Film adaptation of the first and only novel by Pedro Lemebel, an iconic name in queer culture.

title: Konferentsiya
actors: Natalya Pavlenkova, Natalya Potapova, Filipp Avdeev, Yan Tsapnik, Natalya Tsvetkova, Anna Slyu, Natalya Batrak, Aleksandr Zlatopolskiy, Oleg Feoktistov, Aleksandr Semchev
description: Natalia, a nun in a remote Russian monastery, returns to Moscow seventeen years after the terrorist attack at the Dubrovka theater. It is there to organize a commemorative evening in honor of the victims of the attack, which took place in October 2002. Natalia and her family also witnessed that tragic event. Almost forgotten by the outside world, the organizers and participants in the commemoration, indeed at the conference (as they were asked to officially call the meeting), feel they were warned as a weight from the rest of the company. While following the chronology of events through the voice of some witnesses, the dark details of Natalia's personal history emerge.

title: Saint-Narcisse
actors: Andreas Apergis, Cameron Geller, Jillian Harris, Félix-Antoine Duval, Alexandra Petrachuk, Jonathan Emond, Michel Eid, Tania Kontoyanni, Thomas Niles, Michael Czyz
description: Canada, 1972. Dominic, twenty-two, has a fetish: himself. Nothing excites him more than his image. For this reason, he spends most of his time taking selfies with a Polaroid. When her loving grandmother dies, she uncovers two deep family-related secrets: her lesbian mother did not die in childbirth and her twin brother, Daniel, who was raised by a depraved priest, lives in a remote monastery. The force of destiny brings the two beautiful and identical brothers together. And after reuniting with Beatrice, their mother, they immediately become involved in a strange web of sex, revenge and redemption.

title: Dashte khamoush
actors: Ali Bagheri, Farrokh Nemati, Majid Farhang, Mahdieh Nassaj, Touraj Alvand
description: A factory still produces bricks in the traditional way. Many families of different ethnicities work in the facility and the boss seems to have the key to solving everyone's problems. Forty-year-old Lotfollah, born on the spot, is the supervisor of the facility and acts as an intermediary between workers and boss. He is responsible for bringing the workers together to notify them of the closure of the plant. However, all the man worries about is keeping Sarvar safe, the woman he's been in love with for a long time.

title: Lahi, hayop
actors: Bart Guingona, DMs Boongaling, Nanding Josef, Hazel Orencio, Joel Saracho, Noel Sto. Domingo
description: The film is an exploration of the animal instinct inherent in man: violent, aggressive, obsessive, transgressive, imposing, envious, territorial and narcissistic. Many humans still retain the behavior and characteristics of chimpanzees. However, there is still a glimmer of hope that allows some to self-fulfill and perfect their true selves.

title: Bu zhi bu xiu
actors: Bai-Ke, Kesi Fu, Zhangke Jia, Miao Miao, Hailu Qin, Yang Song, Lie Wang, Songwen Zhang, Yemang Zhou
description: In the early 2000s, Han Dong dreams of becoming a journalist and for this reason he refused a steady job in his hometown to move to Beijing. In the Chinese capital, however, he struggles to survive. Fortunately, he has the opportunity to do an internship in a newspaper. An episode that happened to his girlfriend will put him in front of a difficult choice.

title: Fireball: Visitors from Darker Worlds
actors: Werner Herzog, Clive Oppenheimer
description: Werner Herzog and Clive Oppenheimer undertake an exploration around the world to understand the consequences and effects on our planet of the passage (and eventual fall) of meteorites and comets, taking into account ancient religions, ancestral traditions and cultural impacts.

title: Le Peuple Loup
description: In 17th-century Ireland, County Kilkenny falls to English settlers after a bloody siege. On Oliver Cromwell's orders, young apprentice huntress Robyn Goodfellowe and her father Bill arrive from England to track down and kill the last of the wolves living in the Irish woods. Adventurous and rebellious, Robyn sneaks into the forest and discovers a world quite different from the one known to date. He thus has the opportunity to meet Mebh, a wild girl raised by wolves, and to befriend her. He will then understand how the real enemy is different from what he believed.

title: Ricky Gervais: Humanity
actors: Ricky Gervais
description: An hour and twenty of comic monologue by one of the greatest interpreters of the genre, the British Ricky Gervais; among the arguments the politically correct, the overpopulation of the planet and the social differences.

title: My Octopus Teacher
actors: Craig Foster
description: A director makes an unusual friendship with an octopus in a South African seaweed forest, learning from the animal the mysteries of the world it lives in.

title: Made in Abyss: Fukaki Tamashî no Reimei
description: Riko and Reg continues their journey into the abyss in the company of their new friend Nanachi. Together they descend the terrible fifth level, the sea of ​​corpses, where they make the knowledge of the mysterious Bondrewd, whose shadow looms on the troubled Nanachi past. Although Bondrewd seems captivating and hospitable, the three courageous adventurers know that in the abyss things are not always as they seem.
notes: Based on the characters of the animated series made in Abyss.

title: Clouds
actors: Fin Argus, Sabrina Carpenter, Madison Iseman, Neve Campbell, Tom Everett Scott, Lil Rel Howery, Dylan Everett, Vivien Endicott Douglas, Summer H. Howell, Mylène Dinh-Robic
description: Seventeen-year-old Zach, gifted with musical talent, lives with a rare form of bone cancer. In his last year of high school, in the short time he still has to live, he will try to pursue his dreams by becoming an example for all those around him.

title: By the Way, Woody Allen Is Innocent
actors: Rick Worley, Woody Allen, Soon-Yi, Mia Farrow
description: Fact-checking, sentences, statements by those directly involved: in two and a half hours of documentary cartoonist Rick Worley explains why Woody Allen is innocent and any accusation of harassment against him is a slander.

title: Alida
actors: Giovanna Mezzogiorno, Pierpaolo De Mejo, Piero Tosi, Vanessa Redgrave, Charlotte Rampling, Bernardo Bertolucci, Margarethe Von Trotta, Thierry Fremaux, Dario Argento, Roberto Benigni, Marco Tullio Giordana
description: Mimmo Verdesca tells the story of the legendary Alida Valli for the first time, through the unpublished words of her private writings, enriching it with precious archive materials and exclusive testimonies. The documentary shows a complete picture of the life of a young and beautiful girl from Pula who quickly became one of the most famous and beloved actresses in the history of cinema.

title: Revoltin Rhymes
directors: Jan Lachauer, Jakob Schuh, Bin-Han To
description: Two different stories taken from the book perverse verses by Roald Dahl illustrated by Quentin Blake present famous characters of traditional fairy tales (Red Riding Hood, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, Jack and the Magic Bean, Cinderella and the three pigs) struggling with twists Unexpected, who overturn their stories to create new ones. Will Snow White be more smart than her stepmother? Will the brick house be resistant enough to protect the pigs? Will Jack be able to find his treasure? Who will marry Cinderella?

title: Câmp de maci
actors: Conrad Mericoffer, Alexandru Potocean, Radouan Leflahi, Cendana Trifan, Ionut Niculae, Alex Calin, Rolando Matsangos, George Pistereanu, Florin Caracala, Ela Ionescu
description: Cristi is a respected police officer whose unit was called upon to restore order after the outbreak of an uprising caused by protests against another LGBT-themed film. Everything around him begins to fall apart after he is unexpectedly recognized by an ex-boyfriend. From then on, it is impossible to determine who his friends are and who his enemies are.

title: Strah
actors: Svetlana Yancheva, Michael Flemming, Ivan Savov, Stoyan Bochev, Krassimir Dokov, Miroslava Gogovska, Kristina Yaneva
description: Svetla is a recently unemployed teacher living in a border town. While hunting hares in the forest, he comes across an African. Respectful as she is of the laws, she takes the illegal immigrant to the border guard station but is told that she has to manage alone, since there is no longer a place to put the many refugees who are caught every day. Overcoming all fear, Svetla decides to welcome him into the house. His presence, however, scares the locals: he is still a black man on the loose.

title: Zappa
actors: Frank Zappa, Steve Vai, Pamela Des Barres, Gail Zappa, Ian Underwood, Ruth Underwood, Mike Keneally, Ray White, David Harrington, Bunk Gardner
description: Director Alex Winter and his team of collaborators pay tribute to Frank Zappa, brilliant and nonconformist, obtaining mostly unpublished material from over a thousand hours of footage kept in the musician's personal archive. The result is a vast and intimate portrait of an extraordinary artist who was also fully involved in the turbulent politics of his day.

title: The Name Engraved in Your Heart
actors: Jean-François Blanchard, Akira Chen, Edward Chen, David Hao-Chi Chiu, Leon Dai, Fabio Grangeon, Honduras, Mountain Kao, Lenny Li, Hui-Min Lin
description: Martial law ended in Taiwan in 1988 when two students, A-han and Birdy, have a clandestine homosexual relationship after meeting in the school band led by a Canadian priest named Oliver. In the homophobic climate in which they live there will be family pressures and social prejudices to face.

title: Picture Perfect Royal Christmas
actors: Roxanne McKee, David Witts, Sophie Ward, Sophie Vavasseur, James Weber Brown, Manal El-Feitury, Austin Gullett, Yana Marinova, Atanas Srebrev
description: Amanda is the assistant of a famous photographer. When the head of her receives an invitation to photograph the Christmas celebrations in the Kingdom of Pantrea, Amanda takes her place by pretending to be. Although Amanda is not of blue blood, Prince Leopold will soon fall in love with all the consequences of the case.

title: Billie Eilish: The World' a Little Blurry
actors: Billie Eilish
description: The documentary traces the true story of singer-songwriter Billie Eilish's formation and her rise to global success. Director R.J. Cutler offers an intimate insight into the life of Eilish, an extraordinary teenager who at just 17 divides her time between tour, stage and family, while she is busy writing, recording and releasing her debut album.

title: Jockey
actors: Clifton Collins jr., Molly Parker, Moises Arias
description: A jockey no longer at a young age is determined to win a last championship. Him's dream, however, gets complicated when he shows up a debutant young man who claims to be the son of him.

title: Death Row - James Barnes
actors: Werner Herzog, James Barnes, Tod Goodyear
description: Herzog meets James Barnes, detained in the arm of the death of a Florida penitentiary for double murder. Even in such a tragic and interview situation with a person capable of such fierce acts, the German director tries to throw a human look at the story.

title: Death Row - Hank Skinner
actors: Werner Herzog, Hank Skinner
description: Hank Skinner was sentenced to death for the murder of his wife and their two delayed children. For 17 years he has been locked up in his death arm and already once, in 2010, he was suspended only twenty minutes from his mass. In fact, his process was reopened and is still in 2012, when he meets Werner Herzog.

title: Hive
actors: Yllka Gashi, Çun Lajçi, Aurita Agushi, Kumrije Hoxha, Adriana Matoshi, Molike Maxhuni, Blerta Ismaili, Kaona Sylejmani, Mal Noah Safqiu, Xhejlane Terbunja
description: Fahrije's husband disappeared during the war in Kosovo. The woman was forced to get busy and set up a small business to provide for her children. As he fights against a patriarchal society that does not support it in anything, he will find himself having to face a crucial decision: wait for the return of the husband or persevere on the new path taken.

title: Summer of Soul (...Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised)
actors: Stevie Wonder, B.B. King, Nina Simone, Abbey Lincoln, Mahalia Jackson, Moms Mabley, Jesse Jackson, Mavis Staples, David Ruffin, Cal Tjader
description: During the same summer as Woodstock, over 300,000 people participated in the Harlem Cultural Festival, celebrating African American music and culture and promoting the pride and unity of blacks. The images shot then were found in a basement, where they remained invisible and hidden for over 50 years.

title: Ennio
actors: Ennio Morricone, Quentin Tarantino, Clint Eastwood, Oliver Stone, Hans Zimmer, John Williams, Kar-Wai Wong, Barry Levinson, Dario Argento, Bernardo Bertolucci
description: Giuseppe Tornatore, Oscar -winning director, pays homage to his friend and collaborator Ennio Morricone, retracing the life and works of the legendary composer. The interviews with renowned directors and musicians, the recordings of some acclaimed world tour of the Maestro, the clips taken from some iconic films set to music by Morricone and the exclusive films of the scenes and places that have defined his life, help him.

title: Death Row - Joseph Garcia and George Rivas
actors: Werner Herzog, Joseph C. Garcia, George Angel Rivas Jr.
description: Werner Herzog goes to the arm of the death of a Texan prison to meet two members of the so -called Texas Seven: seven evaded who stained the crime of a policeman before being captured and sentenced to death again.

title: Death Row - Linda Carty
actors: Werner Herzog, Linda Carty, Raymundo Cabrera, Michael Goldberg, Jovelle Joubert, Christopher Robinson, Connie Spence
description: Herzog visits the arm of death Linda Carty, condemned to the capital penalty for killing a neighbor, Joana Rodrigues, for the sole purpose of stealing her newborn son. Linda had recently aborted and could not bear Joana's motherhood.

title: Audrey
actors: Audrey Hepburn, Robin Ager, Michael Avedon, Emma Hepburn Ferrer, Sean Hepburn Ferrer, Alessandra Ferri, Francesca Hayward, Clare Waight Keller, Keira Moore, Mita Ungaro
description: Director Helena Coan retraces the life and career of an icon: actress Audrey Hepburn. Oscar winner at 24, Hepburn became one of the symbols of the golden age of Hollywood thanks to her beauty and style, still continuing to be a model and inspiration today. But who was the real Audrey? Malnourished as a child, abandoned by her father and raised in Nazi-occupied Holland, she carried her trauma with her and was forced to give up her dream of becoming a dancer. Over time, however, she managed to find peace thanks to her role as ambassador for Unicef.

title: The Most Beautiful Boy in the World
actors: Björn Andresen, Annike Andrésen, Silva Filmer, Riyoko Ikeda, Margareta Krantz, Ann Lagerström, Johanna Lidén, Robine Román, Masatoshi Sakai, Miriam Sambol
description: The life of the Swedish actor and musician Björn Andrésen has changed forever at the age of 15, when he played Tadzio, the object of the obsession of Dirk Bogarde in death in Venice, by Luchino Visconti. The role led the director to call him "the most beautiful boy in the world".

title: Në kërkim të Venerës
actors: Rozafa Celaj, Erjona Kakeli, Kosovare Krasniqi, Basri Lushtaku
description: The calm and taciturn Venra lives in a small village in Kosovo. Three different generations live in its modest home and has almost no privacy. It is not better away from home: the village is small and there is always a relative or a neighbor to keep an eye on it. However, everything changes when he makes friends with Dorina, a rebel who already has a boyfriend. The two girls begin to go out and have fun together and have only one certainty: they don't want to end like their mothers.

title: Snowkissed
actors: Chris McNally, Jen Lilley, Amy Groening, Rodrigo Beilfuss, Jay Koensgen, Chelsey Mark, Kevin McIntyre
description: Kate has the opportunity to complete an important interview but to do so he must go to Canada. New York used to living with all her comforts, Kate almost never moves from her area and is therefore called to win every fear to go to Lake Louise. Here, he meets Noah, the owner of the B&B in which he found hospitality. After the initial clash, the two will end up finding themselves closer than ever.

title: Ras vkhedavt, rodesac cas vukurebt?
actors: Giorgi Bochorishvili, Ani Karseladze, Oliko Barbakadze, Giorgi Ambroladze, Irina Chelidze, Vakhtang Fanchulidze
description: Between Lisa and Giorgi it is love at first sight when by chance they meet in a road in the Georgian city of Kutaisi. Love is so strong that the two even forget to ask themselves what they are called. They decide to meet again the next day, but they don't know that someone will launch an evil spell on them.

title: Limbo
actors: Hanna Chan, Hiroyuki Ikeuchi, Ka Tung Lam, Mason Lee, Fish Liew, Yase Liu, Kumer So, Sammy Sum
description: A serial killer moves undisturbed through the streets of Hong Kong. Under pressure, the police call the veteran Detective Jin in service and assigns the case to be resolved in pairs with the new Kai. However, Jin's past is back to tormenting him when he meets Tao, the girl who killed him wife and son in an accident. To redeem himself, Tao is volunteer to work on the case but Jin cannot control the hatred that feeds towards the one who has destroyed his life forever.

title: Azor
actors: Fabrizio Rongione, Stéphanie Cléau, Elli Medeiros, Alexandre Trocki, Gilles Privat, Juan Pablo Geretto, Carmen Iriondo, Yvain Juillard, Pablo Torre Nilson, Juan Trench
description: Yvan De Wiel, Ginevrino private banker, goes to Argentina in full dictatorship to replace his partner, the subject of worrying rumors about his mysterious disappearance. Among welcoming salons, swimming pools and gardens, a duel at a distance between two bankers takes place which, despite their different methods, are accomplices of a discreet but ruthless form of colonization.

title: Kelti
actors: Dubravka Kovjanic, Stefan Trifunovic, Nikola Rakocevic, Slaven Doslo, Jovana Gavrilovic, Milica Grujicic, Olga Odanovic, Nada Sargin, Jelena Djokic, Jovan Belobrkovic
description: In Belgrade, in 1993, the repressed tension for the uncertain times that are lived melted during a birthday party for children. While the little ones celebrate in the living room clothes from Ninja turtles, adults discuss, flirt, smoke and drink in the kitchen.

title: Die Welt wird eine andere sein
actors: Canan Kir, Roger Azar, Ceci Chuh, Darina Al Joundi, Aziz Dyab, Özay Fecht, Meral Perin, Jana Julia Roth, Hans Jürgen Alf, Marlene Fahnster
description: Asli and Saeed fall in love in the mid -nineties. Although Asli's mother is contrary to their relationship, the two secretly marry. It does not spend much time before Saeed disappears by changing the life of Asli even before the whole world is shaken.

title: Fendas
actors: Roberta Rangel, Juliana Nazar, Ruston Liberato, Ernesto Guerra, Henrique Fontes, Vivian Moura, Tiquinha Rodrigues, Robson Medeiros, Pedro Fiuza, Julio Schwantz
description: Catarina is a researcher in quantum physics: she studies the sound spaces hidden in the variations of light. Immersing herself in the images she distorts, Catarina discovers a new form of the sound spectrum that seems to open an access to another temporality.

title: Fulci Talks
actors: Lucio Fulci, Marcello Garofalo, Antonietta De Lillo
description: "If I remain in the memory of those who loved me and remind me, I live the same. This at least is my thesis": this is how Lucio Fulci is told, crazy director, brilliant, cheerful and desperate, in front of the director Antonietta De Lillo and the Critic Marcello Garofalo in a conversation that, recorded 30 years earlier, miraculously returns to light.

title: Sincerely Louis CK
actors: Louis C.K.
description: Louis C.K. returns to the scene after two turbulent years and since the opening of this monologue he confesses that he cannot, much less want to avoid talking about the scandal that has overwhelmed him in recent times (the accusations of having masturbated in front of unwilling people). But in the course of the show the comedian ranges between various difficult themes such as death, homosexuality, the term 'retarded' and false pietism, and again the holocaust and the inevitable religion.

title: Seaspiracy
actors: Ali Tabrizi, Richard O'Barry, Lucy Tabrizi, Lori Marino, Tamara Arenovich, Paul de Gelder, Callum Roberts, Gary Stokes, Peter Hammarstedt, Lamya Essemlali
description: Documentary that investigates the significant impact of fishing on the environment, addressing thorny issues such as illegal fishing and the destruction of the ocean ecosystem.

title: Killers of the Flower Moon
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Robert De Niro, Jesse Plemons, Pat Healy, Tantoo Cardinal, Louis Cancelmi, Tatanka Means, Lily Gladstone, Scott Shepherd, Sturgill Simpson
description: 1920s. Mollie Burkhart (Lily Gladstone) is an American native of the Osage tribe which, like all its people, becomes unexpectedly rich when it turns out that the land of Oklahoma apparently stony and not very promising on which the authorities had allowed the natives to settle, in reality hides large quantities of oil. But the Osages are still forced to be subject to a condition of special protection: to claim the income on their lands and spend it, they need a white co -owner. In addition, the members of the tribe are dying one after the other, killed by mysterious diseases. In the meantime, the greedy Ernest (Leonardo Di Caprio) has returned to Oklahoma after serving during the First World War and agrees to work in the vast estate of the rich uncle William (Robert De Niro), who encourages him to seduce and Marry Mollie and then be able to legally claim her land.
notes: Adaptation of the homonymous report book published in 2017 by David Grann.

title: I giorni bianchi
actors: Daniele Malagnino, Denis Malagnino, Simona Malagnino
description: Italy, March 2020. Prime Minister Conte announces the National Lockdown to arrest the exponential growth of the dead from Covid. However, quarantine promises to be a tragedy in the tragedy for a family: the wife wants desperately and impotently to become a mother; The woman's brother, a man sickly, lives in an endless football dream; And Franco seems to be the only one to remain anchored to reality.

title: Brighton 4th
actors: Levan Tedaishvili, Giorgi Tabidze, Kakhi Kavsadze, Nadezhda Mikhalkova, Irakli Kavsadze, Tornike Bziava, Anastasia Romashko, Giorgi Kipshidze, Laura Rekhviashvili, Stefaniya Makarova
description: Kakhi is a Georgian wrestler. His existence of him will meet an unexpected surrender when he travels to Brooklyn with the aim of helping his son get rid of a game debt.

title: Agnès de ci de là Varda
actors: Agnés Varda, Anouk Aimée, Manoel de Oliveira, Michel Piccoli, Aleksandr Sokurov, Jean-Louis Trintignant, Carlos Reygadas, Chris Marker
description: Agnès Varda travel diary in five episodes based on the material shot in over two years of travel and meetings with people from all over the world, especially figurative artists and his colleagues and friends of cinema.

title: The Velvet Underground
actors: Lou Reed, John Cale, Maureen Tucker, Sterling Morrison
description: An analysis of the multiple converging factors that determined the establishment of one of the most influential bands of rock and roll: the Velvet underground.

title: Great Freedom
actors: Franz Rogowski, Georg Friedrich, Anton von Lucke, Thomas Prenn
description: In post -war Germany, Hans is imprisoned over and over again to be homosexual. Due to the notorious paragraph 175, his desire for freedom is systematically annihilated. The only stable relationship of his life becomes the one with his longtime cell partner, Viktor, a condemned murderer. What begins in the sign of repulsion will lead to something called love.

title: Vortex
actors: Dario Argento, Francoise Lebrun, Alex Lutz
description: An elderly couple lives in a Parisian apartment full of objects, memories, books. He is a cinema scholar who is writing a book on the relationship between dreams and films, she is a retired psychoanalyst, who begins to suffer the symptoms of Alzheimer's. Their very long relationship gradually disintegrates, as they try as far as they can support the son, who has problems with drug addiction.

title: Mes frères, et moi
actors: Maël Rouin Berrandou, Judith Chemla, Dali Benssalah, Sofian Khammes, Moncef Farfar, Luc Schwarz, Olivier Loustau, Olga Milshtein, Loretta Fajeau-Leffray
description: Nour is 14 years old and lives in a popular neighborhood by the sea, where he is preparing to spend an summer marked by the misadventures of the older brothers, the mother's illness and socially useful works. While he has to repair a corridor of middle school, he knows Sarah, an opera singer who holds a summer course. The meeting will open new horizons.

title: Diarios De Otsoga
actors: Crista Alfaiate, Carloto Cotta, João Nunes Monteiro
description: Crista, Carloto and João build together an arious greenhouse for butterflies in the garden. The three share domestic everyday life, day after day. And they are not the only ones.

title: Amparo
actors: Sandra Melissa Torres, Diego Alejandro Tobûn, Luciana Gallego, John Jairo Montoya
