description: Colombia, 1998. Amparo, a single mother, struggle to save her teenage son who was recalled to arms and sent to a war area. Thus she finds herself at the center of a race against time in a society dominated by men, corruption and violence.

title: A Night Of Knowing Nothing
actors: Bhumisuta Das
description: L is an Indian cinema student. She had fallen in love with K and had decided to be together. K, however, was forced to return to his Christmas village and the two had to separate. Since then, the writes of the letters to K, thanks to which it is possible to take a look at his daily life and on that of his friends, young Indians struggling with memories, dreams and fears.

title: Marx può aspettare
description: The director Marco Bellocchio tells of the death of Camillo, his twin, which took place on December 27, 1968. The totally autobiographical story ends up being universal for at least two reasons: the first is a reflection on the pain of the survivors but above all on the desire to hide the truth to his mother, convinced that otherwise he would not have endured the tragedy. And therefore the theater in the tragedy; the second reason is that Camillo's death falls in a "revolutionary" year, 1968: the year of protest, of sexual freedom, of French May, of the invasion of Czechoslovakia, all revolutions that passed alongside the life of Camillus but they didn't interest him.

title: Shin Evangelion Gekijôban
directors: Mahiro Maeda, Katsuichi Nakayama, Kazuya Tsurumaki, Hideaki Anno
description: Misato and her anti-Nerv Wille group arrive in Paris, a city now red from the effect of the Core. The crew of the Wunder flagship lands on a containment tower. They only have 720 seconds to restore the city. When a horde of Nerv Eve appears, Mari's enhanced Eve Unit 8 must intercept it. Meanwhile, Shinji, Asuka and Rei roam Japan.

title: Wet Sand
actors: Bebe Sesitashvili, Gia Agumava, Megi Kobaladze, Giorgi Tsereteli, Eka Chavleishvili, Zaal Goguadze, Kakha Kobaladze
description: A village on the Black Sea is full of friendly people convinced of getting to know each other. One day, Eliko is found hanged. His nephew Moe arrives to organize the funeral but finds himself confronted with the network of lies (and the tragic consequences) generated by the hidden relationship of Eliko with Ammon, which lasted 2 years. The truth, however, will free Moe's ability to love and will bring the locals to take a position.

title: Mad God
actors: Alex Cox, Niketa Roman, Satish Ratakonda, Harper Taylor, Brynn Taylor
description: In a world populated by monsters, crazy scientists and war pigs, a corrosa underwater bell makes its appearance in an ruined city. From his interior, the killer comes out, arrived to explore that labyrinth of bizarre landscapes populated with equally strange characters.

title: Zebra Girl
actors: Tom Cullen, Sarah Roy, Jade Anouka, Anna Wilson-Jones, Isabelle Connolly, Moyo Akandé, Angela Yeoh, Henry Douthwaite, Daisy Mayer, Buckso Dhillon-Woolley, Siobhan Athwal, Gemma Park, Romani Wright
description: Catherine spends a seemingly perfect provincial life when her daily routine is turned upside down to discover that her husband is hiding a dark secret. This will lead her to make unthinkable decisions. Including murder.

title: Zbornica
actors: Marina Redzepovic, Stojan Matavulj, Nives Ivankovic, Maja Posavec, Sandra Loncaric
description: Annamarija begins to work as a consultant in a new school and gradually begins to find his place in that unknown environment. Slowly, he finds out what kind of teachers are, he experiencing the bickering room in the meeting room, he witnesses the quarrels between the pupils, known how difficult it is to communicate with the parents and what power games they hide carefully behind the scenes.

title: Miracol
actors: Ioana Bugarin, Emanuel Parvu, Cezar Antal, Ovidiu Crisan, Valeriu Andriuta, Valentin Popescu, Marian Râlea, Nora Covali, Natalia Calin, Catalina Moga, Olimpia Malai, Vasile Muraru, Mircea Postelnicu, Dan Grigoras, Bogdan Farcas, Bogdan Tascu, Ion Grosu, Ecaterina Hatu
description: A young nun sneaks out of the monastery she is in to attend to an urgent matter. He never returns and his disappearance triggers the police investigation. A detective, investigating his fate, discovers clues and revelations that lead not only to the truth but also to a miracle.

title: Californie
actors: Khadija Jaafari, Ikram Jaafari, Maria Amato
description: Filmed in 5 years, he tells the story of Jamila, a Moroccan girl who lives in a port city of southern Italy. At 9, Jamila has dreams, reference models and curiosities for life, but the difficulties and sense of marginalization that she feels of her when she is with her with her peers harden her and make her more and more wary. He then begins to idealize his country of origin, where he declares he wants to return, and leaves the school to go to work full time in the "Californie" shop to be able to become a good hairdresser one day.

title: Deserto particular
actors: Antonio Saboia, Pedro Fasanaro
description: Forty -year -old Daniel was suspended from active service in the police and is at the center of an internal investigation for excessive use of violence. When Sara, with whom he has a history of virtual love, stops replying to her messages Daniel of her decides to go and look for her starting north and thus starting what seems to be the desperate journey of a crowd. Nobody seems to recognize the person portrayed in the photo that Daniel shows anyone who meets, until a man tells him that he can organize him a meeting with the woman he is looking for, but under certain conditions

title: Vous ne désirez que moi
actors: Emmanuelle Devos, Swann Arlaud
description: In October 1982 Yann Andrea asked Michèle Manceaux to interview him. Yann has been Marguerite Duras for two years and is 38 years older than her, while Michèle, journalist and writer, is an accomplice and neighbor of Marguerite. They meet on the first floor of Nauphle's house and Yann's first phrase is "I would like to talk about Marguerite". The relationship he has with the writer leaves him no longer any freedom. During the two meetings with Michèle he will try to understand what he is experiencing, to find out how to save his skin and continue to love Marguerite.

title: Charlotte
description: The true story of Charlotte Salomon, a young German Jewish painter who grows up and becomes an adult in Berlin on the eve of the Second World War. Imaginative and talented, Charlotte dreams of becoming an artist but the world around her is changing dangerously and quickly, making her wishes derail. When the anti -Semitic policies no longer leave her escape, Charlotte leaves the German capital to move to the south of France, where once again she will see her work interrupted by a family tragedy and an unexpected secret.

title: Farha
actors: Karam Taher, Ashraf Barhom, Ali Suliman, Tala Gammoh, Sameera Asir, Majd Eid, Firas Taybeh, Samuel Kaczorowski, Sultan Alkhail, Batoul Ibrahim, Leanne Katkhuda, Joseph Shamoun, Nael Kanj, Yousef Abu Dawoud, Mira Abu Jafar, Hind Hamed, Mohammad Abu Jaafar, Mohammad Bakir
description: In 1948, in Palestine, the fourteen year old Farha dreams of attending school in the city with her best friend Farida but, as daughter of Mukhtar, should respect tradition and marry. While British control is about to turn to the end, Farha and her father ignore the forced displacements already in progress. So, when the Israeli bombs reach their village, the father decides to lock it in the cellar, promising to return as soon as possible. From there, Farha will witness through the cracks of the ruin to which not only the village will meet but also its own future.

title: Yuni
actors: Arawinda Kirana, Asmara Abigail, Sekar Sari, Marissa Anita, Dimas Aditya, Kevin Ardillova, Rukman Rosadi, Neneng Wulandari, Boah Sartika, Nazla Thoyib, Anne Yasmine, Made Aurellia, Toto S.T. Radi, Muhammad Khan, Nova Eliza, Mian Tiara, Ayu Laksmi
description: Yuni is a high school student with a passion for purple color, a handful of friends and a typically adolescent vision of things. Her family is very close to Indonesian traditions, whatever they are. While Yuni dreams of attending university, two men who barely know they ask to marry her. Yuni opposes tradition and refuses the proposals, unleashing gossip and rumors according to which the third proposed refused will never marry. The pressures on Yuni increases when a third man ask for his hand by forcing her to choose between bending over the traditional costumes or continuing to dream of their future.

title: Kurdbun - Essere curdo
description: The Kurdish journalist Saadet Yildiz and her cameraman, on a mission to Cizre for a routine reportage, were trapped in an unwanted siege. They found themselves in this way witnesses for 79 days of the invasion of the tanks of the Turkish army, of the systematic bombings, the extermination of civilians, the resistance and the despair of the inhabitants of Cizre, as well as their creativity in inventing forms of survival and daily resilience.
notes: The documentary wants to contribute to portraying the modern Kurdish identity, the common thread between the Kurds who live as outraged minorities and fighters in the Middle Eastern territories and the Kurds who live as integrated minorities in Europe, investigating what binds them, as to why they feel united by An absolute constraint and full of emotions and how the two Kurdish souls convinced.

title: Le favolose
description: The disavowal of one's identity remains a second death for many trans, that of their memory. Families are ashamed and so funeral, ceremony and burial take place secretly between a few close, hastily tampered with in the aesthetics, and Gianna becomes Gianni, Luciana Luciano, Francisca Francisco. In this way nobody can recognize them anymore. Their name as a man is printed on the plaque, in an identity that will never be the one that they chosen during them the earthly life. This is what happens to Antonia, buried with her name of baptism, Giampaolo, in the indifference of the most. Twenty years later, the discovery of a letter pushes his best friends, Porpora and Nicole, to organize a meeting place for the memorable royal family, the group of elected in the boundless trans constellation, to relive a whole day all together in the historical apartment , as they did in the fabulous weekends of many years earlier. Although at the beginning they keep it hidden, the truth of the meeting is to organize a spirit session that allows Antonia to return temporarily to Earth. Only in this way will it be possible to give it a worthy burial: a joyful funeral, where the songs and prayers are replaced with tears and dances, and where Antonia will finally be able to return to wearing her green dress. A party that will also be a revenge for her and for all those people of whom there is nothing more than a vague memory, lost, pulverized in the bare earth, under plague that do not belong to anyone.

title: Errante corazón
actors: Leonardo Sbaraglia, Miranda de la Serna, Eva Llorach, Iván González, Alberto Ajaka, Tuca Andrada, Rodrigo dos Santos, Beatriz Rajland, Juan Ignacio Ugüet, Benjamín Ruiz, Veronica Hassan, Vanesa Maja, Margarita Molfino, Patricio Aramburu, Diego Almeida, Etienne Bobenrieth, Lourinelson Vladmir, Thalita Carauta
description: Santiago, a single and gay father, has reached a turning point in his life. Upset by a bitter sentimental break, he also has to face the imminent departure of his daughter Laila, with whom he has a strong bond. Since the fear of remaining only annihilates it, begins to behave in an increasingly unruly way. During a chaotic summer between Argentina and Brazil, Santiago will have to learn to let Laila go so that everyone can find their freedom.

title: Emily
actors: Emma Mackey, Oliver Jackson-Cohen, Fionn Whitehead, Gemma Jones, Adrian Dunbar, Alexandra Dowling, Amelia Gething, Philip Desmeules, Elijah Wolf, Robert Pickavance, Harry Anton, Darren Langford
description: The transformative, exhilarating and edifying journey towards the femininity of Emily Bronte, rebellious, disdained and destined to become one of the most famous, enigmatic and provocative writers of the world.

title: 70072 La bambina che non sapeva odiare
description: The story of Lidia Maksymowicz, who survived the Auschwitz-Birkenau extermination camp. She entered it in 1942, she child, precisely in the period when Dr. Mengele carried out genetic experiments, and she came out in 1945 and then be given to adoption to a Polish family.

title: Viens je t'emmène
actors: Doria Tillier, Noémie Lvovsky, Nathalie Boyer, Renaud Rutten, Jean-Charles Clichet, Iliès Kadri
description: After a terrorist attack in Clermont-Ferrand, the chain of events focuses around an unusual set of characters and especially a man in Trentino, a sex worker and a young homeless of Arab origins.

title: Yin Ru Chen Yan
actors: Wu Renlin, Hai Qing
description: In Rural China but Cao have been torn from their respective families for a combined marriage that forces them to collaborate and build a house together, if they want to survive. Despite the hard and violent assumption of their relationship, they end up being well together and to develop a very strong bond.

title: Flux Gourmet
actors: Asa Butterfield, Gwendoline Christie, Richard Bremmer, Ariane Labed, Leo Bill, Fatma Mohamed, Makis Papadimitriou
description: In an institution dedicated to cuisine understood as culinary and food performance, a collective finds itself involved in power struggles, artistic sold and gastrointestinal disorders.

title: PerdutaMente
actors: Paolo Ruffini
description: A journey made around Italy by Paolo Ruffini, to interview people with Alzheimer's and their family members and give voice to a double discomfort: that of the sick and that of the people close to them, who suffer a not indifferent emotional load.

title: The Fabelmans
actors: Michelle Williams, Seth Rogen, Paul Dano, Gabriel LaBelle, Oakes Fegley, Gabriel Bateman, Nicolas Cantu, Julia Butters, Sam Rechner, Judd Hirsch, Chloe East, Isabelle Kusman, Jeannie Berlin, Robin Bartlett, Jonathan Hadary, Cooper Dodson, Gustavo Escobar, Lane Factor, Sophia Kopera, Keeley Karsten, Mateo Zoryon Francis-DeFord
description: Sammy Fabelman (Gabrielle Labelle) is a young man who grows in Phoenix, Arizona, together with his uncle (Seth Rogen) with whom he gets along very well, and with his mother (Michelle Williams) and her father (Paul Dano), with Which the relationship is more controversial.
notes: Freely inspired by Steven Spielberg's childhood, raised within a family of Orthodox Jews in Pheonix, Arizona. It also represents one of the rare cases in which Spielberg - who has long meditated on this project, also worried about the reception he could have had in his own family - participates as a screenwriter (his last film he wrote the script was A. I. Intelligence Artificial (2001).

title: Poor Things
actors: Willem Dafoe, Margaret Qualley, Emma Stone, Christopher Abbott, Mark Ruffalo, Kathryn Hunter, Jerrod Carmichael, Ramy Youssef, Wayne Brett, Suzy Bemba
description: Victorian age. The deceased Belle Baxter (Emma Stone) is brought back to life by the brilliant and unorthodox scientist Dr. Godwin Baxter (Willem Dafoe). Hungry for the worldliness that she is missing, however, Bella escapes with Duncan Wedderburn (Mark Ruffalo), skilled and dissolved lawyer who involves her in an overwhelming adventure through the continents. Free from the prejudices of his time, Bella is increasingly determined in his purpose of defending equality and emancipation.
notes: Taken from the novel of the same name by Alasdair Gray.

title: Oppenheimer
actors: Kenneth Branagh, Florence Pugh, Cillian Murphy, Emily Blunt, Josh Hartnett, Jack Quaid, Matt Damon, Robert Downey jr., Rami Malek, Dane DeHaan, Michael Angarano, Benny Safdie, David Krumholtz, Matthew Modine, Alden Ehrenreich, Dylan Arnold, Olli Haaskivi
description: 1926. The 22 -year -old J. Robert Oppenheimer is a brilliant physics student, graduated in Cambridge (where he met Niels Bohr) and owner of a doctorate at the University of Göttingen in Germany, where he has the opportunity to meet the most famous colleague Werner Heisenberg . After returning to the United States, he begins to teach Berkeley and California Institute of Technology by continuing to expand his research path in quantum physics. In 1942, the American Army General Leslie Groves recruited the scientist as head of the Manhattan project to develop the atomic bomb. Oppenheimer, of the Jewish family, accepts the role, well aware that Nazi scientists, under the guidance of Heisenberg, are carrying out the same type of research.

title: Snapshot of Love
actors: Natalie Dreyfuss, Rebecca Olson, Matt Hamilton, Anthony Konechny, Don McLeod, Shay Galor, Beth Fotheringham, Marika Siewert, Shaughnessy O'Brien, Matt Shay
description: Jessie Brooke is happy and satisfied with his life and his profession, photographer of weddings. When a famous Hollywood actor presents himself at the sister's wedding, all his certainties are questioned.

title: Io capitano
actors: Moustapha Fall, Seydou Sarr
description: Seydou and Moussa's adventurous journey, two teenagers who leave Dakar to reach Europe, crossing all the dangers of the sea, desert and above all those represented by the human beings they will meet.

title: Riverfront Romance
actors: Tammy Gillis, Morgan David Jones, Allison Hossack, Erin Agostino, Jonathan Kim, Arlene Duncan, Brian Paul, Neil Whitely, Jackie Richardson, Chris Tarpos
description: After spending many years to put money aside, the writer Cara Durant can finally buy the house of her dreams, but just concluded the purchase discovers that such a named Riley Evans is building a dam right in front of her.

title: La bicicletta e il Badile - In viaggio come Hermann Buhl
description: Maurizio Panseri and Marco Cardullo, mountaineers and cyclists, decide to retrace the itinerary that in 1952 brought Hermann Buhl, by bicycle, to a weekend, from Innsbruck to the north-east wall of the Badile lace, scaled in the first lonely through via Cassin via Cassin , in about four hours.

title: Zhe ge sha shou bu tai leng jing
actors: Li Ma, Xiang Wei, Minghao Chen, Dayong Zhou, Lun Ai, Junnan Bu, Haibao Gao, Xiao Han, Cailun Huang, Chi Ma, Rongbiao Quan, Guiquan Sun, Liang Tao, Meng Xu, Zhizhong Zhang, Gianluca Zoppa
description: To be able to realize his dream of becoming a comedian, Wei Changngong accidentally ends up victim of a dangerous fraud due to the seductive persuasion of the actress Milan. However, Wei Changgong knew he was already involved in another ridiculous plot.

title: PLAN75
actors: Chieko Baishô, Hayato Isomura, Yumi Kawai
description: In the not very remote future, Japan has put on a plan called Plan 75, with which we try to push the elderly to voluntary euthanasia, to remedy the social inconvenience caused by a very aged population. An elderly woman with few resources to survive, a pragmatic seller of the plan and a young Filipino worker thus confront themselves on life and death choices.

title: R.M.N.
actors: Marin Grigore, Judith State, Macrina Barladeanu, Orsolya Moldován, Rácz Endre, József Bíró, Ovidiu Crisan, Zoltán Deák
description: A reflection on the history of Romania through the encounter with the communities that are part of it: Romanian, Hungarian, Moldovan. A man returned home from abroad for Christmas finds a country immersed in irrational and unmotivated fear towards the foreigner, ready to explode in a control without control.

title: Perhaps Love
actors: Kim Hee-won, Yoo-Young Lee, Na-ra Oh, Seung-Ryong Ryu, Lee Si-Young, Yoo-Bin Sung, Ui-joo Yeo
description: Hyun is a famous writer who after the success of a novel cannot find the inspiration for the following, making his friend and publisher concern son-we worry. From a personal and sentimental point of view, his life is also more complicated, because he hearing the second wife and daughter, who are in the United States, Hyun got closer to his first wife Mi-Ae, without knowing that he has one Secret relationship with Soon-mo.

title: Taht el Karmouss
actors: Fide Fdhili, Feten Fdhili, Ameni Fdhili
description: Makke and his friends work during the summer to the collection of fruit: some to pay their studies, some to help the family and who to put something in view of the wedding. In the shade of large figs and under the gaze of the older workers, they unfold their projects for their adult life which, however, will remain a prohibited fruit for them.

title: Leila's Brothers
actors: Taraneh Alidoosti, Saeed Poursamimi, Navid Mohammadzadeh, Payman Maadi, Mohammad Ali Mohammadi, Farhad Aslani
description: The forty -year -old Leila is desperately looking for an economic autonomy that can allow her to be free and not have to look after the parents and the four brothers throughout life.

title: Mediterranean Fever
actors: Amer Hlehel, Ashraf Farah, Anat Hadid, Samir Elias, Cynthia Saleem, Shaden Kanboura
description: Waleed is forty years old and lives in Haïfa with his wife and children. His dream is to become a writer but he must also cope with a chronic depression that does not give him up. In the meantime, he ties with a neighbor who makes small scams and that has a precise plan in mind.

title: Le Bleu du Caftan
actors: Lubna Azabal, Saleh Bakri, Ayoub Messioui
description: Halim and Mina, married for a long time, manage a typical Caftani shop in the Medina di Salé, in Morocco. Together they also keep the secret of the homosexuality of him, who learned to keep her hidden and dormant, but when Mina gets sick and a young apprentice arrives in the shop, the balance will break.

title: Harka
actors: Adam Bessa
description: Ali, a young Tunisian, dreams of a better life while supporting itself thanks to the smuggling in the local black market. When the father suddenly dies, the boy must take care of his two sisters who risk expulsion.

title: Mi pais imaginario
description: Between 1975 and 1979 Patricio Guzmán created the three documentaries of the series of the Battle of Chile who testify and tell in a unique way the dictatorship of Pinochet, the popular revolution and the coup d'état that followed. Fifty years later, Guzmán returns to Chile to take into account the political and social upheavals of his country.

title: Esterno notte
actors: Fabrizio Gifuni, Margherita Buy, Toni Servillo, Fausto Russo Alesi, Federico Torre, Bebo Storti, Fabrizio Conti, Mattia Bisonni, Gloria Carovana, Francesco Rossini, Davide Mancini, Lidia Vitale, Emmanuele Aita, Jacopo Relucenti, Mattia Napoli, Daniela Marra
description: The violence of the Red Brigades, in Italy of 1978, culminate with the kidnapping of Aldo Moro, president of the Christian Democracy, which took place on March 16, the day of the settlement of the government that should have seized an unprecedented alliance between the DC and The PCI (Italian Communist Party). Moro is kidnapped by the red brigades on the road to Parliament and from that moment a captivity begins that will end fifty -five days later with the discovery of him in a car, in Rome, halfway between the seats of the two parties.
notes: It is actually a TV series, which at first was reassembled in two films to get out in the cinemas "episodes": the first on May 18, 2022 and the second on June 9 of the same year. The two films last about 165 minutes each. In the serial form, on the other hand, it is broadcast on Rai1 in three evenings, on 14, 15 and 17 November 2022.

title: Quel che conta è il pensiero
actors: Luciano Baldan, Gianfranco Boattini, Matteo Celli, James Foschi, Giuliano Gavagna, Francesco Lega, Licia Navarrini, Michele Petrini, Alex Ravaglia, Alessandra Rontini, Enrico Zambianchi, Luca Zambianchi
description: Giovanni studies medicine in Bologna and divides the apartment with Michele, but the two are looking for a third tenant. Their life is divided between the study, the exams postponed, the philosophical discussions and the dream of bringing to the theater a show that seems to follow their lives and that revolves around the "Sigmund laundry".

title: Lynch/Oz
actors: Rodney Ascher, Justin Benson, Karyn Kusama, Aaron Moorhead, Amy Nicholson
description: David Lynch's obsession for the Wizard of Oz, told by the documentary maker Alexandre O. Philippe through the analysis of the elements that can be traced to the fairy tale in each film by the American director; To all this are added the impressions and reflections of critics, writers, directors and collaborators of Lynch who start from the analysis of the films to expand to a wider analysis on the nature of creativity.

title: Italia 1982, una storia azzurra
actors: Enzo Bearzot, Sandro Pertini, Marco Tardelli, Fulvio Collovati, Antonio Cabrini, Paolo Rossi (II), Beppe Dossena, Franco Selvaggi
description: Among interviews with the protagonists and unpublished period images, the history of the 1982 World Cup and the Italian national team, also seen in private brackets, opposed to that of a country led by the President of the Republic Sandro Pertini.

title: Rapito
actors: Paolo Pierobon, Barbara Ronchi, Fausto Russo Alesi, Filippo Timi, Fabrizio Gifuni, Enea Sala, Leonardo Maltese
description: The story of the Jewish child Edgardo Mortara, who in 1858 was torn from the family of origin to receive a Catholic education under the control and custody of Pope Pius IX.

title: L'ultima volta che siamo stati bambini
actors: Alessio Di Domenicoantonio, Vincenzo Sebastiani, Carlotta De Leonardis, Lorenzo McGovern Zaini, Marianna Fontana, Federico Cesari, Claudio Bisio, Antonello Fassari
description: Difficult to be children if the world is involved in a war around you. Cosimo, Italo and Vanda know something about it, who during the Second World War are just ten years old. Their only certainty is to have to leave for a rescue mission when a friend disappears.

title: Interdit aux chiens et aux italiens
actors: Ariane Ascaride
description: Alain Ughetto reconstructs the history of his family, who begins at the beginning of the twentieth century in the family village, Borgata Ughettera, in the Turin area. According to legend Luigi Ughetto then dreamed of a better life for himself and for his family and for this reason he crossed the Alps to begin a new life in France, determining forever the fate of his loved ones.

title: Master Gardener
actors: Joel Edgerton, Sigourney Weaver, Quintessa Swindell, Eduardo Losan, Esai Morales, Rick Cosnett, Victoria Hill, Amy Le, Jared Bankens, Matt Mercurio, Suzette Lange, DJames Jones, Samuel Ali, Erika Ashley, Scott Green, Emily Russell, Sean Richmond, Cade Burk
description: Narvel Roth (Edgerton) is the meticulous gardener who takes care of the Gracewood Gardens and dedicates himself so much to the care of the gardens of this beautiful and historic seal, as to satisfy his employer, the rich Mrs. Haverhill (Weaver). When Mrs. Haverhill asks him to take his great -grandpose Mayan (Swindell), rebellious and problematic as an apprentice, chaos enters the spartan existence of Narvel, revealing dark secrets of a violent and buried past that threatens them all.

title: All the Beauty and the Bloodshed
description: The militant activity of the photographer Nan Goldin, to denounce and condemn the opiate scandal that involved Purdue Pharma in the United States.
notes: The story that Laura Poitras' film refers is also mentioned in the Dopesick TV series, in an episode of which Goldin's activity is mentioned.

title: Bentu
actors: Giuseppe Cuccu, Giovanni Porcu
description: Raffaele sleeps in the countryside, to supervise the newly collected wheat pile that will be the provision of an entire year to come for him. Isolated from everyone, he awaits the wind, which will help him separate the beans from the straw, but no wind comes, only his friend Angelino who often finds him so as not to make him feel alone.

title: Alone
description: A boy does not want the sisters-bambine to marry, but he has to fight against a system in which this is normal.

title: Se fate i bravi
description: A reflection on the twenty years that have passed from the events of Genoa 2001. There are several observation points: that of those who had not yet been born and today are precisely twenty years; that of those who lived them but despite the fact that time has passed cannot consider them concluded; That of an adult person who in twenty years comes to be elderly. Twenty years have passed but the themes and problems that at that moment were on the agenda remained alive and unresolved: growing inequality, the finance that concentrates wealth and resources, the destruction of the environment, the great migrations.

title: The Kiev Trial
description: The history of the trial for war crimes held in Kiev in January 1946 and relating to the facts related to the massacre of Babi Yar, the sadly famous ravine where on 29 and 30 September 1941 the 4th Sonderkommando del Einsatzgruppe C killed and threw 33,771 Jews 33,771 , with the help of the South Police Regiment and the Ukrainian auxiliary police.

title: Obet
actors: Elizaveta Maximova, Alena Mihulová, Vita Smachelyuk, Igor Chmela, Viktor Zavadil, Gleb Kuchuk, Inna Zhulina
description: Irina lives with her son Igor in a small town near the Czech border. When she discovers that her son was attacked by three Roma she anguishes and hears the world of her collapse on her, but then little by little they begin to jump to her some inconsistencies in Igor's story.

title: Aru otoko
actors: Satoshi Tsumabuki, Sakura Andô, Masataka Kubota, Nana Seino
description: Akira works as a lawyer and one day he meets a woman who had once been his client. Rie, this is the name of her, asks him to make a check on his latest husband, Daisuke.

title: Le lycéen
actors: Paul Kircher, Juliette Binoche, Vincent Lacoste, Christophe Honoré, Xavier Giannoli, Wilfried Capet, Isabelle Thevenoux, Jean-Philippe Salerio
description: Lucas is seventeen and must understand what way to take, among all the challenges that life presents him. His brother moved to Paris to live alone, while he, who remained with his mother, between mourning, school and the temptation to give up is completely in disarray.

title: Er gol de Turone era bono
description: The Juventus match - Rome of 10 May 1981 is remembered for the cancellation of a key goal scored by Maurizio "Ramon" Turone. The decision is of the referee's assistant, who on the contrary had confirmed the goal. Roma will lose the Scudetto and will never forget that key moment of its history: the documentary traces the whole day together with the protagonists of the time.

title: Kill Me If You Can
description: Raffaele Minichiello in 1962 left Irpinia after the earthquake to emigrate to the United States, where at the age of nineteen, in 1969, it is already a multidecto marine for his actions in Vietnam. On October 31 of that same year he diverted a twin Jet started from Los Angeles with the intent to get to Cairo, but stops in Rome, after a very long flight and incredible media resonance. Many years later, he himself tells his story, interspersed with passengers of the time and repertoire material.

title: Bolshoye puteshestviye. Spetsialnaya dostavka
description: Mic Mic and Oscar and have been back for a while since their latest adventure, but a new mission can be glimpsed on the horizon: for the American presidential elections, in fact, a grizzly puppy must be brought back to its legitimate owner on a airship, avoiding the threat of the 'Acerreimo enemy Vulture, who tries in every way to sabotage the journey. Mic Mic and Oscar will take care of the delivery of the Grizzly together with Panda and Cicogna.

title: The Fire Within: A Requiem for Katia and Maurice Krafft
country: Great Britain, Switzerland, United States, France
actors: Katia Krafft, Maurice Krafft
description: On June 3, 1991, a cloud of overheated gas and particles was spit at enormous speed from the top of the Japanese volcano Unzen, overwhelming Katia and Maurice Krafft, French volcanologists and directors who remain killed together with their collaborators. The Krafft have inherited an archive of over 200 hours of videos, to which Werner Herzog had access to put together an elegia that celebrates the legacy of the two scientists and filmmakers.

title: Svegliami a mezzanotte
actors: Fuani Marino
description: The true story of Fuani Marino, a young woman who, due to a strong depression, launches itself from the fourth floor of a building and survives the fall. Wake me at midnight, investigate the dark places of psychic distress through frames and fragments, words and emotions of a fragile existence, illuminating them with the story of an inspected resurrection that brings hope with it.

title: La lunga corsa
actors: Adriano Tardiolo, Giovanni Calcagno, Nina Naboka, Barbora Bobulova, Maksim Kostyunin, Orest Syrvatka, Aylin Prandi, Stefano Cassetti, Gianluca Gobbi
description: Giacinto was born and raised in prison next to his mother. For him, the prison is home. It is where he learned to walk and run. One fine day, still a child, Giacinto is let out of prison, where he finds a pretine full of energy and patience that accompanies him in a family home to which he feels not to belong. For this reason he continues to run to find his mother in prison as often as he can; And for this, once he grew up, he returns to the fold becoming prison police officer.

title: The Other Child
actors: Kim Min-Jae, Hyo-ju Park
description: The members of a family deeply likes the disappearance of the firstborn son Han-Bysiul, sick for some time, convinced that it is a proof of faith to which they were subjected by Jesus himself. The head of the family, reverend of the small local community, insists on welcoming another disabled child, to allow the family to continue sharing their great love. The family adopts the visually impaired Isaac, charismatic and mysterious, who claims to be able to perceive the presence of Han-Bysiul.

title: Last Voyage of the Demeter
actors: David Dastmalchian, Liam Cunningham, Aisling Franciosi, Javier Botet, Corey Hawkins, Stefan Kapicic, Jon Jon Briones, Woody Norman, Nikolai Nikolaeff, Chris Walley, Christopher York, Graham Turner, Nicolo Pasetti, Adam Shaw, Martin Furulund, Noureddine Farihi, Danny Maász, Sally Reeve
description: Demeter, a roller flag Goletta, is carrying a private load from carpace in London - twenty -four wooden crates without distinctive signs - as precious as mysterious. Upon arrival on the British coast, however, the authorities find the ship depopulated. Only the captain's corpse remains, linked to the rudder wheel with a crucifix still in his hand.
notes: Taken from a chapter by Dracula by Bram Stoker entitled the captain's diary.

title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
directors: Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
actors: Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac, Jake Johnson, Issa Rae, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Velez, Rachel Dratch, Daniel Kaluuya, Jason Schwartzman, Jorma Taccone, Shea Whigham
description: After gathering with Gwen Stacy, Brooklyn's friendly spider-man Miles Morales is catapulted into the folds of the Multiverse, where he meets the Spider-Eroi team in charge of protecting his existence. But when the protectors of the multiverse prove intransigent on the best way to face a new and fearsome threat, Miles finds himself only against the other spider-heroes to defend his point of view. Everything, in order to save the person he loves most in the world.
notes: Sequel of Spider-Man: a new universe (2018).

title: Villeneuve Pironi
description: The long and incredible feud between the Canadian legend of the Formula 1 Gilles Villeneuve and the promising French rival Didier Peroni, the two bold Ferrari drivers whose relationship was irreparably cracked by the historic controversy that saw them protagonists.

title: Monster
actors: Sakura Andô, Eita Nagayama, Soya Kurokawa, Hinata Hiiragi, Haruo Tanaka
description: When the mined son begins to behave strangely, Saori perceives that there is something deep that is wrong. After discovering that it is a teacher who is responsible for this trauma, he rushes to school claiming to know what is going on. As the story takes place through the eyes of the mother, the teacher and the child, the truth gradually emerges

title: Kuru Otlar Üstüne
actors: Merve Dizdar, Deniz Celiloglu, Musab Ekici
description: Kenan, a young teacher who is finishing his internship in a small village, hopes to be transferred to Istanbul as requested by him. After waiting for a long time, Kenan leaves all hope of being able to escape from the depressing provincial routine. Her colleague Nuray, however, helps him to see his stay in the village from another point of view.

title: Anatomie d'une chute
actors: Sandra Hüller, Samuel Theis, Swann Arlaud, Jehnny Beth, Milo Machado Graner, Saadia Bentaïeb
description: Samuel is found dead, buried in the snow outside the isolated chalet where he lived with his wife Sandra, a German writer, and his blind 11 -year -old son, Daniel. The investigation ends with the "suspect death" verdict: impossible to know if Samuel committed suicide or if he has been murdered. Sandra is however offended ex officio and the process becomes a clinical dissection of the couple's history. At the same time, Daniel is fought and the doubt begins to insinuate himself into the relationship between mother and son.

title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry
actors: Jim Broadbent, Penelope Wilton, Monika Gossmann, Joseph Mydell, Nina Singh, Georgina Strawson, Maanuv Thiara, Bethan Cullinane, Marvin Brown, Nick Sampson, Jimmy 'The Bee' Bennett, Sharon Forbes, Mark Collier, Richard Waring
description: Harold is an ordinary man, who lived his life without taking initiatives and always on the margins. One day he leaves the house to make a letter and without a particular reason he decides not to stop at the mailbox, but to continue on foot without a precise destination.

title: Past Lives
actors: John Magaro, Greta Lee, Isaac Powell, Jojo T. Gibbs, Teo Yoo, Kristen Sieh, John-Deric Mitchell, Nathan Clarkson, Jane Yubin Kim, Keelia, Nadia Ramdass, Emily Cass McDonnell, Federico Rodriguez, Leem Seung-min, Moon Seung-ah, Skyler Wenger, Lisa Dennett, Conrad Schott
description: At ten, Nora was forced to abandon the best friend and first love Hae Sung to follow the family, who decided to emigrate to Canada from South Korea. More than ten years later Nora, who lives in New York and studies in A script school decides to look for Hae Sung online and contact him.

title: Ming On
actors: Ka-Tung Lam, Charm Man Chan, Wing-Sze Ng, Lok Man Yeung
description: A master of fortune teller (Gordon Lam), very skilled in the art of clairvoyance, agrees to help a woman to solve a mysterious murder.

title: The Artifice Girl
actors: Tatum Matthews, Lance Henriksen, Sinda Nichols, David Girard, Franklin Ritch, Ivana Barnes, Thomas Hamby, Alyssa Moody, Rashaud Sessions
description: An active vigilante on the internet decides to start developing a new revolutionary software to fight predators online, but the rapid development of the program also involves a series of important problems.

title: Mavka. Lisova pisnya
description: Mavka, one of the souls of the forest, falls in love with the young human Lukash, talented musician, and is faced with an impossible choice between love and his duty as guardian of the heart of the forest.

title: The First Slam Dunk
description: Ryota Miyagi has an older, sota, three -year -old brother of him, who during the childhood inspired his great love for basketball. Now that he has returned to being the playmaker owner of the Basketball team of the Shohoku high school - Band of escapades of the house formed by Hanamichi Sakuragi, Takenori Akagi, Hisashi Mitsui and Kaedade Rukawa, who among a thousand difficulties managed to qualify for the national championships for the national championships - Ryota is preparing to face the most important challenge of her young career, the one against the unbeatable reigning champions of the Sannoh high school.
notes: Based on Takehiko Inoue's Slam Dunk manga.

title: Harvest Moon
actors: Amarsaikhan Baljinnyam, Tenuun-Erdene Garamkhand, Damdin Sovd, Davaasamba Sharaw, Tserendarizav Dashnyam, Delgersaikhan Danaa, Adiya Rentsenkhorloo, Batbayar Dashnanzad, Sarantuya Dashnanzad, Minjin Ulambat, Ariunbat Otgonbayar, Evan Millard, Gantsogtbayar Tumurbaatar, Sansarbaatar Nansalmaa, Uuganbayar Bilegsaikhan, Khulangoo Battulga, Amarzaya Aakhuu, Enkhtuvshin Dookhuu
description: Returning to the Christmas Village to take care of the dying stepfather, Tulgaa honors his commitments, also offering herself to help with the summer harvest. The impertinent tuntuulei, 10 years old, is witness of the clumsy attempts to Tulgaa and undertakes to instruct the foreigner from the city to rural life. The two leave on the wrong foot, but soon they form a delicate bond that changes their lives.

title: Breast Cancer Bucket List
actors: Kelly Hu, Sylvia Kwan, Shannen Doherty, Patricia Velasquez, Aubrey Cleland, Jane Sibbett, Jim Klock, Jamie Kaler, Chad Lindberg, Ryan Malaty, Derek Yates, Luke Barnett, Greg Lewis, Hayley Seat
description: In Brenda Lee a negative triple breast cancer is diagnosed. After receiving the news, the woman decides to undertake a journey in search of her daughter who, years earlier, gave to adoption.

title: The Legend & Butterfly
actors: Takuya Kimura, Haruka Ayase, Manabu Hamada, Jun Hashimoto, Daisuke Honda, Hirotarô Honda, Somegorô Ichikawa, Mansaku Ikeuchi, Hideaki Ito, Kin'ya Kitaôji, Shûichirô Masuda, Ai Mikami, Hio Miyazawa, Kokoro Morita, Miki Nakatani, Takamitsu Nonaka, Kenta Ogawa, Toshinori Omi
description: In his youth, Oda Nobunaga obtained the nickname "The crowds of Owari" because of his bizarre behavior. He later married Nohime, but their relationship was not the best. Their marriage was born as a political union to pacify two neighboring and hostile regions. Oda Nobunaga accepted Nohime as his wife with a arrogant and authoritarian attitude, while Nohime maintained imperturbable behavior, willingly and without fearlessly colliding with her husband. The two were like oil and water. But when a vast enemy army, commanded by Imagawa Yoshimoto, attacked Owari, Nobunaga managed to organize the counter -offensive thanks to the support and advice of Nohime.

title: Abang Adik
actors: Serene Lim, Jack Tan, Kang Ren Wu
description: Abang and Adik are orphans without documents that live as invisible in Malaysia. If the older brother, deaf -mute, has resigned himself to a life of poverty, the younger brother, however, burns with indignation. A brutal accident upsets the fragile balance of their relationship.

title: Deleter
actors: Nadine Lustre, Louise Delos Reyes, McCoy De Leon, Jeffrey Hidalgo, Billy Villeta, Elia Ilano, Keiko Nakajima, Matthew Francisco, Charo Laude, Madelaine Red, Nic Galvez, Kedebon Colim, Sarah Jane Abad, Peter Adam Rebadomia, Jan Silverio, Kim Casaje, Virgie Fajardo, Ricardo Galing
description: Lyra, online content moderator, deletes a suicidal video posted by a colleague. Although it seems insensitive to the ugliness that must censor, in reality under an imperturbable facade, the woman hides a traumatic past that is about to return to visit her.

title: The Zone of Interest
actors: Sandra Hüller, Christian Friedel, Ralph Herforth, Max Beck, Stephanie Petrowitz, Marie Rosa Tietjen, Sascha Maaz
description: Rudolf Höss, Auschwitz commander, and his wife Hedwig commit themselves to building the life they dreamed of for their family, in the small idyll of a house with garden built just next to the field. An officer under Höss's command, however, falls in love with Hedwig.

title: Kuolleet lehdet
actors: Alma Pöysti, Jussi Vatanen
description: The story of Ansa, a shelf at the supermarket with a contract for zero hours and later recyclable plastic selector, accidentally crosses with that of Holappa - Sabbathy, alcoholic and later ex alcoholic. Despite adversity and misunderstandings, the two try to build a sort of relationship while living a life as a balance, without the network of the social state to protect their falls.

title: May December
actors: Natalie Portman, Julianne Moore, Cory Michael Smith, Charles Melton, Piper Curda, Drew Scheid, Kelvin Han Yee, Elizabeth Yu, Andrea Frankle, Allie McCulloch, Charles Green, Hailey Wist, Lawrence Arancio, Hans Obma, Julie Ivey, Jocelyn Shelfo, Zachary Branch, Gabriel Chung
description: Twenty years after their notorious love story filled the tabloids holding an entire nation with the breath, the wedding of a famous married couple gives in to the pressure when a young actress contacts them to do the research in view of the realization of a film about their past.

title: Perfect Days
actors: Koji Yakusho, Arisa Nakano
description: Hirayama works as a cleaning man in the public bathrooms of Tokyo. It seems happy with his simple life. A structured everyday life follows and dedicates its free time to love for music and books. Hirayama also has a passion for trees and, as soon as you can, you take time to photograph them. Gradually, some fragments of its past are gradually revealed through a series of unexpected encounters.

title: How to Have Sex
actors: Mia McKenna-Bruce, Samuel Bottomley, Lara Peake, Daisy Jelley, Eilidh Loan, Shaun Thomas, Enva Lewis
description: Three young friends fight against the pressure of their peers in making the decision on when and how to lose their virginity.

title: Aye haye zamini
actors: Bahman Ark, Servin Zabetiyan, Faezeh Rad, Majid Salehi
description: The story of ordinary people and from any social class, who face the cultural, religious and institutional constraints imposed on them by various social authorities, from school teachers to bureaucrats. Commissioning, humorous and engaging scenes, which capture the spirit and determination of people in the midst of adversity, offering a shaded portrait of a complex society.

title: Die Theorie von Allem
actors: Jan Bülow, Olivia Ross, Hanns Zischler, Gottfried Breitfuss, David Bennent, Philippe Graber, Imogen Kogge
description: 1962. During a physics congress held in a refuge on the Swiss Alps, a guest Iranian, an enigmatic pianist, a fatal femme and a corpse cross. The sky is sparked by a bizarre formation of clouds, while an increasingly intricate mystery is unraveled under the mountains.

title: Enzo Jannacci Vengo anch'io
description: Enzo Jannacci's creative musical genius is told through the words of the same artist, who speaks of his history and adventures in an interview released in 2005.

title: Invelle
description: 1918. Zelinda is a peasant child orphaned mother, while the father had to leave for the war. She is forced to stop childhood to deal with the house, brothers, stable and beasts. One day Zelinda returns to having a mother and father: at the town fair the girl tightens to the father and opens her eyes to make room for all the things that parades in front of him. Vere or imagine that they were, Zelinda those things now saw them and has made his idea of ​​how the world turns.

title: To End All War: Oppenheimer & the Atomic Bomb
actors: J. Robert Oppenheimer, Kai Bird, Ellen Bradbury, Alan B. Carr, Jennet Conant, Albert Einstein, David Eisenbach, Jon Else, Leslie Groves, Gregg Herken, Adolf Hitler, Michio Kaku, Joseph McCarthy, Christopher Nolan, Bill Nye, Charles Oppenheimer, Richard Rhodes, Eleanor Roosevelt
description: The arrogance, genius and determination of a man have changed the form and nature of the war forever. And after causing mass death, destruction and hysteria, his own choices led him to walk on a path of profound despair.
